story:
• Cat cafes started in Asia and have been popping up in the states over the last 12 months. San Diego, San Francisco, Paris, London, New York City, Portland...Cat Cafes are the new Hard Rock! St Pete needs one too!!


  •  This is great for so many types of people! We have seniors who may have difficulty caring for a cat in their home. We have college students who may not have pets in dorm rooms or apartments . We have many residents with roommates or significant others and family who are allergic. We have landlords with zero pet policies. We have actors, artists, musicians and athletes passing through town who may need a little stress relief, or may just miss their pets at home. We have tourists. Lots and lots of tourists. If you were in Saint Petersburg on vacation, would you pass up the chance to view and pet cats in Saint Petersburg's first and only cat cafe?! 



  • Adopting a cat from this cafe allows potential pet parents to play with and get to know cats in a fun and up beat environment instead of a sad and over crowded shelter. According to the ASPCA,  of the cats entering shelters, approximately 41% are euthanized.  52% in Pinellas county. We can do better!

  • The space can also be used to display local art, have open mic nights, bridal showers, birthday parties, office meetings and many other cat friendly events.
  •  We look forward to working with local coffee shops and restaurants and selling their goods along with our own. Cheesecake, donuts, fruits and other snacks.  Keep it local, St Pete!


  • What we need money for:

Permits/licences

Two months rent and deposits

Alarm system (for the safety of the cats)

Utilities

Minor construction

insurance

Cat supplies

Furniture

Coffee and snack supplies

Your rewards


THANK YOU!!!  

  • Remember, if we don't open, the cats get nothing, and its back to the drawing board. 

EVERY Dollar counts!  Let's save some cats together!!!!

Risks and challenges

This has never been done in Saint Petersburg before, so I am working with the city on what permitting is needed. Being both a coffee shop and housing cats brings double the permits, and double the fun.


  • FAQ

1. Can I bring my cat?

           No, for the safety of all cats, please do not being any animals to the cafe

2. Weren't you on that show Shark Tank?

           No, that was not us, we do with them luck though! 

3 But i already have a cat

            Great!  Now you can help support other local kitties just by coming by for                     a visit andcup of coffee!

4. I don't have a cat

           Thats OK too!  Our resident felines want you to come by for a visit, you can                  even adopt the one you fall in love with! 

5. Where will the cats come from?

          All of the Downtown Tabby cats will come from local shelters and                                 rescue organizations

We've offially partnered with Friends Of Strays shelter !!!This cafe will house shelter cats, improving their own lives and chance for            adoption as well as opening space in other facilities for cats to go. THIS SAVES  LIVES!




 This is great for so many types of people! We have seniors who may have difficulty caring for a cat in their home. We have college students who may not have pets in dorm rooms or apartments . story:
A Bookstore for Ankeny


"What I say is a town isn't a town without a bookstore. It may call itself a town, but unless it's got a bookstore it knows it's not fooling a soul." Neil Gaiman
 
As I began exploring the idea of opening a bookstore in Ankeny, the responses I received were overwhelmingly positive.  Residents in Ankeny place a lot of importance on cultural and creative organizations that are local. People move to Ankeny because of the many opportunities for their families--education, recreation or creativity. Yet despite the incredible growth over the years, Ankeny has never had its own bookstore. That is about to change.

 Local bookstores are an important part of a community because these spaces are about more than just books. With a full program of events, Plot Twist Bookstore will be  a literary and cultural spot to read, browse, linger, relax, talk, and learn.

Books need Bookshelves and Readers need Chairs

Plot Twist Bookstore aims to raise $10,000 from the community for fixtures.  Independent bookstores are on the rise.  Print sales are increasing and readers are are excited to support their local bookstores. Although bookstores are a niche retail business, I know that the community is enthusiastic and supportive. I am buying secondhand bookstore fixtures to save money. I need computers and a point of sale system.  I also need comfy seating for customers and folding chairs for events.  Painting and renovating the space will begin in December.


Book Clubs, Author Visits, and Awesome Books

I am a passionate reader and love talking about books and meeting the creative souls who write.  From board books and picture books to middle grade fiction, and YA  novels, Plot Twist will support young readers (or even adults who enjoy YA fiction--you know who you are).

Literary fiction, poetry, graphic novels, Westerns, cooking, and history — I have lots of ideas about what to stock but I expect to learn a lot from my customers. I am planning readings with local and national authors, story hours, book club  meetings, play-readings, lectures, and music. Bookstores are full of ideas, stories, pictures, and people who love books.

"I love bookstores. I love independent bookstores. I think heaven is an independent bookstore, or I hope it is." Aline Ohansian

Thank You

I have spent a year carefully researching this business and worked closely with industry professionals and advisers to ensure the store's success.  I am confident I am bringing an exciting community bookstore to Ankeny. 

I appreciate donations of any size.  Please let your friends know that Plot Twist Bookstore is opening in Ankeny. As one supporter said, "Finally, it's about time."

story:
Who Are We?

At Red Clay Brewing Company, we are made up of Kerry McGinnis with a background in engineering, Stephen Harle with a background in accounting, and John Corbin with a background in business and hospitality. 

We are three guys with a passion for craft beer, home brewing, and the whole culture surrounding it.  Red Clay Brewing Company opened in March of this year, and we have successfully opened a taproom where we are able to serve our local community! We are currently distributing around our home state of Alabama and will begin distributing in Georgia next month.  We are excited about the opportunity to bring our beer to even more people. 

Why Red Clay?

As we were in the process of defining who we are, we asked ourselves, "What do people think about when they think of the South?"  Well, with all three of us born and raised here, there is one common thing that is truly southern...RED CLAY!!!  It's EVERYWHERE!! So naturally we chose Red Clay Brewing Company. Our name represents what we grew up knowing, and so do our beer labels.  With names like Big Swamp Stout (Big Swamp deriving from the Muskogee word Opelika), Hop Jubilee (from the late night Jubilee's we went to off the Eastern Shore of the Mobile Bay), and Hay Shed Saison (to represent the abundant agriculture around our state), you can't help but think of that sweet Southern land we call home.

Why Opelika?

Though we all have ties to historic Opelika, the three of us have spent time away. Realizing that there is no better place to be, and deciding this was the right time for us, we realized through all of our searching that there not only was a rejuvenation of the downtown area, but there is also an up and coming Lebanon Art District. This is where our brewery and taproom reside.

What Will The Contributions Be Used For?

Glad you asked... 

Red Clay Brewing Company is fairly new, and we are looking for assistance to help us expand, improve, and keep up this amazing atmosphere. We want to serve exceptional beer because at Red Clay, we have an absolute passion for craft beer. These funds will enable the three of us to move forward on the production side of our business. Now that our recipes are perfected, we need to keep up with growing demands! With your help we can provide our specialty craft beer to our ever growing area. Your contributions will help us establish our presence, and help us fund our canning line. We hope you’ll be proud to say you helped make it happen!

For your contributions, we are offering some great benefits! These include stickers, hats, t shirts, leather goods and memberships to our mug club, along with some other great perks.

Other ways you can help!

You can always help by spreading the word about our campaign! Share the link on Facebook, Twitter, and other social media sites. If you are in the area, come swing by and treat yourself to our great beer!

Thank you,

John, Kerry and Stephen

story:
Join us in opening the Zen Artisan Boutique & Retreat: where all art is seen and all music is heard. A portion of our proceeds will go back into the community, to local food banks and people in need. Be a part of a positive, progressive movement supporting the arts. Create. Share. Inspire. Our above video will give you a better idea! Click on it...

Zen Artisan Boutique is a fresh new concept that combines a "feel good" welcoming vibe with diverse artisan items created by hand, by artists. From paintings to jewelry to spiritual items, accessories and more. Our wall of books will beckon you to come sit a spell with a freshly brewed cup of gourmet tea or coffee. We'll also have local musicians showcase their talent and sell their CD's with us.



 Zen Artisan Boutique is set to be the area's destination for local music, art, a card game between friends, poetry readings or just a quiet place to relax and watch the world go by. Bring your laptop for free wi-fi or help yourself to one of our many free books.

THE ART Our featured artists will be curated on an ongoing basis and our featured retail items will change periodically to keep things fresh. Many artists and craftspeople will have their own shelf space and exhibits in the cafe. Think of it as a creative co-op featuring local music and art.  Our artists share the same interest in continuing to grow their artistic businesses. We will encourage singers, songwriters and poets to come share on friday and saturday nights.   We'll offer the best selection of unique goods and music from independent artists. We'll encourage people to network and shop with us regularly. Supporting us means supporting the talent of independent artists and musicians. From music CD's to candles to soaps, paintings, pottery, jewelry, pillows, blankets and more! Nothing mass produced.



NETWORK. LEARN. GROW. SHARE. Meet up with old friends, or come network with new potential clients and business partners. Are you a local musician or singer/song writer? Come share your talent with us. Artist? Come show us what you have to offer! Get a spiritual reading by Kat. She also offers soul healings, mentoring and women's groups. Kim offers Vision Board classes and teaches how to create art by hand that you can sell! Perhaps you just need a comfortable place to relax, read, sip some hot tea and watch the world go by.



WHO WE ARE Kat is a mentor, life coach, spiritual healer and chef. She has a Masters degree in business. Kim is an author and artist. Her background is as a paralegal and in writing.

SO WHAT DO WE NEED? We need a downtown retail space. Holy moly this stuff isn't cheap! We are looking for space in the following downtown areas: Brighton, Milford, Ann Arbor, Northville, Farmington Hills or Plymouth, Michigan. Our hope is to open by spring/summer of 2016.


THE PERKS We are very appreciative. We will graciously accept any help, big or small.  We realize we all work hard for our money, so we tailored our perks to be awesome for any contributors! Have a look at what we'll offer you if you contribute! We will also update periodically with specifics on how the money is being allocated. We do have a business plan for any potential investors who'd like to see the breakdown of the business structure.

ARTISTS/CRAFTERS/MUSICIANS: Are you an artist looking to increase your retail presence without absorbing all of the operational costs associated with a brick and mortar? Do you want to sell CD's? Would you like to be a part of a retail co-op featuring the best in art, music and culture? If so, Zen could be for you. Email us to learn more about joining us, we'd love to hear from you!



ZenArtisanBoutique@gmail.com

CREATE. SHARE. INSPIRE.

Can't contribute financially?  No worries, you can:
  • Ask friends to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remind them to share this

Questions? We're here to answer them: ZenArtisanBoutique@gmail.com

Thank you!

Love,

Kat & Kim

story:
Bonjour,

I Have been running The French Delicatessen for just over ten years.

I have started to trade using the family car, then a van, another, more vans, and even a shop at some point.

The next big step for me, will be a French Market Van, as those you can see on all the markets in France


  • A brand new van like this cost over £100.000, but it's not what I am looking to spend. A good second hand one, cost between £10.000 and £15.000
  • If you trust in local businesses, or want to make a good investment, look at my perks
  • If I can not get the full amount, I will place this money into a saving account until I can afford to get a van.
  • Not only, it will look nice to have a van like this, but also it will be much easier for me to set up(I'm not getting younger), especially in bad weather.
  • It will also help me to work in a better environment, in term of comfort and hygiene.


  • I know it's a lot of money, so if you can't money wise, could you just spread the word? Maybe someone else would be able to help me.
  • You can share this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools!

Merci

Not only, it will look nice to have a van like this, but also it will be much easier for me to set up(I'm not getting younger), especially in bad weather. It will also help me to work in a better environment, in term of comfort and hygiene.

story:
Franklin has a diverse history. Downtown Franklin exists because of the rivers and mill buildings. We are now ready to reuse the rivers to repurpose and reinvent ourselves focusing on recreational activities and a true sense of community.

Although we are presently the smallest and poorest city in New Hampshire, we are poised and heading in the right direction with momentum to change that. We are ready to overcome common place issues such as obesity, drug addiction, crime, lack of economic opportunity and stigma that challenge many small towns by bringing in new opportunities. 

Our non-profit, PermaCityLife was founded in 2014 to act as a catalytic organization to bring Franklin Falls Revitalization Plan to life. We have acquired sufficient real estate in the heart of downtown, and are now positioned to carry forward the vision that has been laid out and supported by the community. Yet, the market alone will not drive development in downtown Franklin.

We need a catalyst to support our residents, visitors, restaurants and new businesses. This iconic outdoor destination will give that boost.

Vision for An Iconic Outdoor Destination

A diverse and motivated partnership of community members are planning to improve our community’s quality of life through getting dirty or wet at our new park:

  • Community Garden, which will supply our residents with fresh and organic fruits and vegetables free of charge
  • Whitewater Park on the Winnipesaukee River enabling whitewater kayakers, surfers, stand up paddleboarders to utilize our river year round
  • Mountain Bike Pump Track winding through the hills and valleys adjacent to the river, designed for each and every rider

The combination of a whitewater park and a pump track in close proximity to a downtown exists nowhere else in New England, making Franklin the next stop for any outdoor recreationalist.

With Your Help

Our goal is to raise $45,000 in order to pay certified engineers from McLaughlin Whitewater and trail designers from Highland Trails. In return, these companies will provide conceptual designs, detailed designs and planning documentation to support the construction of this iconic destination.

By supporting us in the creation of an innovative community park you’ll be supporting the revitalization of this historic mill town - one that is rooted in the principles of sustainability and community development.

PermaCityLife is  a NH non-profit with Franklin Business and Industrial Development Corporation as our 501 (c) 3 fiscal sponsor. All donation made to our campaign are tax deductible. 

Our Project in Numbers

Whitewater Park Consultation Services with McLaughlin Whitewater: $28,000
Pump Track Master Plan with Highland Mountain Bike Park: $15,000
Indiegogo Campaign Fees: $2,000

The Impact

Through getting dirty and wet, we plan on having a positive impact on every person in town, even those who do not take full advantage of our park. Our project will:

  • Increase the community’s quality of life  
  • Increase property values  
  • Develop a community identity & build a sense of pride  
  • Create environmental attachment & promote Franklin as a regional outdoors destination
  • Provide opportunities to community, business owners, sponsors, vendors & entrepreneurs

The community garden will not only provides a green space in the heart of downtown but also a place for people to socialize, and enjoy the edibles planted by our own community members.  Our partnership with Franklin Regional Hospital, the Healthy Eating Active Living (HEAL) Coalition and Pay It Forward Farm will help increase access to local organic food grown right in our community.

The Winnipesaukee River is already a whitewater kayaker’s playground, However, it is only at a suitable level when dams upstream release water. Altering the mill infested river sustainably to improve the quality and safety of the rapids would provide the public continuous use of the river. This amenity - a 1.5 mile feature from Cross Mill Bridge to Trestle View Park-would be the first of its kind in New England.

While kayakers are running the rapids, bikers can be enjoying the Mountain Bike Pump Track adjacent to the river. Our neighbor and staple in the biking world, Highland Mountain Bike Park, will design a course enjoyable for people of all ages and skill levels.

Kayaking and Mountain Biking are sports which promote flow moments – a moment in which a person is totally engulfed in the activity. Flow moment sports have direct connections to personal happiness, and are being used to combat issues such as; PTSD, cancer and drug addiction in other parts of the country.

According to a recent study, Franklin's Outdoor Activities & Associated Economic Impact, developed with NH Department of Resources and Economic Development office, it was estimated that iconic amenities such as these would account for $6.8 Million in direct spending, and another $4.68 Million via indirect and induced spending into the local economy.

This park is a holistic solution to some of the issues Franklin’s residents live day to day.

Challenges

This campaign will provide the designs and engineering documentation necessary to start building. However, it will not provide the funds for the actual construction. Our collaborative team, will have to raise additional funds to begin the implementation phase. However, given our dedication and successful public-private partnership, we are confident that we will achieve our vision.

Another issue is perception, for a long time these buildings were closed, vacant and deteriorating. Seeing them vibrant with activity and construction is wonderful and it combats the idea that Franklin’s history is Franklin’s future.

About PermaCityLife

PermaCityLife, was formally created in 2014 to serve as the catalytic organization focused on bringing the Franklin Falls Revitalization Plan to life.

Our mission is to lead the charge for positive and sustainable economic growth in downtown Franklin while protecting past investments. We are working in partnership with local government, private investors, and the philanthropic sector to support and develop specific real estate projects in downtown Franklin. 

Our vision is to create a model for cities to become more self-reliant and to transition away from their dependence on fossil fuels with an emphasis on protecting our drinking water, creating renewable energy, ensuring local food supplies, and implementing zero waste measures. We hope to pioneer a new approach to building a collaborative and resilient downtown, turning downtown into a vibrant micro-­urban centerpiece.

This is the largest adaptive reuse project in Franklin’s history. We’ve acquired seven large block buildings and three of the mills. Carefully selected development projects are underway that will set into motion a new logic for our downtown. Reactivating our dormant mill buildings is a priority with the capacity to trigger a ripple effect of multidimensional change that will fundamentally remake the value and function of our downtown.

What We Have Achieved

Over the past 12 months, a host of residents, volunteers, local officials, non-profit organizations, business owners, entrepreneurs, social partners, colleges and high schools have collaborated on multiple projects.

A new Community Based Sustainability degree program was developed in collaboration with Colby Sawyer College. Funding was procured for a $12 Million renovation of a historic mill to provide 45 new rental housing units in downtown. Mill renovations and openings of multiple businesses; Toad Hall, the Franklin Studio coffee shop and the Franklin Clothing Company. Renovations are currently ongoing with team members and volunteers for Outdoor New England, Take Root Coworking and a new Franklin based brewery. Last but not least, a new downtown sculpture park where the artist upcycles broken car parts and transforms them into art.

We won't stop here. We have more projects and initatives lined up for the future. To learn more, visit: www.permacitylife.com

Please Support our Community

If you can’t donate, it doesn’t mean you can’t help. We need to make noise about our project and Franklin’s Revitalization!

Use Indiegogo’s built in tools to share and re-share this campaign to your social media network.

Every like and every re-share help our community get closer to our goal!
story_txt:
Franklin has a diverse history. Downtown Franklin exists because of the rivers and mill buildings. We are now ready to reuse the rivers to repurpose and reinvent ourselves focusing on recreational activities and a true sense of community.Although we are presently the smallest and poorest city in New Hampshire, we are poised and heading in the right direction with momentum to change that. We are ready to overcome common place issues such as obesity, drug addiction, crime, lack of economic opportunity and stigma that challenge many small towns by bringing in new opportunities. Our non-profit, PermaCityLife was founded in 2014 to act as a catalytic organization to bring Franklin Falls Revitalization Plan to life. We have acquired sufficient real estate in the heart of downtown, and are now positioned to carry forward the vision that has been laid out and supported by the community. Yet, the market alone will not drive development in downtown Franklin.We need a catalyst to support our residents, visitors, restaurants and new businesses. This iconic outdoor destination will give that boost.Vision for An Iconic Outdoor DestinationA diverse and motivated partnership of community members are planning to improve our community’s quality of life through getting dirty or wet at our new park:

Community Garden, which will supply our residents with fresh and organic fruits and vegetables free of charge

Whitewater Park on the Winnipesaukee River enabling whitewater kayakers, surfers, stand up paddleboarders to utilize our river year round

Mountain Bike Pump Track winding through the hills and valleys adjacent to the river, designed for each and every rider
The combination of a whitewater park and a pump track in close proximity to a downtown exists nowhere else in New England, making Franklin the next stop for any outdoor recreationalist.With Your HelpOur goal is to raise $45,000 in order to pay certified engineers from McLaughlin Whitewater and trail designers from Highland Trails. In return, these companies will provide conceptual designs, detailed designs and planning documentation to support the construction of this iconic destination.By supporting us in the creation of an innovative community park you’ll be supporting the revitalization of this historic mill town - one that is rooted in the principles of sustainability and community development.PermaCityLife is  a NH non-profit with Franklin Business and Industrial Development Corporation as our 501 (c) 3 fiscal sponsor. All donation made to our campaign are tax deductible. Our Project in NumbersWhitewater Park Consultation Services with McLaughlin Whitewater: $28,000Pump Track Master Plan with Highland Mountain Bike Park: $15,000Indiegogo Campaign Fees: $2,000The ImpactThrough getting dirty and wet, we plan on having a positive impact on every person in town, even those who do not take full advantage of our park. Our project will:
Increase the community’s quality of life  
Increase property values  
Develop a community identity & build a sense of pride  
Create environmental attachment & promote Franklin as a regional outdoors destination
Provide opportunities to community, business owners, sponsors, vendors & entrepreneurs
The community garden will not only provides a green space in the heart of downtown but also a place for people to socialize, and enjoy the edibles planted by our own community members.  Our partnership with Franklin Regional Hospital, the Healthy Eating Active Living (HEAL) Coalition and Pay It Forward Farm will help increase access to local organic food grown right in our community.The Winnipesaukee River is already a whitewater kayaker’s playground, However, it is only at a suitable level when dams upstream release water. Altering the mill infested river sustainably to improve the quality and safety of the rapids would provide the public continuous use of the river. This amenity - a 1.5 mile feature from Cross Mill Bridge to Trestle View Park-would be the first of its kind in New England.While kayakers are running the rapids, bikers can be enjoying the Mountain Bike Pump Track adjacent to the river. Our neighbor and staple in the biking world, Highland Mountain Bike Park, will design a course enjoyable for people of all ages and skill levels.Kayaking and Mountain Biking are sports which promote flow moments – a moment in which a person is totally engulfed in the activity. Flow moment sports have direct connections to personal happiness, and are being used to combat issues such as; PTSD, cancer and drug addiction in other parts of the country.According to a recent study, Franklin's Outdoor Activities & Associated Economic Impact, developed with NH Department of Resources and Economic Development office, it was estimated that iconic amenities such as these would account for $6.8 Million in direct spending, and another $4.68 Million via indirect and induced spending into the local economy.This park is a holistic solution to some of the issues Franklin’s residents live day to day.ChallengesThis campaign will provide the designs and engineering documentation necessary to start building. However, it will not provide the funds for the actual construction. Our collaborative team, will have to raise additional funds to begin the implementation phase. However, given our dedication and successful public-private partnership, we are confident that we will achieve our vision.Another issue is perception, for a long time these buildings were closed, vacant and deteriorating. Seeing them vibrant with activity and construction is wonderful and it combats the idea that Franklin’s history is Franklin’s future.About PermaCityLifePermaCityLife, was formally created in 2014 to serve as the catalytic organization focused on bringing the Franklin Falls Revitalization Plan to life.Our mission is to lead the charge for positive and sustainable economic growth in downtown Franklin while protecting past investments. We are working in partnership with local government, private investors, and the philanthropic sector to support and develop specific real estate projects in downtown Franklin. Our vision is to create a model for cities to become more self-reliant and to transition away from their dependence on fossil fuels with an emphasis on protecting our drinking water, creating renewable energy, ensuring local food supplies, and implementing zero waste measures. We hope to pioneer a new approach to building a collaborative and resilient downtown, turning downtown into a vibrant micro-­urban centerpiece.This is the largest adaptive reuse project in Franklin’s history. We’ve acquired seven large block buildings and three of the mills. Carefully selected development projects are underway that will set into motion a new logic for our downtown. Reactivating our dormant mill buildings is a priority with the capacity to trigger a ripple effect of multidimensional change that will fundamentally remake the value and function of our downtown.What We Have AchievedOver the past 12 months, a host of residents, volunteers, local officials, non-profit organizations, business owners, entrepreneurs, social partners, colleges and high schools have collaborated on multiple projects.A new Community Based Sustainability degree program was developed in collaboration with Colby Sawyer College. Funding was procured for a $12 Million renovation of a historic mill to provide 45 new rental housing units in downtown. Mill renovations and openings of multiple businesses; Toad Hall, the Franklin Studio coffee shop and the Franklin Clothing Company. Renovations are currently ongoing with team members and volunteers for Outdoor New England, Take Root Coworking and a new Franklin based brewery. Last but not least, a new downtown sculpture park where the artist upcycles broken car parts and transforms them into art.We won't stop here. We have more projects and initatives lined up for the future. To learn more, visit: www.permacitylife.comPlease Support our CommunityIf you can’t donate, it doesn’t mean you can’t help. story:
Hello and thank you for supporting the Blue Moon Weaver, After many years of practice as a psychic medium, I am looking to expand my services and credentials through Hypnotherapy with the goal of opening my own practice specializing in past life reconstruction. In the mean time I am utilizing Facebook and will be working multiple events to showcase my talents as a medium and reader featuring Spirit Lead Readings, Past Life Readings, and Traditional Past Life Readings.  Right now my businesses growth is taking it one step at a time but with your help, the Blue Moon Weaver will rise above all our expectations!

How Blue Moon Weaver Will Benifit

  • Full State Licensing and L.L.C $635
  • Hypnotherapy & Jin Shin Jyutsu Certification/Licensing
  •  Full Service Website with retail abilities through Wix  $315 yr
  • Opportunity to Attend  More Live Events $65 (x5) = $325
*I am already booked for at least one event event every month this year and have multiple one-on-one clients every week.*

What Your Generosity Will Help You Get

 1 Hour Spirit Reading

Enjoy a one hour spirit reading that will provide you with helpful ques and guidance for your life questions. A wonderful entertaining moment in time based on a custom reading

 2 Hour Spirit Reading 

Take part in a 2 hour long spirit guided reading designed to heal and guide you in your day to day life. This is not your traditional tarot. So sit back and enjoy the wonderful insights that are in store for you.

 2 Hour Past Life Exploration

Sit and relax as you enter a guided semi-hypnotic trance that will allow you to travel back and explore who you once were. Sessions are entirely guided and designed to be as entertaining as they are insightful.

Risks & Challenges

This is a field where the more you know and who you know makes all the difference.Through classes , conventions, Facebook, Twitter and now YouTube, I have been able to expand Blue Moon into an amazing business I love. And when you do what you love, you"re willing to put the work in and take it to the next level, all I need is that that extra boost from you! Thank you again for taking the time to read this and for helping the Blue Moon Weaver Rise.

story:
Short Summary

Over the recent years the bee population in the world has faced a rapid decline. If this trend continues, the consequences will be detrimental to the world crop stock. Bees are responsible for pollinating a large proportion of crops and their absence could lead to a disappearance of up to one third of the world's crop supplies. This shocking discovery led to our team's initial idea of increasing the bee population in the Netherlands, however a way in which to connect this to social entrepreneurship had not yet been established. This is where members of Project Kom ErBij from Enactus UCU got involved. While contacting numerous homeless shelters, a team member came into contact with Machiel Spek, a member of the Salvation Army in Utrecht.

This initial contact then led the team to an experienced beekeeper in the Salvation Army organisation who will assist in overseeing the first beehives. The Salvation Army works closely together with 50|50 working companies who aim to provide meaningful daytime activities for individuals in the care of the Salvation Army or even reintegration into the labour market.

The aim is for the unemployed psychiatric patients, from a Salvation Army location, to build, set up and maintain beehives using the honey harvested at the end of the season to make a small profit. This, in turn, intends to develop both social and business skills in order to start the process of reintegration into the working population.

What We Need

At the moment, we need funds to start building the beehives as soon as possible. We already have a business plan with both a pilot and expansion phase for the project. For the pilot phase we need around 1,000 euros which will be used to pay the homeless individuals a beekeeping course, and to acquire the materials necessary to build the first beehive.

Because we are raising in euros, the only payment option that is currently available to us is PayPal. However, you do not need a PayPal account to be able to use this system! You can also donate money with your credit/debit card via PayPal's ''Guest Checkout'' function.

The Impact

The current decline in the bee population cannot be solved with one hive. We are aware of that. However, if every community took a first small step like this, then certainly we could soon see a rise in the bee population. In addition, as mentioned above, our team plans to expand this project, not to just one hive, but to multiple hives spread across the Netherlands.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot donate to our cause then please still share this campaign on your social medias, maybe someone else you know might.

Also, think twice before you kill a bee next time. We need them in order to survive.

story:
Short Summary

     My name is Rich Alvarez, and I am a retired police officer and corrections officer, as well as serving as the Owner of The Lakeside Holdings Group, LLC.  While working in the criminal justice system, I often noticed the same people being recycled through the system over and over again.  When I asked them why they kept coming back, they inevitably replied that they could not get a job.  The statistics bear this out, as well.  Returning citizens face barriers in employment, housing, and college admissions.  If they can't get a job, a place to live, or go back to school, how can society expect them to become productive citizens after they are released?  I knew something had to be done, and that's where the inspiration for the Lakeside Holdings Group came from.

     In 2015, with the help of Board Member Logan E. Fahey, I formed Lakeside with the purpose of helping people with obstacles to employment by training and employing them in the landscaping, painting, and janitorial industries.  We've bootstrapped the business on a shoestring budget and were blessed with an incredible first year.  The landscape portion of the company is the most capital intensive of the three segments we serve.  We were only able to purchase older used equipment, which really needs to be replaced with newer equipment in order to continue to provide high quality landscape services and employment for several people with barriers to employment.  Some of these barriers include those with disabilities, returning veterans, and ex-offenders.  This year our primary area of focus is the landscaping part of the business, and we have even renamed that element, calling it New Life Landscaping, to better reflect our mission. We need your help to grow our business and purchase new equipment.

What We Need & What You Get

     We feel it is imperative to let you know where your contributions with go.  We are seeking $10,000 in order to purchase a zero turn mower, trailer, and backpack blower, allowing us to double our capacity and add two new positions. The new positions will be filled by individuals with some obstacle to employment, such as a criminal background, disability, or returning veteran. Last year, we were able to train and employ several full-time and part-time mission employees.  We would like to add to that total, and will require some new equipment in order to accomplish that task.

     We have several rewards available for those donors who meet certain levels of contribution.  Some of these include flower planting, Spring and Fall Clean-ups, a season of lawn mowing, mulching, and a comprehensive landscape service contract for those who live locally.  For those who do not, we offer garden gloves and shovels or plants as token of our appreciation. *If you would like to donate your reward to a local charity or disabled person, please let us know and we will accommodate your request.

The Impact

     Incarceration costs the American taxpayer approximately $80 billion dollars annually, and that doesn't even account for the lost GDP in worker productivity due to the barriers to employment imposed on ex-offenders which cause unemployment and under-employment.  One in four Americans have some sort of criminal conviction on their record, but only 40% of employers say they would consider hiring an ex-offender.  These facts don't even include the impact of unemployment and under-employment for other groups with barriers to employment.  While we are only a small social enterprise at this point, your contributions will help us grow, so that we can help even more people.

       It is our belief that entrepreneurship is one of the best ways to overcome barriers to traditional employment.  With the right guidance and economic assistance, we believe that some of our mission employees could make good Lakeside business owners, and your contributions c an help them along that path.

Risks & Challenges

     One of the biggest challenges is finding motivated employees who can provide the level of service we would like to represent our company.  This is where our training and supervisory personnel are vital.  We also maintain a list of interested potential employees who are anxious to replace anyone that does not work out.  Last year was a learning year for us on how to properly manage our mission employees.  I believe my experience in corrections and police work allows me to be better prepared to deal with any contingencies that may arise.  I also have a BA in Nonprofit Administration from Cleveland State University and am pursuing my MBA in Entrepreneurship at Baldwin Wallace University.

     Logan Fahey, Chairman of the Board,  is a highly experienced social entrepreneur and consultant.  Logan currently manages a new social enterprise for local nonprofit, Towards Employment.  He started his first landscaping company, Lennox Grounds Management, in 2012.  He grew that company to be one of the largest local property management companies with well over 1000 accounts.  He also aided the nonprofit True North Ministry in starting their own landscaping company to help juvenile offenders, and has worked on several projects for the Dalton Foundation, as well.  Logan's oversight and advice is invaluable to our success.

     Finally, Lakeside is guided by an incredible team of seasoned landscape professionals who know the industry in and out.  We took the first year as an opportunity to prove ourselves on our budget and we believe the success we experienced last year will only increase year over year.     

Other Ways You Can Help

     While no contribution is too small, and we appreciate every penny, we realize that some people are just not able to contribute.  That doesn't mean you can't help.   We need help in spreading the word, so the first thing you could do is forward this campaign to all of your contacts via social networks, email, and word of mouth.  The second way you can help is if you live in the Cleveland, Ohio area.  If you need landscape services of any kind, please give us an opportunity to bid on the work.  Our number is (440) 427-4000.  Ask for Rich, and I will be happy to help you.  The final way you can help is to call your congress person and ask them to vote for any legislation that helps people overcome barriers to employment.  We thank you from the bottom of our hearts for any help you can provide.

-Rich Alvarez

story:
ihiveLIVE 2.0 - Work-in-progress  

At ihiveLIVE we’re creating a new social media platform that enables you to turn your online activity into funds for those people and causes that are most important to you. We do this in the following manner: 

1.) Upon sign up you provide us with two types of information      

     a.) What products you regularly buy and want to receive advertising for, and;              b.) What are the causes you want to support. 

2.) We will then connect you with online, discussion-based communities where you can discuss those topics you are most passionate about.  Communities such as: 

  • University Student Bodies and Sororities/Fraternities
  • Cycling, Running, or other Sporting Organizations
  • Movie or Book Discussion Groups
  • Local Charitable and Faith-based Organizations

                                   


3.) Based upon the advertising revenue that is generated by your online activity  in our communities ( from the tailor-based ads that you receive), we will automatically share 20% of your revenue to the causes that you support and 20% directly to you, the user. Although the funds will initially be small, as a large collective of users come together, we can generate revenue that will have a huge social impact for those causes that each of us care about.


In a world where everyone wants to share and help others, but not everyone has the financial means or the time to spare, ihiveLIVE plays an important role.  We know that social media can become a powerful tool for social good by simply sharing revenue with users and those causes they believe in. And we believe there are millions of people, just like you, who share our view. 

Join our movement and help us make it happen!


ihiveLIVE 2.0 - Work-in-progress 



The Evolution of Social Media 

Our Perks Reflect "The Power of Revenue Sharing"

Our campaign perks reflect what we are all about --- "the power of sharing".  In recognition of your financial support we will take 10% of every dollar that you contribute and share it with five worthy charitable organizations that our supporters choose through a voting process. 

After you make a contribution you will receive an email with a link to a page with a list of cause related organizations, from which you will vote for those organizations (as many as you’d like) that you would like to see ihiveLIVE support with a percentage of the funds that are raised. At the conclusion of our campaign, we will redirect 10% of all funds to the 5 organizations with the most votes received. 

After you contribute you will receive an email from us providing a list of charitable organizations to support (you can add organizations as well) There may be a short delay in receiving our email that allows you to vote. If so, please know we appreciate your patience greatly!

Your Voting Power 

Every person who contributes $10 gets to vote for the cause(s) they want the money to go to. 

With every additional $10 you contribute, you will increase your voting power by 1.  For example, if you contribute $100 you will get to vote once, but your vote will be multiplied by 10, and the cause(s) you have selected will then benefit accordingly, because when all of the votes are calculated, only the 5 causes with the most votes will receive money.  

So, if one of the causes are of special importance to you, please consider the value of your contribution, and reach out to family and friends to get involved, because you have "voting power" to determine the outcome.  


How This Campaign Will Help Us and Others

We continue to receive strong interest from industry leaders, advertisers and large affinity groups and organizations across North America, many of them ready  to start their own iHives.  In order to meet this growing demand and expectations for ihiveLIVE we need to ensure that our technology and platform are leading-edge, which requires us to build a more agile, robust platform with mobile and wearable devices in mind.  The funds we raise through crowdfunding will help us accomplish this, and to create and "go live" with several iHives by the beginning of 2016. 


How You Can Help Us:

 - Please consider contributing to our campaign; remember, a percentage of the money you give will also be used to support a number of worthy causes

-  Become an advocate for ihiveLIVE, telling your friends and relatives about what we are doing and letting them know about our crowdfunding campaign

- Share our campaign on social media using the buttons provided at the top of our campaign page, just to the left of our crowdfunding video. 

- Use the Indiegogo "referral button" located at the top left side of this campaign page to help spread the word about ihiveLIVE through social media

- Become a volunteer, and a part of our team, and help us get mobilized quicker. Contact us at contact@ihivelive.com

Please join us in making ihiveLIVE a reality


ihiveLIVE User Experience Video


Key ihiveLIVE Features

Generous revenue sharing model – up to 40% 

A “pay it forward” platform to help raise funds for causes

Members have full control over their social interactions

Permission-based marketing; you only receive offers you ask for

Meaningful discussions ensure the social experience is primary

Designed for affinity groups whose causes will directly profit from member participation


The Concept Behind the Name

ihiveLIVE  is based on the basic principles of a beehive whereby all participants contribute to building it and benefiting from the activity, as bees do in building their hives. iHive portrays the way an individual will work within a group like bees in a hive, living and working together for a common goal, within a distinct community. With ihiveLIVE  the individual iHives are the various groups of people to whom the idea has some specific interest or relevance – “affinity” – and the foundation for a community. As advertisers use the ihiveLIVE  platform to support their business, the social commerce aspect grows, and revenue is generated for everyone to share.

As members accumulate financial rewards they will have an option to redirect their funds to their preferred causes. The ihiveLIVE  revenue sharing model provides clear leadership in philanthropy and exemplifies the importance of  “giving back” to your community. We are a social network with a “heart”.


The Company Behind ihiveLIVE 

ihiveLIVE has been developed by Tri-Media Integrated Marketing Technologies, a world class marketing technology company with a business channel of advertising and marketing companies.  Tri-Media created the first virtual network in Canada, and has made Profit 200’s list of fastest growing companies seven times.

As the parent company, and major shareholder, Tri-Media provides ihiveLIVE with senior management leadership, corporate resources, and direct access to its advertising and client network to help ensure early success and initial adoption and trial usage. The company's existing and historical relationships with both global companies and advertisers will be utilized to gain entry and cultivate interest in ihiveLIVE.  

Tri-Media has invested in research and development, marketing and business development, and production for the design and build of the ihiveLIVE 1.0 technology platform, several betas and the future development of ihiveLIVE 2.0 .

The ihiveLIVE Team

We have assembled a team comprised of mature, experienced individuals and young bright minds to build and deliver the ihiveLIVE promise.  These professionals, many of them founders of successful technology companies and agencies, are uniquely qualified to deliver transformative ideas through modern agile methods, aimed at creating immediate, demonstrable and measurable value for ihiveLIVE. All of our team members are equally dedicated, talented and passionate about the vision we have for ihiveLIVE.  As we grow, and funding becomes available, we will hire additional personnel, capable of navigating resources and executing strategic goals and objectives on budget and on time. 

     


Giving You Control Over Advertisements

What ihiveLIVE offers both businesses and its` members is a better way to create personalized one to one relationships between buyers and sellers; and a better way to share the advertising revenue that is generated by virtue of our members’ participation.

If you are a business advertising in this manner on ihiveLIVE, you are indirectly helping support a variety of philanthropic causes — and being socially responsible.  Sounds like a real win win scenario for everyone!

Advertisers participate on the ihiveLIVE platform by providing specified ad types, which can be featured in various placements across the network. All ads are permission based and utilize the preferences of our members, which are managed by their individual profile settings.

With ihiveLIVE, members only receive offers from businesses with products and services that satisfy those preferences.  We are able to create direct marketing channels with affinity groups and their members that provide precise targeted opportunities for advertisers to connect with these interested audiences.

Where Social Media Meets Crowdfunding

ihiveLIVE offers an online experience where you control what advertising you want to see and where your privacy is respected.  Where you can participate in discussion-based communities, based upon those issues, topics, and groups that are most meaningful to you.  Where you can share funds you garner from advertising revenue, with those social causes you most care about, simply based upon your data and content.  Think about how that will empower thousands of people just like you to share and help others ... and make the world a better place.  Now imagine creating it together, starting with this crowdfunding campaign.


Lets Build This Together to Benefit Everyone!

And building it together does matter because social media is about the power of one, starting with you and me, multiplied by others just like us.  As we develop and grow ihiveLIVE we will reach out and ask you, our supporters, for your feedback, ideas and suggestions. Online communities built by communities for the benefit of everyone.


Please click on the following link to voice your opinion on ihiveLIVE 2.0.
http://goo.gl/forms/VVkuoCToXU

Imagine, developing a social media platform with the potential to create a network of interest-based communities where meaningful discussions occur, relationships are formed and revenue is generated for social causes, simply based on the daily activity of its members.  Imagine how we can make the world a better place, by caring and sharing.  Are you ready? 

You can get involved immediately by contributing to our campaign today!

Together we can make it happen!

               


QUESTIONS? We Have Your Answers

Email us at contact@ihiveLIVE.com

Q: What is an iHive? 
A: iHive is an unique online community specifically created for an organization or affinity group and its' members where they can communicate, collaborate and engage with one another and establish personalized connections and support common interests, goals and activities. Each iHive will have its own chosen causes that its members will generate revenue for and support.

Q.  I was about to select the ihiveLIVE perk " Pay it Forward -- for $50", but when I go through the Indiegogo contribution process I was given some other choices.  And now I would like to give $80?  Is this ok?

A.  That is great! Thank you. Indiegogo offers a lot of flexibility for contributors like you, and so you can elect to contribute the $80 amount you indicated.  Once you contribute you will receive an email from us, and after you vote for your cause(s) we will make sure that your voting power will be 8 times (8 x $10).  For more information on voting power, please see "Your Voting Power" on our campaign page, above.


If you have any other questions or would like specific information on ihiveLIVE, please contact us at contact@ihivelive.com
story_txt:
ihiveLIVE 2.0 - Work-in-progress  
At ihiveLIVE we’re creating a new social media platform that enables you to turn your online activity into funds for those people and causes that are most important to you. We do this in the following manner: 1.) Upon sign up you provide us with two types of information      
     a.) What products you regularly buy and want to receive advertising for, and;              b.) What are the causes you want to support. 






2.) We will then connect you with online, discussion-based communities where you can discuss those topics you are most passionate about.  Communities such as: 


University Student Bodies and Sororities/Fraternities
Cycling, Running, or other Sporting Organizations
Movie or Book Discussion Groups
Local Charitable and Faith-based Organizations


                                   
3.) Based upon the advertising revenue that is generated by your online activity  in our communities ( from the tailor-based ads that you receive), we will automatically share 20% of your revenue to the causes that you support and 20% directly to you, the user. Although the funds will initially be small, as a large collective of users come together, we can generate revenue that will have a huge social impact for those causes that each of us care about.






In a world where everyone wants to share and help others, but not everyone has the financial means or the time to spare, ihiveLIVE plays an important role.  We know that social media can become a powerful tool for social good by simply sharing revenue with users and those causes they believe in. And we believe there are millions of people, just like you, who share our view. 
Join our movement and help us make it happen!






ihiveLIVE 2.0 - Work-in-progress 





The Evolution of Social Media

After you make a contribution you will receive an email with a link to a page with a list of cause related organizations, from which you will vote for those organizations (as many as you’d like) that you would like to see ihiveLIVE support with a percentage of the funds that are raised. At the conclusion of our campaign, we will redirect 10% of all funds to the 5 organizations with the most votes received. 
After you contribute you will receive an email from us providing a list of charitable organizations to support (you can add organizations as well) There may be a short delay in receiving our email that allows you to vote. If so, please know we appreciate your patience greatly!

story:
Just..... I have decided not to HYPE or MANIPULATE the Campaign whatsoever. I detest these 2 words. The Campaign is an honorable one and will have to find itself in all the Crowdfunding noise out there or not. This 5 second attention span nonsense brought on by Social Media will not be engaged. The BABISA CARES Campaign is going to be Old School & it is not a gimmick - we are dealing with human beings here that are suffering. It's is a values based Campaign whereby we CARE for our fellow Citizens and want to help them to achieve a better life. This is a REAL Campaign whereby we extend a helping hand to lift people up again. I can easily post horrific pictures of the squalor South Africans are faced with every day in Squatter Camps, to evoke EMOTION from the visitors but I won't out of respect to the poor. Further...  I am having an obvious GEO-LOCATION issue here as the Campaign is not being picked up in the American or United Kingdom markets which is real bothersome, questionable & statistically IMPOSSIBLE. I am to engage a Statistician to prove that something is horribly wrong. All points to 3rd World discrimination stuff. I have poverty stricken little mouths to feed & will FIGHT for them untill the end. I still hope these markets can be unlocked for the sake of the Campaign & it has a late rush. I want to thank SAM HURWITZ for all the great work he is doing behind the scenes. Much appreciated Bud! 

MY CAMPAIGN.

Please join my BABISA CARES Campaign & Community that will bring about real change in the lives of so many now living in poverty due to rampant unemployment. It is time we give them back their DIGNITY by employing them in all the BABISA Coffee Express & Deli's that are to open over the next 100 years.

POVERTY SUCKS!

Hunger statistics in South Africa estimate that about 14 million South Africans wake up every day not knowing where their next morsel of food is coming from. Another 15 million are close to starvation every day! Just absolutely shocking figures. 

http://mg.co.za/article/2014-10-09-hungry-in-the-land-of-plenty

UNEMPOYMENT SUCKS!

Unemployment statistics in South Africa indicate that 1 out of 4 (25%) of workers capable of working are unemployed. These are the official Government statictics but we all believe the figure to be much higher. More shocking is the figure for Youth unemployment in South Africa that stands at 63%! WTF? These figures are for youth between the ages of 18 -25. They are the future of the Country? Again, just absolutely shocking figures.

http://www.biznews.com/thought-leaders/2015/07/29/sa-q2-unemployment-eases-to-25-but-63-1-of-youth-remain-jobless/

TIME FOR ACTION!

The present status quo is totally unacceptable and I refuse to look at it from the outside relying on others to come up with solutions which they are obviously not doing. I cannot stomach the poverty and suffering that is rife in the Country any longer. I am passionate and committed about the well-being of the Country and its peoples and want to play my part in restoring hope, dignity and a sense of worth to the unemployed. It has been 21 years since South Africa had it's 1st democratic elections whereby Nelson Mandela became the President -he must be turning in his grave given the situation and his love for especially the Youth.

WHAT NEEDS TO BE DONE?

JOBS JOBS JOBS need to be created and not just any jobs - well-paid SUSTAINABLE jobs for the unemployed as a priority.

HOW DO WE CREATE THESE JOBS?

By working SMARTER not HARDER, being CREATIVE, INNOVATIVE and finding a HORSE TO RIDE!

WHERE DO WE FIND THIS 'HORSE TO RIDE'?

It is ready, saddled up and at the starting gate, ready to bolt and it's name is BABISA - BORN AND BRED IN SOUTH AFRICA.

WHAT IS BABISA?

BABISA is my new Brand that I created and developed to become the Premium Lifestyle Brand from South Africa for the International market driven by a strong SOCIAL and MORAL responsibility built into its core DNA!. In a nutshell, BABISA will select products that South Africa can produce, BRAND them under BABISA and EXPORT them the World over into markets with the billions of Consumers. It is the establishment of a Lifestyle Brand of products, concept stores and services from the Territory of South Africa for Brand conscious consumers the World over the DISCOVER, ENJOY and LIVE. Basically, packaging ALL that's good from South Africa into the BABISA Brand.The potential for growth is truly enormous. and it is the best 'horse to ride' ever - there is no better. As the BABISA Brand establishes itself into the vast International Markets, more and more persons will need to be employed and these will be taken from the ranks of the unemployed. The BABISA Brand is ready to commence the roll-out! For more information on the BABISA Brand and its SCOPE, go visit - http://www.babisa.com 

HOW DO WE KICKSTART THE BABISA ROLL-OUT?

By opening the first BABISA Coffee Express & Deli in Cape Town South Africa. The methodology behind this is to create Meeting Point Cafe Stores the World over where people can come and enjoy what the Country offers in a hip environment. Essentially establishing " Little corners of South Africa" in a 1st World context, locking onto the enormous Coffee Culture that exists right around the World with a Diners, Drive-Inns and Dives yummy eats food offering adding a South African twist. All BABISA Coffee Express & Deli's will be VIBRANT places to meet up at.

WHAT IS THE BENEFIT OF STARTING WITH A BABISA COFFEE EXPRESS & DELI?

JOBS JOBS JOBS! Every Shop that opens will have the IMMEDIATE demand to employ a minimum of 10 persons to professionally run a BABISA Coffee Express & Deli. From this point onwards we will roll out shop no 2, 3 4, 5, 6...... and let it grow as big as humanly possible. New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Amsterdam, Madrid, Rome, Vienna, Moskow, Warsaw, Istanbul, Belgrade, Shanghai, Tokyo, Sydney, New Delhi, etc here we come! All these Stores will be staffed with UNEMPLOYED workers as a priority. Also, with every Store we open we create a Point of Presence to build out the Brand and give it visibility. More importantly, the day we open the Store, we start to generate INCOME and bank money - cash-flow stuff! :-) The more money we have, the more Stores we can open. All our BARRISTA'S will be trained by the best to truly EMPOWER them and give them a SKILL for life.

WHEN WILL THE 1ST BABISA COFFEE EXPRESS & DELI OPEN?

As soon soon there are sufficient funds received from Indiegogo Contributors but I project during end December 2015, latest. The BABISA Coffee Express & Deli shops will become huge successes. I cannot wait for the fist Store to open and start the EMPLOYMENT process, giving HOPE to those suffering. BABISA CARES, full-stop, and we want to extend a hand to those who feel destitute to lift them up & welcome them into the BABISA HOME to feel wanted, worthy and respected again.  The Principle I am to apply is the one of, "Give a man a fish and he has food for a day BUT teach him how to fish and he has food for a lifetime". People need to be empowered. We need to get people employed and BABISA will pay its part. Go view BABISA Coffee Express & Deli Shop No 1 on Facebook to get a feel for the planned Offerings.

THE PROJECTED AMOUNT OF JOBS THAT WILL BE CREATED BY BABISA.

I am confident to predict that atleast 10 000 jobs will created DIRECTLY by BABISA over the next 7 years and indirectly many many more. Take into account that every wage earner in South Africa supports and feeds 4 - 6 persons, additionally - this means the the Contributors will have enabled a POSITIVE SOCIAL IMPACT on the lives of 60 000 persons in South Africa alone. This is the enormity of the the contributions needed from all the Contributors, something to be truly PROUD of! Just remember also, that as the BABISA Brand establishes itself within the International Market, grows this market by adding more and more products /stores for EXPORT, more and more JOBS will be created. All these jobs will be quantifiable and a JOBS REPORT will be made available every year to all the Contributors to peruse the progress and track the impact of their contributions.

BABISA BRAND DONATION.

Additional to all the JOBS to be created, BABISA, as Brand, will commit itself to place 10% of all Contributions received from the Crowd Funders into a JOBS FUND. This amount raised  will then be be leveraged with Government and Business to make equal donations into the Jobs Fund which will allow me to create even more jobs. All monies going into the Jobs Fund will be quantifiable and a REPORT BACK will be done every year to keep all Contributors informed.

MY UNDERTAKING.

My undertaking to all the Indiegogo Contributers is a solemn one, which, I am willing to state here on a Public Forum such as INDIEGOGO with its 15 million visitors per month - HELP me get the BABISA CARES Campaign funded and I promise to EMPLOY only UNEMPLOYED persons, as a PRIOPRITY, the World over, starting in South Africa, the hub of the Brand. Helping the unemployed become EMPLOYED is a MISSION and CALLING for me.

IN CLOSING.

"Most Brands were started as an idea for making profit, which someone supported with capital. Subsequently the person or company with the idea acquired the other resources necessary to enable the idea to be developed into a sound and successful business."

Lets join forces and make MAGIC together.

BABISA is a LEGACY project for me whereby I want it's successful formula, duplicated by other South African parties which will INSPIRE them to do the same. BABISA stands ready to assist in providing a KNOWLEDGE TRANSFER to interested Parties, even in these early stages of roll-out. I want BABISA to stand up as a Role Model to others. Imagine another 1000 BABISA's out there creating JOBS for the unemployed and the IMPACT of this on the lives of persons who are now unemployed and mired in POVERTY. Together we are going to make a real difference to the lives of many! Let's go for it.

Let's start the BABISA journey by also getting the 1 MILLION PROJECT wristbands taken up also over time! Let's round up the Crowdfunding Community for the benefit of so many suffering in the World now. I am sure that HISTORY will judge our efforts as spectacular.

We all get to a point in our lives whereby we want our efforts to make a DIFFERENCE and by contributing to BABISA CARES, we as a COLLECTIVE will have a massive impact on the lives of many unemployed persons allowing them to recover their PRIDE and DIGNITY.

It is time to do good and bring SMILES back to unemployed persons who are suffering and who feel so unworthy because they cannot provide for their families.

Let's spread some HAPPINESS into the World.

I therefore ask all the readers of this Campaign to contribute by taking up the PERK or just making a Contribution. 

BABISA is a great cause to support!

Richard Branson is known to say, "If your dreams don't scare you, they are to small"! :-)

I thank you all for contributing.

With much GRATITUTE.

LOVE, PEACE and PROSPERITY to all.

Ciao.

Paul H Burger

* Please feel free to email me on any matter regarding BABISA. Many Opportunities exist.
