POVERTY SUCKS!
Hunger statistics in South Africa estimate that about 14 million South Africans wake up every day not knowing where their next morsel of food is coming from. Another 15 million are close to starvation every day! Just absolutely shocking figures. http://mg.co.za/article/2014-10-09-hungry-in-the-land-of-plenty

UNEMPOYMENT SUCKS!Unemployment statistics in South Africa indicate that 1 out of 4 (25%) of workers capable of working are unemployed. These are the official Government statictics but we all believe the figure to be much higher. More shocking is the figure for Youth unemployment in South Africa that stands at 63%! WTF? These figures are for youth between the ages of 18 -25. They are the future of the Country? Again, just absolutely shocking figures.http://www.biznews.com/thought-leaders/2015/07/29/sa-q2-unemployment-eases-to-25-but-63-1-of-youth-remain-jobless/TIME FOR ACTION!The present status quo is totally unacceptable and I refuse to look at it from the outside relying on others to come up with solutions which they are obviously not doing. I cannot stomach the poverty and suffering that is rife in the Country any longer. I am passionate and committed about the well-being of the Country and its peoples and want to play my part in restoring hope, dignity and a sense of worth to the unemployed. It has been 21 years since South Africa had it's 1st democratic elections whereby Nelson Mandela became the President -he must be turning in his grave given the situation and his love for especially the Youth.
WHAT NEEDS TO BE DONE?JOBS JOBS JOBS need to be created and not just any jobs - well-paid SUSTAINABLE jobs for the unemployed as a priority.HOW DO WE CREATE THESE JOBS?By working SMARTER not HARDER, being CREATIVE, INNOVATIVE and finding a HORSE TO RIDE!WHERE DO WE FIND THIS 'HORSE TO RIDE'?It is ready, saddled up and at the starting gate, ready to bolt and it's name is BABISA - BORN AND BRED IN SOUTH AFRICA.WHAT IS BABISA?BABISA is my new Brand that I created and developed to become the Premium Lifestyle Brand from South Africa for the International market driven by a strong SOCIAL and MORAL responsibility built into its core DNA!. In a nutshell, BABISA will select products that South Africa can produce, BRAND them under BABISA and EXPORT them the World over into markets with the billions of Consumers. It is the establishment of a Lifestyle Brand of products, concept stores and services from the Territory of South Africa for Brand conscious consumers the World over the DISCOVER, ENJOY and LIVE. Basically, packaging ALL that's good from South Africa into the BABISA Brand.The potential for growth is truly enormous. and it is the best 'horse to ride' ever - there is no better. As the BABISA Brand establishes itself into the vast International Markets, more and more persons will need to be employed and these will be taken from the ranks of the unemployed. The BABISA Brand is ready to commence the roll-out! For more information on the BABISA Brand and its SCOPE, go visit - http://www.babisa.com HOW DO WE KICKSTART THE BABISA ROLL-OUT?By opening the first BABISA Coffee Express & Deli in Cape Town South Africa. The methodology behind this is to create Meeting Point Cafe Stores the World over where people can come and enjoy what the Country offers in a hip environment. Essentially establishing " Little corners of South Africa" in a 1st World context, locking onto the enormous Coffee Culture that exists right around the World with a Diners, Drive-Inns and Dives yummy eats food offering adding a South African twist. All BABISA Coffee Express & Deli's will be VIBRANT places to meet up at.WHAT IS THE BENEFIT OF STARTING WITH A BABISA COFFEE EXPRESS & DELI?JOBS JOBS JOBS! Every Shop that opens will have the IMMEDIATE demand to employ a minimum of 10 persons to professionally run a BABISA Coffee Express & Deli. From this point onwards we will roll out shop no 2, 3 4, 5, 6...... and let it grow as big as humanly possible. New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Amsterdam, Madrid, Rome, Vienna, Moskow, Warsaw, Istanbul, Belgrade, Shanghai, Tokyo, Sydney, New Delhi, etc here we come! All these Stores will be staffed with UNEMPLOYED workers as a priority. Also, with every Store we open we create a Point of Presence to build out the Brand and give it visibility. More importantly, the day we open the Store, we start to generate INCOME and bank money - cash-flow stuff! :-) The more money we have, the more Stores we can open. All our BARRISTA'S will be trained by the best to truly EMPOWER them and give them a SKILL for life.WHEN WILL THE 1ST BABISA COFFEE EXPRESS & DELI OPEN?As soon soon there are sufficient funds received from Indiegogo Contributors but I project during end December 2015, latest. The BABISA Coffee Express & Deli shops will become huge successes. I cannot wait for the fist Store to open and start the EMPLOYMENT process, giving HOPE to those suffering. BABISA CARES, full-stop, and we want to extend a hand to those who feel destitute to lift them up & welcome them into the BABISA HOME to feel wanted, worthy and respected again.  The Principle I am to apply is the one of, "Give a man a fish and he has food for a day BUT teach him how to fish and he has food for a lifetime". People need to be empowered. We need to get people employed and BABISA will pay its part. Go view BABISA Coffee Express & Deli Shop No 1 on Facebook to get a feel for the planned Offerings.THE PROJECTED AMOUNT OF JOBS THAT WILL BE CREATED BY BABISA.I am confident to predict that atleast 10 000 jobs will created DIRECTLY by BABISA over the next 7 years and indirectly many many more. Take into account that every wage earner in South Africa supports and feeds 4 - 6 persons, additionally - this means the the Contributors will have enabled a POSITIVE SOCIAL IMPACT on the lives of 60 000 persons in South Africa alone. This is the enormity of the the contributions needed from all the Contributors, something to be truly PROUD of! Just remember also, that as the BABISA Brand establishes itself within the International Market, grows this market by adding more and more products /stores for EXPORT, more and more JOBS will be created. All these jobs will be quantifiable and a JOBS REPORT will be made available every year to all the Contributors to peruse the progress and track the impact of their contributions.BABISA BRAND DONATION.Additional to all the JOBS to be created, BABISA, as Brand, will commit itself to place 10% of all Contributions received from the Crowd Funders into a JOBS FUND. This amount raised  will then be be leveraged with Government and Business to make equal donations into the Jobs Fund which will allow me to create even more jobs. All monies going into the Jobs Fund will be quantifiable and a REPORT BACK will be done every year to keep all Contributors informed.
MY UNDERTAKING.My undertaking to all the Indiegogo Contributers is a solemn one, which, I am willing to state here on a Public Forum such as INDIEGOGO with its 15 million visitors per month - HELP me get the BABISA CARES Campaign funded and I promise to EMPLOY only UNEMPLOYED persons, as a PRIOPRITY, the World over, starting in South Africa, the hub of the Brand. Helping the unemployed become EMPLOYED is a MISSION and CALLING for me.IN CLOSING.
"Most Brands were started as an idea for making profit, which someone supported with capital. Subsequently the person or company with the idea acquired the other resources necessary to enable the idea to be developed into a sound and successful business."Lets join forces and make MAGIC together.BABISA is a LEGACY project for me whereby I want it's successful formula, duplicated by other South African parties which will INSPIRE them to do the same. BABISA stands ready to assist in providing a KNOWLEDGE TRANSFER to interested Parties, even in these early stages of roll-out. I want BABISA to stand up as a Role Model to others. Imagine another 1000 BABISA's out there creating JOBS for the unemployed and the IMPACT of this on the lives of persons who are now unemployed and mired in POVERTY. Together we are going to make a real difference to the lives of many! Let's go for it.Let's start the BABISA journey by also getting the 1 MILLION PROJECT wristbands taken up also over time! Let's round up the Crowdfunding Community for the benefit of so many suffering in the World now. I am sure that HISTORY will judge our efforts as spectacular.We all get to a point in our lives whereby we want our efforts to make a DIFFERENCE and by contributing to BABISA CARES, we as a COLLECTIVE will have a massive impact on the lives of many unemployed persons allowing them to recover their PRIDE and DIGNITY.It is time to do good and bring SMILES back to unemployed persons who are suffering and who feel so unworthy because they cannot provide for their families.Let's spread some HAPPINESS into the World.I therefore ask all the readers of this Campaign to contribute by taking up the PERK or just making a Contribution. BABISA is a great cause to support!Richard Branson is known to say, "If your dreams don't scare you, they are to small"! :-)I thank you all for contributing.With much GRATITUTE.LOVE, PEACE and PROSPERITY to all.Ciao.Paul H Burger* Please feel free to email me on any matter regarding BABISA. Many Opportunities exist.

story:
COPR Security Innovations

When thinking of security companies, we don’t tend to think of social change. Instead, we picture corporate behemoths that are solely focused on profit.  We at COPR Security are committed to changing that.

As the world’s first cause driven security company, we are on a mission to secure our nation’s most blighted neighborhoods, and do so by building a sustainable, cause-driven business model.

For us, that starts by offering the most innovative tech for home security and automation...


...and if you're a residential real estate investor, you know how frustrating dealing with vacant properties can be.  Theft. Vandalism. Squatters. Water Damage. The appliances you put in yesterday just 'walking away'. 

Good News: We understand what you're going through and we designed something JUST FOR YOU! 

Introducing the VP Smart Tower, a DIY security tower that can be easily dropped in any vacant property you're hoping to secure.  It will report directly to your smartphone and can even be battery operated! 

You can also upgrade your VP Smart Tower by adding components that will communicate with the tower and offer you additional features such as:

  • Ability to open garage doors from your smartphone
  • Smart deadbolt locks on your doors
  • Additional motion/door break sensors.

Here are the full specs:

                         





Fighting Blight Across America...

We've spent the past 18 months developing our unique system. After thousands of conversations with frustrated residential real estate investors we've developed a system specifically for those who need to easily secure and monitor vacant properties in their portfolio. 

We quickly realized that our technology would also be vital for community nonprofits fighting blight around the country...

The challenge for these non-profits is that they simply don't have the budget to afford these systems.  In partnership with community non-profits, like Habitat for Humanity Detroit and Manheim Park in Kansas City, we are combatting blight by donating systems and developing strategies to secure the vacant homes that drive it.

           

When a community starts experiencing high levels of vacant homes, it drives property values down, longtime residents out, and criminal activity in.  The VP SmartTower is a system unlike anything else on the market, designed to make it easy for investors and community development organizations to protect and monitor vacant properties.

Where Will The Funds Go? 

The money we raise will be used to help us fulfill our vision of being the world's first socially conscious security company, which includes:

  • Tooling and manufacturing of the VP SmartTower
  • Reducing our costs through large order quantities
  • Funding security systems and monitoring services for non-profit community development organizations
  • Provide our supporters with their security and automation systems, of course!

A successful campaign that hits our target of $100,000 will facilitate the production of the first line of VP SmartTowers, with $15,000 set aside for each of the non-profit partners - Habitat for Humanity Detroit and Manheim Park in Kansas City - to be paid out in in-kind donations of security equipment and monitoring services. 

What's In It For You?

We have perks set up for real estate investors looking to protect their vacant properties AND homeowners or renters looking for a wireless, DIY home security and automation system.

Bottom line: you'll get access to cutting edge technology at a steep discount, all while supporting community organizations as they restore communities around the country.

Real Estate Investors: We know that vacant properties are a constant challenge for you as you seek to grow your business. They are tough to secure and even harder to monitor. For supporting our campaign, you can get the Rehabber package or the VP SmartTower.  Either package will allow you to quickly secure vacant properties in your portfolio, monitor them from one simple online dashboard, and move the system from property to property as needed. Both can be battery operated.


Homeowners: In addition to helping us combat blight in cities around the country, you can also benefit from receiving the latest in DIY home security.  By supporting our campaign, you can turn your home into a smart home.  

We've built our system on security components used in millions of homes, so you can sleep well knowing that your home is protected by the best in the business.


     

Apartments/Rental Homes: Finding a security system as a renter can be challenging.  Most companies want to install a system and lock you into a contract. If you're a renter supporting our campaign, you'll receive a DIY system that will allow you to secure your rented home, monitor it from your smartphone, and take your equipment with you when you move.


The Platform

All COPR systems link with Alarm.com's award winning services and top rated mobile apps deliver a seamless user experience across a broad ecosystem of security, energy, video and automation services.

Since 2007, 2GIG has manufactured the most technologically advanced residential security and automation solutions in the industry and has become the leading control device for Z-Wave based systems.

                Professional Monitoring/Interactive Security & Automation

**All Indiegogo supporters will receive a $9/month discount for 1-year. That's right...support us now and we'll hook you up!

                                            Security & Automation Devices

What does it do?

An Image Sensor can be installed virtually anywhere when you set up your security system: by the front door, in a child's room, on your back porch, or anywhere you want to monitor. Once installed, it can send motion-triggered snapshots of activity to your smartphone. This is especially handy for those of you who travel frequently and want to make a visual check in of your home. 

It also gives you several ways to check in visually on your home or vacant properties, including: 
Peek in: get a picture from your Image Sensor on demand. 
Triggered alert: receive a picture when another device in your Smart Home is activated – for example, when someone disarms your security panel: a great way to confirm that that family members have arrived home.
Alarm event: in an intrusion or fire, the Image Sensor begins sending images automatically. Because it's connected wirelessly to the security panel, which runs on a back-up battery and a cellular connection, it can send images even when your electricity and phone line are down. 

Water damage can be one of the most costly events for a homeowner or renter. For these reasons, COPR Security can offer you small sensors that can be placed in the most sensitive areas of your home. The minute they detect a leak, you'll be notified via your smartphone so you can start fixing the problem right away.

For ultimate control, you can have our automatic shutoff valve installed on the water line coming into your home.  This device allows you to remotely turn the water on and off from your smartphone. When a leak is detected by the sensor Alarm.com will proactively shut the water off.  If you travel a lot, have a second home, or are an out-of-state investor, this solution is perfect for you.



COPR is dedicated to helping you turn your home into a smart home, which is why we offer a range of locks that can be programmed, locked, and unlocked via your smartphone. 

Smart access control lets you securely give access to trusted visitors, using unique four-digit codes. You can create a code for each of your kids, for your dog walker, or for a contractor who needs access to your house. In the contractor's case, you can add an expiry date so that the code stops working after the job is complete. 

As part of a smart security system, smart lights can deter thieves and vandals by making your home or vacant investment property look occupied even when nobody is there. As well as controlling them remotely, you can set realistic schedules that mimic real life, such as having the lights come on at sunset, or at slightly randomized times. You can also take advantage of motion sensors to turn front porch lights into motion-triggered security lighting.


Fire/smoke detectors are life safety devices. As such, signaling inside the house isn't always enough. If a homeowner is away from the house during an unexpected emergency, the home will be unprotected. Neighbors are put at risk if the fire spreads. 

Smart devices should automatically alert emergency services when they detect smoke or fire. With a Smart Home Security system powered by Alarm.com, professional monitoring and emergency response is a core service.  In addition, Interactive services make it possible to send alerts to anyone else who needs them, like the homeowner, neighbors and friends or family close by. A fire/smoke alarm that does not alert emergency services is limited in the safety it can provide.

 


COPR's smart thermostat will integrate with your security system so you can easily monitor and adjust home temperature from your smartphone.  The thermostat will also track information about what's going on inside and outside your home so you can get the perfect balance between energy savings and comfort. 

 


Our security cameras have access to context from the entire system. They'll know your arming status, door and window status. They'll know if your smart lock is open, and who opened it. 

This makes it far more discerning when it comes to alerting you about activity. If you really need a video alert every time your front door opens, you can still get one. But if you just want a single daily alert when your kids get home from school, your security system will filter out everything else. It has the intelligence to figure it out.


As part of a smart home, smart lights can deter burglars by making your home look occupied when you're not there. As well as controlling them remotely, you can set realistic schedules that mimic real life, such as having your lights come on at sunset, or at slightly randomized times.


Why are we on Indiegogo? 

Most companies wait to add a social mission until they're 'established'. That wasn't good enough for us at COPR.  We've seen firsthand the need for our system in America's most troubled communities, so we're committed to building a social entrepreneur's business from day one.

But we also know that we've got to deliver a revolutionary security solution that performs like no other.  We've built that and you can be one of the first to get it by contributing to this campaign.  We've also built a series of partnerships with community non-profits to ensure that we maximize our community impact.

There is no better platform than Indiegogo to bring this story to life and spread our message of community restoration. By contributing on Indiegogo, you don't just benefit from a security system - you become part of a movement that is dedicated to transforming communities across the US.

The Impact

We've created partnerships with non-profits, like Habitat for Humanity, that are on the front lines of fighting blight.  This campaign is about getting them a simple tool to secure vacant properties and stop the spread of blight.

Blight is a problem that affects all of us by destroying our cities from within. Nearly every American city has prosperous neighborhoods that are blocks away from the most blighted sections of town.  The opportunity gap between residents of vibrant neighborhoods versus those in blighted communities cannot be understated. Children of blight are far less likely to graduate high school, get good paying jobs, and lead healthy lives. They are far more likely to be impacted by crime, drugs, and poverty. This is an injustice that we can no longer stand for. Securing vacant properties to stop the spread of blight is an important piece of restoring America's communities. By supporting this campaign, you become a part of that solution.

The Property Manager Affiliate Package

Set your PM company apart and become an affiliate partner.  Provide your clients with the latest technology to protect their investments.  Only 20 available.  Includes a $100 equipment credit and 6 months free monitoring services so you can test this stuff out and show it off to your clients!


COPR Swag





Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t give financially to the campaign, there’s still a great deal you can do. Most importantly, you can help us spread the word.  We’ve made it simple with lots of sharing tools below, so click on those and help us restore communities across America.

FAQs

Email us your questions and we'll get back to you as soon as we can! 

info@coprsecurity.com

As the questions come in we'll update the campaign with our best answers.

story:
HERE ARE SOME OF THE PEOPLE YOU WILL BE HELPING BY SUPPORTING THE NSUK PROFESSIONAL LAUNDRY PROJECT:

SOME OF THE BENEFICIARIES STANDING TOGETHER WITH THE NSUK PROFESSIONAL LIMITED TEAM AS SHOWN BELOW

What You Get          

 

 

**FEATURED PERK: Passport bag

Keychain & Man's Wallet

Ladies Wallet

Kitchen Apron PLUS Bonus Oven Gloves

Handmade Table Mats

Inspirational Wall Display

Genuine African Apparel Bundle

 

Who Are We?

We are Nsuk Professional Laundry Limited. We will offer laundry and dry cleaning services on a subsistence level to our local community in the hopes of improving their lives! We ultimately hope to grow into a large scale company.

This company is important to us because we want to help the people in Uganda! They are our neighbors and community.  We plan on Nsuk becoming a company that helps the community grow better by providing a simple service, and aimed at obtaining decent shelter for the underprivileged people in Uganda.Your support could help save the life of a person in our community. 

 

What We Need

To help us achieve this human-centered goal, we need to raise $50,000. This is going to help us purchase land, hi-tech laundry equipment, service vehicles and which will allow us to make profits that will enable us construct decent shelter for the families in need. 

 

The Impact

Funding received through this campaign will allow continuity of the project once started. We will strive to make a big difference in the lives of people we can help! But it is a team effort to make it happen which is why we need your help.

Our team members have gained skills through offering Laundry services;

  • They have learned the organization of work
  • They have also learned to manage time when attending to clients
  • Our team has also learned to offer high quality laundry service to different fabric with maximum care.
  • We have had refresher courses with regard to offering laundry service.

We, the Nsuk Professional Laundry Limited team, promise the contributors that we are determined to offer high quality laundry services once we acquire the necessary Laundry machines for our project.

Then, once this project is off the ground and moving forward, we hope to archive our goal of constructing decent houses for our people in great need. 

SHOWN BELOW IS THE BUDGET BREAKDOWN OF NSUK PROFESSIONAL LAUNDRY LIMITED 

 

 

THE TOTAL COST OF THE NSUK LAUNDRY PROJECT = $50,000


NSUK Professional Laundry Ltd has designed a special program to construct 100 self-contained houses for the local people in the Namayumba - Wakiso District of Uganda. Each of the houses is expected to cost approximately $13,500.

The program is expected to last for 6 years.

Below is what is expected in a period of 6 years.

Houses

Time Taken

Cost (USD)

GRAND TOTAL

$ 1, 350,000


============================================================

Risks & Challenges

As with any undertaking of this magnitude, we expect to encounter risks and challenges along the way. This biggest challenge of course, is getting the project started. We may also encounter an imbalance in the value of the dollar and the shilling. We hope to overcome this by applying forces of supply and demand to counteract inflation.

We shall track daily incomes and expenditures following up every worker regardless of the worker’s positions in that way, our challenges shall be counteracted head on. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We believe that money is not everything we need to see our dream come true. So, any other form like advice is also greatly appreciated.

We humbly request that everyone who sees this campaign, please share it! Even if you can’t help us with a donation, but your heart wants to help, sharing our link with the online public, friends and partners is also a way of supporting us. Together we can do a great thing!

 

 

THE NSUK PROFESSIONAL LAUNDRY LIMITED TEAM AS SHOWN BELOW

 

THE NSUK PROFESSIONAL LAUNDRY LIMITED TEAM AS SHOWN BELOW

 

We are Nsuk Professional Laundry Limited - We offer laundry and dry cleaning services on a subsistence level but are vying to transform ourselves into a large scale company.
 

Nsuk professional laundry is important to us because we are a people meeting needs oriented company, aiming at obtaining decent shelter for the unprivileged populace in Uganda.

Any financial support and any other form of aid extended to us will have saved a life of a person in our community.

Once again, we thank you for your contribution that is making living and life of the human race better. 
 
PLEASE HELP MAKE IT HAPPEN

story:
The Basics

The CANNAROMA CANNAISSEUR COLLECTION (CCC) MARIJUANA SENSORY TRAINING KIT is the world’s first all-inclusive kit designed to educate everyone – experienced or not – on the flavors and aromas found within the vast array of cannabis strains available today. And since the kit contains NO CONTROLLED SUBSTANCES, you can educate yourself LEGALLY, regardless of whether you live in an area on the cutting edge of the cannabis revolution or some place lagging a bit behind.  Awaken your senses today so you are able to identify the various compounds that make up the flavor and fragrance of cannabis while understanding which are responsible for the similarities and differences amongst your favorite strains.

Interest in marijuana is booming. Four states and the District of Columbia have legalized recreational, adult-use cannabis in the United States. Twenty-three permit use for medical reasons. New states are voting on the issue every election cycle. And entire countries, such as Canada, are pursuing nationwide cannabis legalization. 

Gone are the days when marijuana users accept anything in a baggie.   Now people want to explore the nuanced flavors and aromas of different strains of cannabis. Like fine wine, cannabis has terroir, and many of the things done by a cultivator can be tasted in the final product.  Whether you’re an experienced budtender or simply intrigued by this growing movement, don’t be left out of everything marijuana has to offer! Learn how to appreciate cannabis the same way you enjoy your favorite wine or beer!

And speaking of not missing out, the first 500 Cannaroma Cannaisseur Collections have already completed production and ARE READY TO SHIP – a perfectly-scented companion to any holiday season!

What You Get

Each individual kit comes prepackaged with everything you need to educate yourself and others on all of the often overlooked but exciting subtleties inherent in the cannabis experience:

  • 10 Liquid Smell Vials – in emerald green glass
  • 50 Specially-Designed Smell Strips – for optimal aroma evaluation
  • 10 Vapor Taste Cartridges – 9 individual terpenes and 1 strain blend
  • 1 Rechargeable “510” Battery and USB Charging Connector – compatible with many other types of cartridges, if you so choose
  • 9 Instructional Cannabis Terpene-Botanical Photo Cards
  • The Cannaisseur Companion – your guide to what’s in the box and beyond

Each CCC is intended for repeated usage – as many as 100+ times! Break out the Cannaroma Cannaisseur Collection at your next dinner party or while playing board games with your friends.  You can even host your own cannabis meducation event. You’ll be able to surround yourself with fellow Cannaisseurs in no time!

What You Will Learn

  • Identify the compounds that make-up the flavor and fragrance of cannabis
  • Understand the language used to describe flavors and fragrances while creating your own, individualize linguistic palette
  • Use this knowledge to accurately describe the flavor/fragrance of cannabis strains and other botanicals
  • Help you create a sensory understanding of the similarities and differences of different strains and perhaps map those to different physiological effects

Going Deeper

The Cannaroma Team has been analyzing cannabis strains for over five years and is composed of a collection of Ph.D. and Master’s chemists with experience that extends back decades into the Dutch medical cannabis system.  Sure, we could have spent our time designing new pharmaceuticals or developing food additives, but instead we focused on what we loved to do—analyzing cannabis.  And now we get to share our hard won knowledge and understanding with the world.  Bettering one’s self never tasted, felt, and smelt so good!

In the process of determining what makes each strain unique, we have begun to understand what aroma and flavor components are critical for flavor recognition and training.  That’s why this collection of aroma and flavor compounds is balanced between monoterpenes and sesquiterpenes as well as monoterpenoids and sesquiterpenoids. 

                                                       The Cannaroma Lab

The physical properties of each compound impacts whether you detect its scent quickly or it blooms slowly.  Whether the taste lingers or is ephemeral like a flitting tongue-butterfly.  High, sharp notes and low, smooth notes.  Often these properties are common among subclasses of compounds.  In drug-discovery research, scientists often discuss structure-activity relationships (SAR).  This is a way of connecting the physical structure of molecules with the effects those compounds produce on the body.  Now the next time your Big Pharma friend is talking about SAR, you can say “yea, I know what that tastes like” and she will be so surprised she won’t know what to say! 

Nowadays, marijuana has far more potential than just getting you stoned. And although we always have problems pronouncing "sommelier" ourselves, we know there is a budding number of aspiring cannabis experts interested in anointing themselves as “Cannaisseurs.”  At the same time, there are those that do not have access to cannabis that want to know what the fuss is all about. Whatever your inspiration, this is your chance to train your nose to pick out individual compounds produced by the cannabis plant and to recognize them in your favorite strain.  Or to sniff out what’s in that stuff of unknown provenance that your neighbor brings to your next dinner party.  

In supporting this project, you will not only be supporting the creation of the first ever cannabis sensory training and education program, but you will also be helping to advance our mission at Cannaroma to understand the physiological effects that the terpenes found in cannabis possess.  We plan to get to the bottom of the so-called "Entourage Effects."  The better we understand Entourage Effects the better humans will be able to unlock the medical promise of cannabis.  All of this same understanding can be further distilled into larger and more diverse sensory training kits.  And in the process, if we attract other like-minded individuals to the Cannaroma Entourage, we'll be pleased to share the joy of appreciating! 

Risks & Challenges

Since the Cannaroma Cannaisseur Collection is already through the manufacturing stage, the greatest challenges have already been tackled: choosing which terpenes to include and how to present them. In the future, we hope to utilize customer feedback and increased research to refine and expand these offerings.

Additionally, although acceptance of marijuana is increasing, we realize that we may face some resistance from those who are still uncomfortable with the legality of the subject. That’s why we have taken every step to ensure that the Cannaisseur Collection contains NO ILLEGAL SUBSTANCES and is LEGAL THROUGHOUT THE UNITED STATES.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you’re not in a position to donate now, don't fret.  Here’s what you can do:

  • Share our IndieGoGo campaign and YouTube channel with others:          
  • Check out Cannaroma.com
  • Inject the word “terpenes” and phrase “entourage effects” into every conversation that you have:-)
  • Support cannabis research and scientists' ability to conduct cannabis research where you live!


Frequently Asked Questions

1. Does this product contain cannabis?

There is no cannabis in Cannaroma products, so Cannaroma is 100% legal in all states and countries. 

2.  What is a Cannaisseur? 

We define a “Cannaisseur” as a cannabis enthusiast with an appetite for learning! This term was inspired by the word "Connoisseur," which means “an expert judge in matters of taste” and usually refers to wine, food, or fragrance appreciation. 

3.  Who would enjoy the Cannaroma Cannaisseur Collection?

· Cannabis enthusiasts of all experience levels

· Budtenders

· Retail shop owners

· Growers

· Processors

· Medical patients

· Medical professionals

· Science professionals

· Wine and beer lovers

· People looking to enter the cannabis industry

· Anyone looking to enhance their sense of smell and taste

4.  What is the age requirement to purchase?

Technically, we cannot prevent anyone from purchasing this kit since there are no controlled substances included.  However, we do recommend that those under the age of 21 purchase and use with the guidance of someone that knows what a “doobie” is so that the recommended safety precautions are taken.  See FAQ 9, 10, & 11.

5.  What is the purpose of the Cannaroma Cannaisseur Collection (CCC)?

The purpose of the CCC is to help you test, train and refine your cannabis palate! By studying the individual terpenes first-hand, you’ll expand your awareness and appreciation of cannabis and the wonderfully wide world of terpenes.

The CCC will also help you recognize both the similarities and differences between strains and help you learn how to describe fragrances and flavors using both existing scientific terminology and language you help create.

6.  Can the CCC be used as a game?

Some of the strongest memory associations we can make are to odors. Have you ever smelled something that took you right back to a very specific time and place in the past?

If you're enjoying the CCC alone or keeping it low-key with a group of close friends, smell a vial or taste a cartridge and, without peeking, try to visualize what plants or foods you would find the terpene in.  Then check your guesses against the instructional booklet. Some starter questions for a group discussion:

·  How does this make you feel?

·  What does it remind you of?

·  Can you guess what plant it might come from?

·  What does it make you visualize?

·  What about the taste cartridge? Does it taste different than it smells?

For a more formal group or an employee meeting, you can use one or more of the same discussion questions. You can also cover the labels and do a blind smelling contest! Discuss each of the terpenes first using the booklet, then have each person sniff and/or taste and write down on a notecard which terpene they think it is. Compare answers at the end.

If your goal is self-education, try creating flash cards for yourself! Write the name of the terpene on one side of an index card, and the description of the terpene (ours or yours!) on the back-side. Quiz yourself or enlist the help of a friend.

7. Can you invent a your own game to play with this kit?

Please do!  And if you come-up with something that you think is worth sharing, email us at games@cannaroma.com.

8. Where can I buy the CCC?

The CCC is currently only available for support and pre-order exclusively through IndieGoGo.  Please check cannaroma.com in the future for other post-campaign purchasing options.

9.  What are terpenes? 

Terpenes (and terpenoids) are the primary constituents of the essential oils of all botanicals and are often responsible for the characteristic fragrance of those plants, such as lemon and pine.  Terpenes are literally found everywhere in the plant world and not just in cannabis.

*WARNING* Pure terpenes are also flammable, much like an essential oil or perfume, so you should take care to keep liquid terpenes away from sources of heat or flame.  

10.  What happens if I accidentally ingest terpenes or get some on my skin?

High-purity, food-grade terpenes will not cause harm if ingested in small quantities.  However, keep in mind that terpenes are typically present in cannabis and other foods in very small quantities.  Large quantities of terpenes in concentrated form can prove quite objectionable to the senses!

If you spill terpenes on your skin, rinse thoroughly under fresh water and wash with soap.  Be very careful not to get liquid terpenes in your eyes, since terpenes do not like the eyes.  If you want to be like us in the Cannaroma Lab, you can even wear lab safety glasses when handling terpenes! 

11.  Can I eat the terpenes or mix them in my cannabis product? 

Although containing only “food grade” terpenes, the CCC is designed for you to smell and taste, but not eat or drink. Please only use the kit as directed. 



Thank You

Enjoy your cannabis, World!

your skin, rinse thoroughly under fresh water and wash with soap.  Be very careful not to get liquid terpenes in
your eyes, since terpenes do not like the eyes. 
If you want to be like us in the Cannaroma Lab, you can even wear lab
safety glasses when handling terpenes! 11. 
Can
I eat the terpenes or mix them in my cannabis product? 
Although containing only “food
grade” terpenes, the CCC is designed for you to smell and taste, but not
eat or drink. Please only use the kit as directed. 



Thank YouEnjoy your cannabis, World!

story:
Our Story:

Hello, and thank you for taking the time to read about my crowdfund campaign! My name is Colette. I am a mother and an entrepreneur who enjoys helping others and working towards the greater good. As someone who grew up with limited means, I understand more than most what it feels like to struggle to take care of your family, put food on the table, and provide for their basic needs. I know there are people out there who just need that one chance, just one small break, to get them back on their feet, and perhaps help others at the same time.

My new website (cocodeau.com) provides a place to purchase meaningful, original, and unusual items, perfect for as a gift for friends and family. I purposely seek out items to sell from local communities, and individuals who are in need of a little extra financial support in exchange for their goods and services. I strongly believe that putting money and time into local communities who are struggling, and in this way giving people a way to earn money for their families, helps bring people out of poverty and pull communities back together.

Our First Project -- Ghana:

Our first project will be to connect with a community in Ghana, which is located on the coast of West Africa, and work with them to sell arts, crafts, and other handmade items made by individuals in the community. Living in an area where a large population of children are in desperate need of care, we know there are many who are abandoned by their families for the simple fact that they can no longer afford to feed them. Those families who are still managing to stay together are struggling, and looking to find a way to make ends meet in a stalled economy.

Impact:

Our ultimate goal, and the reason we have created this crowdfund campaign project is to raise the money to be able to purchase a facility in their area to create a community center for the people in this community. We want to provide for them a safe, well-lit, clean area where they can ply their trades as steady employment, while also providing their families educational and medical resources that are sorely lacking in this area. 

On the other side of the world, this project would also provide employment to people locally in North America, as we would need to hire salespeople, warehouse workers, and more, providing more opportunities to earn a stable income in our own communities back home, in Alberta Canada, with the option to expand as our business grows over the course of the next year.

We are also in the process of talking with First Nation’s communities as well as others locally in Canada, to help their already established community centers add ways for their people to earn an income while providing us with unique, handmade goods that can be sold on our website.

What We Need:

Before we can help the people of Ghana, we first need to bolster our business here in Canada. The funding will be used for the following:

●  longterm lease or purchase of a warehouse location in Alberta, Canda

●  purchase of space and basic equipment for the first project facility in Ghana, in the Volta Region

●   hiring of staff, enabling some of the people to start earning a decent wage right away

●  marketing costs

Your donations will go a long way towards providing a meaningful income for hundreds of people, both here at home, and across the globe in Ghana! Please take a moment and donate to our campaign today!

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you can’t make a donation at this time, there are still ways you can help! Please take a few moments to share our campaign information with your friends and family, via social media, email, or word of mouth!

Thank you in advance for your support and generous donations!

story:
Cascina Ghila

"There is no doubt that our current living patterns are unsustainable, or that we must find new ways of supporting ourselves which place a lighter load on our enviroment. As individuals we are responsible for our own actions and are free to make informed choices about how we live. Faced with an uncertain future it is tempting to turn a blind eye and hope things will somehow "turn it alright". If there was ever a time for positive action, it is surely now. The question is: Do you want to be part of the problem, or part of the solution?"
from The Earth Care Manual - Patrick Whitefield


Cascina Ghila is a place where people can come and try living a different kind of life and a new kind of community.
It is on two hectare piece of land in the Alps in the north-west of Italy which I bought in December 2014 and where I have been living live since March 2016.
With this campaign, my main goals are to get enough funding to start the first projects on the land and to prepare the guestrooms. So, among the many perks there is the possibility to be hosted here for a while in order to learn more about permaculture and this sustainable way of life.


Why Permaculture


Permaculture is a framework for creating sustainable ways of living, a method for developing ecological, efficient and productive systems that can be used by anyone, anywhere.


Main projects


There are a lot of projects going on, all based on permaculture principles, including:

  • An orchard of 150 fruit trees
  • A vegetable garden
  • Two greenhouses
  • Compost toilet and solar showers
  • Two water tanks
  • A chicken coop


Who am I


A retired engineer, in love with nature and fed up with the busy life of the city, I decided to look for a way to live my life differently. It was in 2013 when I discovered permaculture for the first time and I started studying it avidly, and soon realized this was something I had to do. I did my PDC course and started looking for a piece of land where I could put what I have learnt so far into practice and share with other people .

story:
A few words about the app and its purpose:

We are all guilty of wasting too much time on things we don't really need. CostLog is trying to change one of these things by shifting primary focus to what is the most important aspect of your finances - your future! Unlike apps that analyze historical data and show users what they have been spending their money on, CostLog helps predict the future and make you a better "budgeteer".

 

With the super easy 3-step setup, you will gain more financial confidence in minutes: just input your income along with your current balance, add fixed and any anticipated expenses and voila! A graph of your future account balance is live and ready.

 

Automation of daily balance updates and forecasts ensures you are always on track and in control of your budget. Adjusting your present balance or any of the forecast entries is as simple as tap & type, but the impact on your budget is visible instantly, giving you the most accurate numbers to reflect on.

The visual forecast can be easily switched between the next 90-day period or the entire upcoming year. Either way, "zooming in" on any specific date takes just a single touch & drag on the graph, showing you a prediction of how much money you will have at any given date in the future.

Two levels of warnings are instantly visible for when your account balance could go below your custom threshold or dip below the dreadful zero. This feature makes planning for expenses like a family vacation or splurging on a big purchase easy. It takes out the uncertainty of affordability and addresses the impact on your future budget.

 

CostLog has been making personal finances and household budgeting simpler and less frustrating already. Here are a few unsolicited words from its users...

 

Testimonials

"Up until using CostLog, I had tried and purchased several budgeting apps, and believe me, you sell yourself short when comparing CostLog to Mint (or other money apps) as CostLog is by far a better product."~ Shane
"Most personal finance apps focus on the past or the present of your finances. This takes a unique approach to focus on the future and the forecast of your money. Great idea!" ~ Justin
"Good way to see your budget and where your money goes."
~ SozzySoz
"I like the app and I have made decisions based on forecasts which have really helped me to maneuver things and plan expenses better." ~ Amy

Everyone deserves a peace of mind when it comes to their finances and the meticulous task of balancing the budget. People should not have to guess whether they can afford certain purchases without jeopardizing their financial situation. 

CostLog achieves these outcomes in a snap and our goal is to continue improving the app and making it available to users all around the world! 

 

What We Need & What You Get

As you can imagine the app being free does not mean it's without costs. We have vested interest in its success going forward - not only for personal reasons anymore, but for all the people that can benefit from it as you can see from the testimonials.

You can already get the app if you have an iOS8+ device and we plan to maintain it. What we'll provide additionally are new suitable features, improved UI experience, but mainly we'd like to add more platforms (Android, Windows, Web) and more languages + maybe some additional themes including accessibility options. We also need to do a bit of marketing to spread the word some more esp. where needed.

So that is where we are counting on your support - the more funding we can obtain, the greater the impact can become!

 

The Impact

Imagine if everyone knew their financial outlook a year in advance. Don't you think that alone could help change the world?

  • Improved financial confidence 
  • Lowered chances of insolvency
  • Less time balancing checkbooks, more time for what's important
  • Greater peace of mind and less stress 
    Test out the existing app for yourself and see the impact it is making already!
     

    Risks & Challenges

    We have a successful track record with similar projects in the corporate world, so we feel confident to deliver results quickly. Unfortunately we also have limited resources which is currently our biggest hurdle. Fortunately, we are good at planning (and if CostLog itself isn't the proof of that, we're not sure what is) so with the funds from this campaign, we can get some additional help. Essentially, by funding this campaign you will be providing for new jobs :-)
      

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We understand some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

    • If you have an iOS device, find CostLog on the App Store and see how easy it is to keep track of your finances for yourself!
    • Feedback is everything to us, so please comment, Tweet, engage on Facebook or just email us at costlog@qapps.co with your ideas and suggestions.
    • Ask your folks to get the word out and make some noise about CostLog and this campaign.
    • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!

     

    And that's all there is to it, let's change how people perceive their money and plan for a better future for us all!

    "Money is not a goal in life, it's nothing more than one of the means for achieving many different goals on our relentless path to maintain happiness" ~ CostLog Team

story:
Save Our Roxx!

As hard as it may seem to believe the largest publicly traded oil and gas company on the planet is concerned that an ignorant public might harm themselves by accidentally consuming ExxonMobil gas instead of Roxx Vodka solely because of the "XXs". In addition this behemoth of more than 83,000 employees with countless billions of dollars is afraid that a start up company of two people selling a new ultra premium Polish vodka in two states will somehow dilute their trademark and cause them "irreparable harm." Given events of the past and the apparent prevailing opinion held by the public regarding Exxon this would be a hysterical position for them to take if in doing so they weren't trying to harm a small business.
Roxx Vodka is the first product offered by Phoenix based Nielsen Spirits, Inc. founded by Angela Nielsen and her partner Bill Ferguson of Los Angeles. Roxx is one of, if not the only ultra-premium vodka created by blending 4 grains (rye, wheat, barley and triticale), Although only being launched about a year ago it has already found a loyal and growing following in Phoenix and Los Angeles. Nielsen's mission statement is to create a responsible company that hopes to provide quality products and position themselves to give back to their community.
After filing for a trademark Nielsen was contacted in September of 2013 by Exxon's counsel claiming that the proposed Roxx logo infringed on the Exxon logo. After more than a year of going back and forth and offering alternative designs that were each rejected by Exxon as still giving an "inference of and impression of a likelihood of confusion" Exxon initiated an action with the United States Patent and Trademark Office. During this time Exxon was also actively involved in litigation with Fox Entertainment over their new network Foxx. That matter was settled confidentially on the eve of trial and there doesn't appear any significant change in the Fox logo. Fox, being a reasonable and fair minded company entered into a mutual consent agreement with Nielsen so that neither would ever treat the other the way that Exxon has and is treating them both.
Realizing that litigation was eminent, Nielsen's partner, an attorney in CA requested that any litigation please be filed in either AZ or CA since those are the only two states where Roxx is presently sold. Exxon's response was to file a lawsuit in Federal Court in the Southern District of Florida in Miami citing a single event in which Roxx had provided some promotional bottles as their reason for selecting Miami. The real reason is Exxon hoped that a company of two people would not be able to respond and defend themselves thousands of miles away from home. Exxon could sue anyone anywhere and if their true motivation was solely to defend their mark against a legitimate infringement then they would have elected to have done so where Roxx could more easily respond.
In its complaint Exxon actually takes the position that because of the alleged similarity of the marks that the general public is at risk as the Roxx's mark presents a possible health risk. It is odd that anyone would keep gas behind a bar and it is certain that if any person connected with Exxon in any capacity was presented with two shot glasses, one containing 91 octane and the other Roxx Vodka that anyone would mistakenly drink the Exxon product.
CAMPAIGN GOALS
As a result of Exxon's filing of a lawsuit in Florida Nielsen needs to raise funds to defend itself against this giant. The goal is $50K which Nielsen Spirits conservatively hopes and believes will cover close to half of the anticipated fees and costs. How does David fight Goliath in 2015? David brings the village with him to the fight. That is what Nielsen is hoping to do with this campaign. Companies like Exxon shouldn't be able and allowed to trample on smaller companies simply because they can. While this is personal to Nielsen Spirits we see this as addressing a larger issue and hope that with the public's help we can send a message to big business that the days of being able to roll over anyone they want simply because of their size and not the merit of their position is over. If successful we know that this campaign will garner a tremendous amount of publicity and will serve to make companies like ExxonMobil think twice before picking on the next "little guy."

Other Ways You Can Help

For those people that are either unable or unwilling to donate to our defense against Exxon we hope that you can still take to social media and voice your opposition to these bullying practices and help us get our story out. This is truly an opportunity for social media to flex and demonstrate yet another muscle to effect change. Thank you for your time in reading this and we hope to hear from you soon.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.

  • Stema Women Development Group was a registered as a non-partisan and non-profit making local women’s human rights community-based organization, with a focus on gender equality and women’s empowerment not only as human rights, but also because they are a pathway to achieving the Millennium Development Goals and sustainable development. The organization was established in the year 2004 as a result of a workshop organized by Feredaration of women lawyers- Kenya chapter (FIDA) that sought to strengthen the networking capacities of women organizations and groups in Kenya. At this particular workshop, violence against women was identified as a serious women rights violation that needed concerted efforts to address.

  • Mission:- To ensure that women have a real voice in all governance institutions, from the judiciary to the civil service, as well as in the private sector and women organizations/groups and movements, so they can participate equally with men in public dialogue and decision-making and influence the decisions that will determine the future of their families and communities.

  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • - The organization will use social impact entrepreneurship as a tool to sell condoms and other contraceptives and provide reproductive health and family planning services, through innovative marketing and distribution channels, including the Internet, social media sites, midwives, clinics, drug and grocery stores, and
  • - Because it will enable the organization to train the FGM escapees/girls on social entrepreneurship through a highly structured committed process designed to embed skills and motivate them to give sufficiently to the improvement of their lifestyles.

  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.
  • - Will help us achieve the social entrepreneurship and information communication technologies in the community through a highly structured committed process designed to embed skills and motivate them to give sufficiently to the improvement of their lifestyles and that of the extended communities.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

- Yes.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • 1. The much funding we need as an organization is $ 4,950,000,
  • 2. This amount of money/funding will go to:-
  • a). Project designing/developing/planning = $ 25,000
  • b). Procurement of the I. E. C. Materials = 1,200,000,
  • c). Implementation = $ 2,800,000,
  • d). Monitoring and Evaluation = $ 400,000,
  • e). Documentation = $ 50,000,
  • f). Report Writing and subsequent submission to the donors = $ 15,000, and
  • g). 10% Constituencies = $ 450,000.
  •  
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • - We would like them to know that once we shall be through with the project, we shall give/send over to them project training materials such as:- 1. T-Shirt conveying the project messages, 2. Training Cap, 3. Still Pictures, 4. DVDs, 5. a report on the same.
  •  
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.
  • The funds will go to the training of the FGM Escapees/Girls on social entrepreneurship through a highly structured commitment process designed to embed skills and motivate them to give sufficiently to the improvement of their lifestyles.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know how the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • It will be valuable because, it will re-look at the cultural stereotypes of intelligence in men and women, showing the gender inequality in self-presentation and rate their technological skills in activities such as basic computer functions and online participatory communication which is lower than their male counterpart, which will improve on their high education levels and social integration significantly in the productivity of all members of the household and improve equity throughout society.

  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • For the last 11 (Eleven) years, Stema Women Development Group has focused on the maxim of coordinating grassroots efforts to integrate gender equality and women’s empowerment into poverty reduction, democratic governance, crisis prevention and recovery, and environment and sustainable development through its local network that works to ensure that women have a real voice in all governance institutions, from the judiciary to the civil service, as well as in the private sector and women organizations/groups and movements, so they can participate equally with men in public dialogue and decision-making and influence the decisions that will determine the future of their families and communities.

  • Make it real for people and build trust.
  • - It is very real and can attest to, if asked to.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

The common obstacles we anticipate of may be:-

- 1. Getting or looking for too much information,

2. Having no clear action plan,

3. Shortage of time, money, or other resources,

4. Having Mindset and attitude, and

5. Lack of support or guidance.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • - Picking on one project to study and go with that model,
  • need to have a clear action plan right from the beginning to the end without applying any guesswork ideology/methodology,
  • before setting out on our goal, we shall figure out the amount of time we will need to put into this, the costs we will incur, and the resources we will need to obtain and use,
  • adopting the mindset of success by thinking and speaking positively and adopting the attitude of success by seeing obstacles as opportunities and setbacks as feedback, and
  • finding a mentor, coach, teacher, friend, joint venture partner, anyone who will hold your hand, guide you, support you until you reach your goal.

  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.
  • By recognizing and overcoming the common pitfalls associated with growth/success is essential if our business/project is to continue to grow and thrive. Crucially, we shall need to ensure that the steps we take today don't themselves create additional problems for the future, thus effective leadership will help us make the most of the opportunities, creating sustainable growth for the future of the project. (In a nutshell, we shall keep up with the market, planning ahead, cash flow and financial management, problem solving, the right systems, skills and attitudes and welcoming change).


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • We humbly make our passionate appeal to our online friends to not necessarily make/help/donate funding, but also to make much noise to those who might not be knowledgeable of this campaign to do something towards this noble project that is meant to help out the Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) Escapees make a meaningful lifestyles.

  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • And lastly don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools for easy accomplishments of this campaign. God bless you all.

And that's all there is to it.

sustainable development. The

organized by Feredaration of women lawyers- Kenya chapter (FIDA) that sought to
strengthen the networking capacities of women organizations and groups in
Kenya. At this particular workshop, violence against women was identified as a
serious women rights violation that needed concerted efforts to address.

judiciary to the civil service, as well as in the private sector and women

determine the future of their families and communities.

story:
Brooklin Bakehouse

My name is Janine Reesor and I am the owner/operator of Brooklin Bakehouse, a small boutique bakery and the only "baked from scratch" bakery in the village of Brooklin, Ontario.
I have been working in the food industry over 10 years and have finally had fruition of my dream---to open my own bakery. I studied Baking and Pastry Arts with George Brown College and have obtained my Red Seal certification in baking in addition to my Pastry Chef certification. 
I am currently renting a small corner of an operational restaurant and am looking to expand to an independent space. The current space I would like to obtain is located in Brooklin in a premium building set to complete construction January 2016. The building will house 3 floors of medical and business offices, the main floor having space for two food related businesses. The bakery will be located on the main floor with an immediate entrance from the parking lot into the building. The building also houses a board room which is available for booking to all tenants.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding I need is $6000.00 which will be my 10% down payment for my small business loan.  The funding will be used to help purchase bakery equipment and build out the bakery as follows:

Convection Oven (1) + Exhaust ventilation
Bread proofer (1)
Hobart mixer 20 quart (1)
Fridge (1) + Freezer (1)
Bun rack (1)
Wood prep table (1)
Refrigerated display case (1)
Non-refrigerated display case (1)
Bread display (1)
Double commercial sink (1)
Toilet (1)
Hand sinks (2)
Washroom construction (1)
Drywall construction for one wall  approximately 12 feet and 2 doors.
6 round patron tables with 24 chairs

Perks for your generosity range from Pie of the Month Club membership, catered in-house board meetings and special selection pastries to name a few..

The Impact

The impact your donation will have on the Brooklin Bakehouse is it will allow for the much needed expansion of space and menu, will allow for extended hours, community events, business meetings bookings, and storage of perishable goods for donation to The Denise House, Emergency Shelter for Abused Women and Their Children in Oshawa, Ontario.

The Denise House

The Brooklin Bakehouse is a proven concept in that the community has fully expressed excitement, support and enthusiasm for the bakery. With many new and returning customers the profitability of the bakery continues to rise and an expansion is needed to keep up with demand. Expansion will mean more local jobs and less commuting for families.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Use the Indiegogo share tool
  • Get the word out---TELL AND SHARE THIS WITH EVERYONE YOU KNOW!!
  • Share on Facebook, Twitter and any other social media platform you can think of......Thank You!!!!

story:
Grow Easy,Grow Green! Go Chillio!

Have you ever experienced the feeling of having an idea, but being afraid that it won‘t be good enough for others? Well, this is one of those.

There are people who have always tried to plant their own plants but have never succeeded! My wife is one of them and me as a good husband have always helped her with my ideas.

So here is one such idea which is inspired by none other than my wife, I call it Chillio! 

Imagine a device which will help you to grow everything in your home itself.

Herbs to savor your favourite dishes, those Extra hot Chillies for your friends, or any other plants which you like. 


Chillio gives you the power to control the growth of your plant. You can choose the exact amount of humidity, suitable temperature, amount of light and it's color tone,  in different scenarios. Chillio is precise to such an extent that you can even check how your plant breathes oxygen and exhales co2.

What More? All this can be controlled using your smartphone or your web browser thru it's own social network!


Chillio will water your plant and will add the exact amount of fertilizer if needed. It will automatically adjust light, humidity and temperature too.

It will check the real-time growth of your plant as well as give you the access to camera and sensors, so you can check it from anywhere in the world. 

After all this thoughtful work, once you have developed your own plant, you can share your success story with other users on a private Chillio social network.



Chillio Versions

Chillio will be made in 3 Different versions. People have different needs. Everybody can choose size and functions what he needs. If you know you only need to plant small herbs, you can select smallest version with less functions on it. 
And what about a price? So first estimations of prototype costs about 150$ to 300$ according to version. Now it's up to us to low this prices as possible. 



And that's it.

I have an idea, a working plan, and passion for doing it. Until now, I have developed everything single-handedly. I very well know that nobody can do everything alone.

And that’s why I need you.

With your support, we can make Chillio a perfect product which can be further delivered to its happy customers.Chillio can be helpful for schools, research labs and everywhere else where people find it difficult to grow plants due to environmental conditions/other issues.

I need your support also to get a feedback. What do you think about it? Do you have an idea how it could be better? Something what can be done better? 

Please.. Let me know.. 

Write me, Call me, or even meet me. So we can make a Chillio not only a toy for few geeks but also a useful device for the household..

story:
Swopinfo? Think newspapers, telephone books, magazines, pamphlets, business cards, and websites. What do they all have in common? They are becoming obsolete. Print media is losing its strength and consumers are no longer looking to find information. They want the information to come to them without them having to think about it.

So What is Swopinfo? Registering on the Swopinfo platform gives the business/individual a password protected profile that allows users to upload information in the form of pdf, jpg, video, doc, ppt etc. giving an advertiser or individual complete control of what they wish to publish. Clients of businesses are urged to follow those businesses that may interest them or are currently a client of and each upload from the business sends out an immediate email notification with the link to the new upload. This service can also be managed by the individual. Businesses in each demographic will also be given an opportunity to advertise/market their products or services using Swopinfo’s daily, weekly or monthly advertising page with geographic fencing technology.

Swopinfo has filled the gap between businesses and consumers by using a very powerful social/digital platform. Gone are the days where people are buying publications, they are instead physically receiving the most up to date information from their PC’s, Laptops and more importantly from their smart handsets.

Swopinfo has identified this gap and created technology that is powerful and very simple to use. It is the platform where businesses and people can connect which in turn creates more sales. The difference between Swopinfo and other platforms is that Swopinfo brings the business to the customer and keeps that customer abreast of what’s trending or on sale at that specific business at a specific point in time. Swopinfo is the technological breakthrough for Marketing/Advertising and personal information storage that we have all been waiting for.

Swopinfo is looking for $10 000 in funding to take the company to the next level. The funds will be used for further development and marketing as the beta phase has been completed and the platform is already being used by 1000’s of businesses and individuals. The registrations are growing on a daily basis and this is proof that the Swopinfo concept is in fact a platform that consumers want to use. The scalability is mind blowing and the monetization strategy is multifaceted and limitless.

story:
About Evergreen United Food Hub

In an effort to maximize ethical food production while minimizing food waste, EU Food Hub helps farmers move crops and provides chefs convenient access to every ethically grown food source available in Western Washington. We believe this infrastructure is a necessary step as we all work towards a more wholesome and sustainable food culture.

If you'd like to learn more about EU, check out the website at www.eufoodhub.com.

What's been done

This plan developed slowly over the past year and has been picking up steam as the guys put the pieces together. The last three months have been full of truck buying, registering for and obtaining licenses, planning and purchasing the cooling system, meeting with farmers and chefs, and (the easy part) long drives across this massive country. For all the progress they've made, it hasn’t come without numerous setbacks that have required some quick thinking, fairly advanced problem solving skills, and good ole fashioned EU engineering.

At this point EU has a truck, local farms, and restaurants lined up. 

Total investments so far have been over $11,000. The vast majority has come out of pocket, with a few contributions from family and friends. With that money EU has accomplished the following:

Box Truck- $2,500

Parts/Repair Supplies- $1,049.85

Incorporation/Business Licensing/Registration/Insurance- $931.72

Generator/AC Unit- $485

Diesel/Gas- $190.07

Moving Costs (MS to WA)- $4,000

Tires- $800

Coolbot- $350

Miscellaneous (nuts, bolts, caulk, bags, ticket books, etc.)-$821.09

 

Here's where you come in

Hugh and Aaron need some help getting these last few feet up the mountain. They'd admittedly love to keep saying, ad nauseum, "We got this," but the reality at this point is that they’re going to be shy of being able to afford the final push.

EU's first group of farmers and chefs are excited for the first official route day. 

With the growing season coming on strong, the truck only needs insulation installed and a few fine tunings, which are actively being addressed. The real struggle left in getting EU off the ground is the ability to pay farmers up-front and to be able to do so for up to 30 days as individual billing cycles are paid and cash flow begins.

EU's business model is based around reliability, consistency, and building relationships over time; running out of funds in the infant stages of operation would put pressure on each of these aspects. Still, the fact remains that peak growing season is now, and it's time to roll.
 

Want to help, but money is tight?

To say that Hugh and Aaron get where you're coming from would be an understatement. Sometimes it's trying enough just to keep the bills paid and the fridge stocked. And then, as if that's not enough, some random friends of yours are asking for money to fund the last stage of setting up their business. Well, they want you to know that it's not all about financial support.

Encouraging words and well-wishes have meant and continue to mean a lot as EU moves forward, and it doesn't stop there. Every friend that helps spread the word around is doing a huge favor. Sharing is caring, after all. If anyone comes across this page via a share or a like, and ends up donating just $5, a difference has been made.


Stretch Goals
The funding goal for this campaign is right where it needs to be to accomplish the specific task outlined above: paying farmers for produce throughout initial billing cycles. That said, this is a new business and every cent can be put to use. 

Any funds over the campaign goal will be used towards the completion of the online store. EU is in the initial stages of developing a web-store and app to allow customers to see and order from the ever-changing inventory with ease. Additional funding will speed this project along.
