which we routinely inspect for blockages every time we irrigate.
Blockages are usually caused by ants entering the sprinklers. We only use a home-made organic insecticide made from neem leaves which amazingly  gets rid of almost all the crop damaging insects we have. 




Above is an area with about 60 trees planted over a year ago.  We have over 400 trees, so you can see the vast areas of weed/grass cutting that is needed and how far the wheel barrow has to be pushed.   The trees above are now more than two to three times the height shown and should start to produce by the end of the year.   We have installed a full irrigation system delivering water to each tree.   Beneath the ground is a vast aquifer so we never run out of water.
Here I am using the bush cutter on 3 - 4 weeks of weed growth.  As you can see it is relentless and I have over six acres to keep clear.
This
daily routine involves a lot of walking which gets tough when I'm
carrying a couple of gardening tools and irrigation spare parts or working with the bush cutter. The
trees are planted 5 meters (16 feet) apart and in between them grow
weeds and grass which has to be constantly cut to keep them under
control.    In the tropics there is no winter season when it comes to weed growth, they continually grow . Currently, I spend almost half of every day
cutting and clearing this growth with a bush cutter.    It
is extremely hard work in the heat here which is a constant 33°C
( 91° F) with the humidity running at 80%.  All our work is out in the open.  With the weight of the cutter and
the protective clothing to keep the sun off my skin, I am finding it
overwhelming.  There is no shade to work under and my prosthetic limb certainly does not help matters.  On some days I only manage an hour
or two of work before the aches and discomfort shut me down.  In all we have about six and a half acres that need constant cutting.


Mary
is under equal pressure.    She has to push the wheel
barrow around as this is something I am not able to do because of my
prosthetic leg.  She is normally laden down with sacks of home-made
compost and tools she needs for digging out some of the more stubborn
and deeper rooted weeds.

A
mini tractor with trailer and exchangeable grass/weed cutter would
speed up this daily work to the extent that I could cut all the grass
and weeds in two days or less, allowing much more time for other jobs that
always need doing on a working organic farm.   The trailer
would remove the burden of wheel barrow pushing by Mary.  There are some which go up quite long and awkward sandy slopes. 






The
above images show clearly the type of machinery we desire.
   The
trailer is removable from the tractor unit and the grass cutter can
be fitted in its place.   The bottom image shows example of grass cutter fitted to tractor unit.

We
currently have 13 mature trees which are producing and we have a
buyer for all the coconuts we can supply, now and in the future.
Instead of using the wheel barrow to transport 10/15 coconuts at the time to
the pick up point, we would be able to move 300/400 coconuts at the time.
 There is also the removal of the cut palm leaves which are very
long and quite heavy.   There could be several hundred leaves to
remove to where we mulch them up as part of  our compost mix.
We are one of the very few farms growing organic coconuts in our area and our produce will bring down the cost greatly to the local people. 

Funds
raised via Indiegogo would go towards the purchase of this vital
piece of equipment for us.  The $20,000 we are asking for would purchase one of these complete machines and get it delivered
to our door.  If we don't make it to $20,000, we will buy the grass cutter option  only,  as that is the biggest job we have.   The video clearly shows an example of what I am up against with a bush cutter it is a year round job.    

One
important point to mention here is that any motorised machinery, be
it cars, trucks, tractors or mini tractors are much more expensive in
Brazil than the USA or Europe.   Transport costs are prohibitive as can be seen below.    The dollar exchange rate is as of 3rd may 2016.Delivery  tractor & trailer (circa 5 days)
18,900.00 BRL
=
5,346.27 USD
Tractor price  
15,200.00 BRL
=
4,295.27 USD
Grass Cutter price 
7,300.00 BRL
=
2,063.71 USD
Delivery  
1,900.00 BRL
=
537.871 USD
Trailer price   
13,400.00 BRL
=
3,789.78 USD
Rotavator price  
3,800.00 BRL
=
1,074.77 USD
Delivery   
1,900.00 BRL
=
537.871 USD
Total                             $17,645.54We rounded off to the nearest round number to cover currency fluctuations.The equipment has to come from Sao Paulo which is 3,108.4 km south of us.   There are no selling agents up where we are near Fortaleza, but there are service/repair agents.The Nature ReserveWe run the whole property as a nature reserve.  We have recorded over 120 species of birds visiting the grounds, with over twenty nesting and rearing young.   I have photographed 65 of these species  Two species of duck have bred here which the locals tell me has never happened before, two species of grebe and two other water fowl have become resident on the lakes and wetland. The three species of egret and the unusual Limpkin are daily/weekly visitors, as is the Snail Kite in their breeding season.    The lakes also bring in three species of kingfisher.  We also have several rarely seen watervoles which are breeding healthily here.Brazilians inherently hate snakes, consequently I am often called out to catch snakes that are in peoples homes or gardens and then release them on our property.   If I don't do this the locals simply hack them up with machettes.   The locals think I am crazy as they have little or no knowledge of nature conservation.  The largest of the snakes I rescue are the beautiful Red Tailed Boa.     Although there are a lot of snakes about, we very rarely see them.

Biggest Metaverse RL city - Continuous 256 Regions>>> Although Lisbon is already open and starting up (Utopic Area almost done), I desperately need help on funding next 6 months of developing

What are the 500$ for ???

Follow Us on Twitter 

Lisbon Meetup for Special Events - meetup.com/LisbonVirtualReality
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------



The Virtual Lisbon Project

- Virtual Lisbon (VL) is an accurate replica of RL Portugal's capital - Lisboa - a work in progress to spawn during several months until completion, offering as many Opensim features as any big RL city can, regarding: community, education, business, culture and entertainment

- VL is based on an independent grid hosted by Avilabs and called - Loff Virtual Worlds ( http://login.loffvirtualworlds.com:8002/wifi) - but is focused on facilitating it's full use by any Hypergrid visitors, with no need to register, offering easy access features as: no currency for zero value land and object transactions, special use perms of land and objects only by group member roles and automated features for easy self-service activities

---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------



At the present time Virtual Lisbon land mass is all there to visit but the main city areas and structures are still on early stage construction, offering only 2 completed VARs with very specific functions:


1 - Lisbon Utopia (login.loffvirtualworlds.com:8002:Lisbon Utopia) - an huge 4X4 VAR utopic and futuristic recreation of an actual suburban and marginal part of Lisbon that uses elements inspired on the actual city but offers innovative uses of Opensim materials and scripts, showcasing what can be built and done and on the ideal city with the ideal community - 8 central themed buildings where anyone can use free luxury hotel suites or setup free small offices to represent their own virtual world, company or project, 2 huge areas with big themed clubs and a mega theatre/auditorium where you can manage venues and perform all sorts of events, including prims rezz and parcels control, 2 huge areas where you can offer or get recent quality freebies and showcase your products and work of arts and finally some great small islands with free furnished bungalows and private docks and coral lagoons




2 - Lisbon Sandbox (login.loffvirtualworlds.com:8002:Lisbon Sandbox) - an huge continuous 4X4 sandbox, organized for all needs like rezzing, building & vehicles testing allowing up to 40K prims with a 24h return period, featuring wide ground flat areas, huge continuous wide oceans, long continuous wide roads, building grids with metrics and telepad fast moving system

---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------




BUT LISBON IS MUCH MORE THAN THIS - 256 Regions/SIMs
>>> YES, THAT´S RIGHT - Each square below is 1 SIM/Region





WHY IS VL SO SPECIAL FOR ALL THE HYPERGIRD ?

- What will make Virtual Lisbon (VL) development so special and unique are core elements such as: structural size and scale replication, accurate landscape, building and texture details, functionality of any object's specific features or building's sections, resource quantity allied to diversity and finally, a thriving pro-active community

- VL spawns over 256 standard regions, all laid side by side, for structural city continuity, all organized in a cluster of 16 VARs of 4X4each to assure more avatar load and better overall server performance at different land portions, relying on the latest Avilabs fine code, with almost no noticeable effects on Sim crossing for Avatars and even many vehicles, all running on dedicated servers using Ubode engine, witch is quite similar to Second Life and therefore also facilitating future migrants from SL

- VL main goal is development by synergy, offering as many resources as possible, in quantity and quality, always 100% free and supporting all sorts of private projects giving them great autonomy to allow for a faster, steadier and pro-active community, attracting life and diversity from all over the Metaverse
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------



FUTURE SUSTAINABILITY ?

The project sustainability will be assured by two main factors: Avilabs servers host discount in exchange for company promotion plus city resources and also an Inworld Paypal donations network, either by private satisfied free users or project sponsoring companies
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------



Examples of Layout & Monument Detail/Accuracy


---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------




Project by - Carlos Loff AKA Carlos Loff at Opensim (Loff Auer on SL)

- I Love creating virtual worlds since 2007 at SL, but what I most enjoy is to manage all the events and care for a friendly community, helping people and projects to get togheter and watch how synergies work around this innovative new worlds to improve it every day and offer more interactions to everyone





Who is Carlos Loff ???

Graduated in Geography and a certified trainner, I worked 21 years as Environmental Educator and the last 7 years as a Professional Photographer & Photography Teacher

I started learning, creating and managing Second Life virtual lands and communities on 2007 and so far I developed and runed several projects and events listed below - Im now using my own Photo textures, taken in RL Lisbon and starting tu successfully convert prim build into mesh builds

Nowadays I run a Big Meetup with weekly Photography Workshops, where you can ask members about how reliable they find Me - www.meetup.com/clicsboa
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------
---------------------------------<<<>>>---------------------------

- Huge coverage, as shown on project main picture

- Interactive Monuments, Museums and Theatres

- Watersports of all sorts at the Tagus river

- Trains, Trams, Bicycles, Boats & Planes

- Parks for outdoor activities and events

- Restaurants, cafes and typical pastries

- Eco displays: wind power, green roofs & recycling

- Interactive birds, insects, reptiles, mammals & fish

Our Community 100% Free Venues/Activities

- Attend public conferences, workshops & lectures

- Use many inovative and interactive features

- Explore and learn at the virtual museums

- Live on apartments with interactive furnitures

- Rent areas for business - bars, stores or offices

- Attend concerts, fashion shows & DJ parties

- Participate or attend exhibitions and fairs

- Dive into Tagus river with interactive creatures

- Ride the waves with surfboard, sailboat & jetski

- And many more small enjoyable surprise

story:
Dear Backers,

In this section, I share with you how we plan on transforming the workplace and improving team meetings. 

You will discover why we designed ROOMIE, what makes the Smart Collaboration Assistant so innovative, which user problems we are solving and how big is the market opportunity in front of us.

Ideas and questions are welcome. We value your feedback, so just drop me a note. We invite interested investors to contact us as well.  

Thank you in advance for your support and contribution.

Marc-Alexis Remond

- Founder and CEO -

1. The Vision

According to Analyst Firm, Frost and Sullivan, meeting participants waste up to 20 percent of video meeting time on technical issues around preparation and connectivity. 

So it all started with one idea which was to make team meetings more effective and free of technical headaches. I founded Nuage Solutions earlier this year with the vision to transform the way people work, learn and live.

After months of research, brainstorming and conversations with users, blended with 17 years of experience in unified communication and collaboration solutions, we successfully created the remedy to users' challenges.

2. The Problems

Time and productivity are wasted every day because of technical issues or lack of user training. Here are some of the common problems affecting users when meeting in the conference room:

a. Cables, adapters and screen resolution: Time is wasted because presenters struggle to find the right adapter, connector or cable to display the document on their laptop or simply because they cannot adjust screen resolution or image quality.

b. Laptops for team collaboration: Efficiency is impacted because participants have to use a laptop to attend web and video conferences. People are left with no other choice but to squeeze in front of the webcam and microphone to be heard and seen affecting the virtual meeting experience.

c. Monolithic Collaboration Solutions: Customers are tired of investing and maintaining systems that can only be used for one thing. Too often audio, web and video conferencing solutions are built in silos and are not inter-operable. They are difficult to use and expensive to maintain. Hence, adoption is low. 

d. Unified Communication and Workspace Strategies: Employees are equipped with unified communication applications across all their devices except the one in the conference room. They get frustrated when forced to use yet another system. Time is becoming a rare commodity, so is users’ patience.

e. Social Media Applications: Younger generations love social media and mobile applications. They want to use them at work as well to be as productive as they can be. This is simply how they interact and communicate. Yet, most enterprise vendors do not support consumer and social media applications.

f. Real-time Information Sharing: Companies invest a lot in enterprise applications to access to all kinds of data in real-time using mobile devices, but sharing such data in a team meeting is never easy. Users need to be on the same page or dashboard to review data and make informed decisions.

In section 7, we describe how ROOMIE solves the problems listed above, but first let's have a look at this disruptive piece of technology. 

3. The Smart Collaboration Assistant




ROOMIE is innovative. The Smart Collaboration Assistant enables teams to wirelessly project and share data from any device; start chat sessions, join audio, web and video conferences as well as access both consumer apps and enterprise services. It is platform and service agnostic too! 

ROOMIE is easy to set up. All you need to do is to place the system on top of a wall-mounted screen. Simply connect the power cord, HDMI and network cables. Then, turn it on by pressing on the power button on the front panel. If your monitor has no speakers, that's OK. ROOMIE has two of them.

ROOMIE is easy to use. To make it very easy to use, we developed an intuitive interface for users to quickly to launch any app or service. That's the ROOMIE Launchpad. It runs on Windows 10 which is an operating system users are familiar with, and offers the required levels of security, management & control. 

ROOMIE is a unique. It comes with integrated Full HD camera, noise cancelling microphones and speakers to provide the best virtual meeting experience possible in small and medium-sized meeting rooms. The Pro version comes with a USB speakerphone to place at the center of the table in larger rooms.

ROOMIE is used by everyone. It is used for day-to-day meetings, but also to engage employees live, interview candidates, on-board talents, train staff, treat patients, educate students or even fix technical problems at a distance using high quality audio and video. It is used across all industries and functions.

4. The Campaign

Our strategy is to launch ROOMIE before the end of this year. The first few working prototypes have already been produced and tested. Now, we are ready to take this innovative and disruptive piece of technology to market globally, but we can't do it without devoted backers and supporters like yourself.

Our objective is to raise more than US$200,000 in only 45 days. Without your help, we will never be able to scale up our operations to bring this amazing project to life and make it available to businesses, governments, schools and hospitals worldwide. Please support us and contribute in any way you can.

Our plan is to used the funds to build up our operations. The money will be used for production (50%), packaging (2%), warehousing (3%), marketing (30%), shipping (5%) and pilots (5%) and donations (5%). Then, we will be able to supply, support and  service ROOMIE around the globe.

5. The Opportunity

a. Revenue: According to various industry analyst firms, the global enterprise video conferencing market is expected to reach US$4 billion by 2017 and US$7. 85 Billion by 2023. This is a growing market undergoing a transformation. We will be capturing a piece of the unified communication market as well. 

b. Trends: Just like any other enterprise software, video conferencing is moving to the Cloud. This is drastic market shift. Companies are also moving away from monolithic conferencing systems creating a huge opportunity to simplify user access to any application or service.

c. Rooms: Among the 12.5 million conference rooms in the world today, only 3% are equipped with video conferencing systems due to high equipment costs. The remaining 97% of meeting spaces are equipped with just a display and a telephone. There is a market for cost-effective systems in such rooms.

d. Product: We designed ROOMIE knowing where the market is headed and what organizations want. The Smart Collaboration Assistant is both platform and service-agnostic giving people the freedom to choose their preferred equipment vendor or cloud service provider. We made it affordable too!

6. The Differentiation

Traditional video conferencing systems and boxes are monolithic solutions designed to connect to a particular platform or cloud service (SIP/H323), nothing else. Companies selling web conferencing services, unified communication platforms, social and mobile communication applications do not offer collaboration systems for the conference room. 

ROOMIE is truly a very unique piece of technology. It is all-in-one, yet fully featured. Here are some of the key differentiators compared to what exists in the market today:

1. Slick: Unique form factor with integrated Full HD camera, noise cancelling microphones and speakers.

2. Intuitive: User friendly software (ROOMIE Launchpad) to quickly launch or access up to 90 different programs, applications and services.

3. Easy: Just connect to power, screens and network to install. Turn it on. You will be ready to go in few minutes only. 

4. Versatile: Perfect for boardrooms, meeting rooms, open and shared workspaces, classrooms, clinics, home and branch offices.

5. Powerful: Collaborate, communicate, connect, stream and learn using any media you can think of (Text, Images, Audio, Web or Video…) 

6. Agile:  Connect to any communication platform, conferencing infrastructure, cloud service, and supported mobile and social applications.

7. Social: Enjoy consumer apps such as Skype, WeChat, QQ, Line Facebook Messenger as well as Enterprise Social Platforms like Jive, Yammer...

8. Secure: Based on Widows 10 Pro (ROOMIE Pro Version) for improved security, control, management and maintenance at a distance.

7. The Solution



We are determined to transform the enterprise collaboration market and reshape work spaces. Here is how ROOMIE improves the way people...

COLLABORATE.

ROOMIE enables users to share and edit data wirelessly.  97% of users go to a meeting room to share data using a single laptop but they struggle with various cables and screen resolutions. With ROOMIE, team members can wirelessly project their screen on the monitor in the conference room from any device using any operating system. They can even use the digital whiteboard or open, edit and save documents from their preferred cloud-storage provider.

CONFERENCE.

ROOMIE improves the group conferencing experience. 68% of users attend a web conference from a meeting room using their laptop which was not designed for group collaboration. 30% of them join a video conference using a specialist device not able to connect to other services. Organisations must serve different conferencing scenarios. With ROOMIE, users can use WebEx in one meeting, Zoom in another and Polycom after that using video or audio.

COMMUNICATE.

ROOMIE supports your unified communication strategy. 68% of organisations will align their meeting room and UC strategies. After installing, the required application, roomie becomes a fully featured room collaboration system for leading UC platforms and cloud-based services from AT&T, Sprint, BT, Verizon, Microsoft, IBM, Avaya, Cisco, Broadcom, ShoreTel, Deltapath…

CONNECT

ROOMIE unleashes to power of social media apps. Younger users love social media apps. They want to use them at work too because this is how they communicate and interact in life. With roomie, they can access any supported Social Apps (Skype, FB Messenger, WhatsApp, Line, WeChat, QQ, …) to engage followers, customers or simply monitor social media pages or channels.

STREAM

ROOMIE allows you to watch, capture or broadcast. Attending or creating virtual events is made easy. With ROOMIE, you can record your event and stream it live simply watch any video, film or listen to music by accessing any streaming service (On24, Livestream, YouTube, Spotify, Netflix…).

MANAGE

ROOMIE gives you more control over business and smart devices. Teams meet to review data presented as dashboards by enterprise applications (CRM, SCM, HRMS, SCM, LMS, CCTV…) to make better decisions, faster. With ROOMIE, you can access any business application and manage any smart building system controlling device with a web interface or a desktop client supporting windows 10 (camera, light, blind, temperate, door..).

7. The Bottom Line

Conference rooms have been around for a very long time. Work styles have changed significantly but the designs and technologies used have been the same for many years. It is time for a change. 

Just like Smartphones have changed the way we communicate, ROOMIE is changing the way we collaborate because it improves team work, talent development, knowledge retention, technical support, work-life balance and, citizen and human services delivery.

Call For Help!

We need your help to be successful! So, please tell people about ROOMIE. Inform your friends and share our updates via email and social media. Every little action or gesture counts. You can help us make a big difference!

Thank you in advance for your dedication and support.

TEAM Nuage.
story_txt:
Dear Backers,In this section, I share with you how we plan on transforming the workplace and improving team meetings. 
You will discover why we designed ROOMIE, what makes the Smart Collaboration Assistant so innovative, which user problems we are solving and how big is the market opportunity in front of us.Ideas and questions are welcome. We value your feedback, so just drop me a note. We invite interested investors to contact us as well.  
Thank you in advance for your support and contribution.Marc-Alexis Remond- Founder and CEO -1. The VisionAccording to Analyst Firm, Frost and Sullivan, meeting participants waste up to 20 percent of video meeting time on technical issues around preparation and connectivity. So it all started with one idea which was to make team meetings more effective and free of technical headaches. I founded Nuage Solutions earlier this year with the vision to transform the way people work, learn and live.After months of research, brainstorming and conversations with users, blended with 17 years of experience in unified communication and collaboration solutions, we successfully created the remedy to users' challenges.2. The ProblemsTime and productivity are wasted every day because of technical issues or lack of user training. Here are some of the common problems affecting users when meeting in the conference room:a. Cables, adapters and screen resolution: Time is wasted because presenters struggle to find the right adapter, connector or cable to display the document on their laptop or simply because they cannot adjust screen resolution or image quality.b. Laptops for team collaboration: Efficiency is impacted because participants have to use a laptop to attend web and video conferences. People are left with no other choice but to squeeze in front of the webcam and microphone to be heard and seen affecting the virtual meeting experience.c. Monolithic Collaboration Solutions: Customers are tired of investing and maintaining systems that can only be used for one thing. Too often audio, web and video conferencing solutions are built in silos and are not inter-operable. They are difficult to use and expensive to maintain. Hence, adoption is low. d. Unified Communication and Workspace Strategies: Employees are equipped with unified communication applications across all their devices except the one in the conference room. They get frustrated when forced to use yet another system. Time is becoming a rare commodity, so is users’ patience.e. Social Media Applications: Younger generations love social media and mobile applications. They want to use them at work as well to be as productive as they can be. This is simply how they interact and communicate. Yet, most enterprise vendors do not support consumer and social media applications.f. Real-time Information Sharing: Companies invest a lot in enterprise applications to access to all kinds of data in real-time using mobile devices, but sharing such data in a team meeting is never easy. Users need to be on the same page or dashboard to review data and make informed decisions.In section 7, we describe how ROOMIE solves the problems listed above, but first let's have a look at this disruptive piece of technology. 3. The Smart Collaboration AssistantROOMIE is innovative. The Smart Collaboration Assistant enables teams to wirelessly project and share data from any device; start chat sessions, join audio, web and video conferences as well as access both consumer apps and enterprise services. It is platform and service agnostic too! ROOMIE is easy to set up. All you need to do is to place the system on top of a wall-mounted screen. Simply connect the power cord, HDMI and network cables. Then, turn it on by pressing on the power button on the front panel. If your monitor has no speakers, that's OK. ROOMIE has two of them.ROOMIE is easy to use. To make it very easy to use, we developed an intuitive interface for users to quickly to launch any app or service. That's the ROOMIE Launchpad. It runs on Windows 10 which is an operating system users are familiar with, and offers the required levels of security, management & control. ROOMIE is a unique. It comes with integrated Full HD camera, noise cancelling microphones and speakers to provide the best virtual meeting experience possible in small and medium-sized meeting rooms. The Pro version comes with a USB speakerphone to place at the center of the table in larger rooms.ROOMIE is used by everyone. It is used for day-to-day meetings, but also to engage employees live, interview candidates, on-board talents, train staff, treat patients, educate students or even fix technical problems at a distance using high quality audio and video. It is used across all industries and functions.4. The CampaignOur strategy is to launch ROOMIE before the end of this year. The first few working prototypes have already been produced and tested. Now, we are ready to take this innovative and disruptive piece of technology to market globally, but we can't do it without devoted backers and supporters like yourself.Our objective is to raise more than US$200,000 in only 45 days. Without your help, we will never be able to scale up our operations to bring this amazing project to life and make it available to businesses, governments, schools and hospitals worldwide. Please support us and contribute in any way you can.Our plan is to used the funds to build up our operations. The money will be used for production (50%), packaging (2%), warehousing (3%), marketing (30%), shipping (5%) and pilots (5%) and donations (5%). Then, we will be able to supply, support and  service ROOMIE around the globe.5. The Opportunitya. Revenue: According to various industry analyst firms, the global enterprise video conferencing market is expected to reach US$4 billion by 2017 and US$7. 85 Billion by 2023. This is a growing market undergoing a transformation. We will be capturing a piece of the unified communication market as well. b. Trends: Just like any other enterprise software, video conferencing is moving to the Cloud. This is drastic market shift. Companies are also moving away from monolithic conferencing systems creating a huge opportunity to simplify user access to any application or service.c. Rooms: Among the 12.5 million conference rooms in the world today, only 3% are equipped with video conferencing systems due to high equipment costs. The remaining 97% of meeting spaces are equipped with just a display and a telephone. There is a market for cost-effective systems in such rooms.d. Product: We designed ROOMIE knowing where the market is headed and what organizations want. The Smart Collaboration Assistant is both platform and service-agnostic giving people the freedom to choose their preferred equipment vendor or cloud service provider. We made it affordable too!6. The DifferentiationTraditional video conferencing systems and boxes are monolithic solutions designed to connect to a particular platform or cloud service (SIP/H323), nothing else. Companies selling web conferencing services, unified communication platforms, social and mobile communication applications do not offer collaboration systems for the conference room. ROOMIE is truly a very unique piece of technology. It is all-in-one, yet fully featured. Here are some of the key differentiators compared to what exists in the market today:1. Slick: Unique form factor with integrated Full HD camera, noise cancelling microphones and speakers.2. Intuitive: User friendly software (ROOMIE Launchpad) to quickly launch or access up to 90 different programs, applications and services.3. Easy: Just connect to power, screens and network to install. Turn it on. You will be ready to go in few minutes only. 4. Versatile: Perfect for boardrooms, meeting rooms, open and shared workspaces, classrooms, clinics, home and branch offices.5. Powerful: Collaborate, communicate, connect, stream and learn using any media you can think of (Text, Images, Audio, Web or Video…) 6. Agile:  Connect to any communication platform, conferencing infrastructure, cloud service, and supported mobile and social applications.7. Secure: Based on Widows 10 Pro (ROOMIE Pro Version) for improved security, control, management and maintenance at a distance.7. Attending or creating virtual events is made easy. Teams meet to review data presented as dashboards by enterprise applications (CRM, SCM, HRMS, SCM, LMS, CCTV…) to make better decisions, faster. With ROOMIE, you can access any business application and manage any smart building system controlling device with a web interface or a desktop client supporting windows 10 (camera, light, blind, temperate, door..).7. The Bottom LineConference rooms have been around for a very long time. Work styles have changed significantly but the designs and technologies used have been the same for many years. It is time for a change. Just like Smartphones have changed the way we communicate, ROOMIE is changing the way we collaborate because it improves team work, talent development, knowledge retention, technical support, work-life balance and, citizen and human services delivery.Call For Help!We need your help to be successful! So, please tell people about ROOMIE. Inform your friends and share our updates via email and social media. Every little action or gesture counts. You can help us make a big difference!Thank you in advance for your dedication and support.TEAM Nuage.

story:
Short Summary

I am a social entrepreneur with a wicked passion for powersports and deep desire to help others.  Throughout my entire life, I have been immensely fortunate to be able to enjoy powersports with some amazing people.

Unfortunately, not everyone has been blessed with the same opportunities.  Some people in the world have to bravely overcome physical and mental limitations every day, while others don't even have clean water to drink.

That's where my campaign comes in.  I am building a community for powersports enthusiasts to transform their riding experience into sponsor-funded charitable donations.  Essentially, I am funneling my passion into a business that can make positive improvements in my life and the life of others that are overcoming challenges.  My vision is to make every ride impactful.

I can't do it without your support.  We can make a true difference in people's lives by having a blast and maximizing impact at the same time.

What We Need

In order to make a HUGE impact, I need your help building the foundation with some of the business essentials below:

  • $2,500 - A laptop that can help me create videos and t-shirt designs, while being reliable enough to maintain business files and social media platforms.  My current laptop is barely hanging on.  I would also use the money for a work desk, docking station, monitors, and a printer.
  • $600 - A cell phone I can use to build relationships with charities and sponsors while managing Impact Fuel's mobile social network.
  • $500 - Sponsor pool.  By putting this money into my sponsor pool, this will give me an opportunity to build my user base while identifying sponsors, which helps me overcome my primary business risk.
  • $500 - Website development fees
  • $500 - Accountant fees
  • $400 - Attorney fees
If I don't reach my goal, I will use any of the funds I gather to offset the startup costs.

The Impact

By contributing to this cause, you will be building a foundation for me to positively improve countless lives.  What you give today will compound exponentially over time.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk I face is that my business will rely primarily on sponsors to fill a donation pool.  In order for sponsors to benefit though, I will also need a user following.  In order to have a user following, I need to have money in my donation pool.  It is a "chicken and egg" scenario.

I have been extremely fortunate to be surrounded by friends and family that have volunteered to be my first sponsors, which will put me at $250 in my donation pool on day 1 of my launch.  This campaign, along with my sponsors, will largely help mitigate my primary risk.

I am confident that I can overcome these challenges once I have the right tools and equipment in place.

Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help me make every ride impactful by:

  • Liking and sharing my Facebook page: www.facebook.com/impactfuel
  • Following @impactfuel on Twitter: www.twitter.com/impactfuel
  • Following @impactfuel on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/impactfuel/
  • Purchase Impact Fuel apparel at https://impactfuel.org
  • Using the Indiegogo share tools

story:
According to statistics, 96% of lost personal items returned to their owners, as a specific category of things, is not a significant value, but can create significant problems for their owners.

Imagine that you have lost your passport or keys to the apartment and calculate how much money and time you need to spend for their recovery?

Of course, cheaper to prevent the loss of your items!

Do you need to spend your own time and money to find the lost things? 

Typically, most personal items are not indicated information about their owners, so the person who found a thing has no way to get itback.

Lost items return service «Lost and Found» prevents the loss of your personal items and promotes their rapid return!

Trust us! And find your personal items will be our main goal!

Join the service can anyone, and then you get a starter pack, which includes personal card with a personal identification number, keychain, stickers for documents or gadgets, and jetton for the pet with individual number in an amount according to the chosen program.

Items are considered protected by the service within one year from the date of activation your starter pack.

You can stick stickers on any documents, according to amount in your package.

You can place card of protection inside your purse or other place of their choice.

After finding, «Lost and Found» necessarily inform you about and return it.

We work for you 24/7/365 to ensure the quality of the new service of Lost items return service «Lost and Found»

story:
Dear Potential West Indies Soul Food Funders:

Greetings! Thank you very much for popping in here, to learn about West Indies Soul Food; what we’re up to; and where we are going {perhaps with your help - God willing}.

West Indies Soul Food, a food-service/catering business, was launched in 1995, by the company’s Founder and Head Chef, Sharon Richards Noel (that’s me). The abbreviated version of our history goes like this: I was born and raised in the Caribbean and upon moving to Minnesota as an adult, in 1981, I was appalled to find very few suitable dining options that offered great taste at a fair price. That inspired me to embark on what became a life-long mission to share my healthy & delicious, Caribbean-style cuisine with as many people as I can reach.

Two restaurants, an award winning food truck, a successful food booth at the Minnesota State Fair, countless catering contracts, and 25 + years later … Here I am; still loving what I do and looking to expand further, into a market that is very near and dear to my heart; one that serves the inner-city community much more so than my bank account.  

Already in practice for nearly a year at the non-profit High School for Recording Arts in St. Paul, my Catered School Food model has already generated quite the “buzz” and other schools are now calling to ask if I will do the same for them, which is where my need for funding comes into the picture … 

I have almost all that I need to expand this proven and highly complimented concept: the kitchen, staff, equipment, decades of experience, and crazy-good cooking skills; even one immediate, new school contract is lined up and another is pending! What I do not have is a vehicle in which to deliver the food to the schools that are requesting our services (just a tiny glitch, right?)

My passion for this project runs deep, but sadly, my pocket book does not. I cannot realize my vision alone - and humbly ask for your help, in the form of funding contributions to this project that will put smiles on the faces of so many appreciative youngsters.

The Thank You’ s and hugs and gushing words of appreciation I receive from these students every single day is enough to make my 3:00 am wake-up call well worth the effort. Why are they so appreciative? Because, while these kids are in need of many things, the most important and basic of all is their need for good, healthy meals and adequate nutrition. When they show up for school in the morning, with their stomachs growling because they had no dinner the night before, I feel like I am doing God’s work, when I can at least offer them a warm breakfast to start the day off right.

But West Indies Soul Food delivers more than just tasty, healthy, nutrition. We take care to make sure these children are getting a variety (very important) of healthy options, cooked with love and served up with care.  Yes, most standard school-lunch programs “technically” meet the required minimum nutrition standards, but how many days in a row would you be willing to eat a few carrot or celery sticks and call it good?

You might be thinking …“Huh? my school never served us catered food!”  Well – times, they are a’changin’ and for many of today’s charter and private schools, catering is a more economical option for them than hiring food service staff; not to mention purchasing and maintaining equipment, etc.  That’s what you call a true Win-Win!

Actually, it would be more accurate to say “win-win-win-win-win-win” (WIN x 6)! The school, the kids, their parents, the teachers, the community ... and of course, our company, are all winners when these kids are getting the nourishment they need – both body and mind.

Your generosity will bring more jobs to the community as well. For each new school contract we secure, we will need to hire another 2 employees. I work with the Goodwill Easter Seals program to provide jobs to people who are a bit down on their luck and just need a new opportunity to get things back on track again.

Will you join us in this mission to change these inner-city kids’ school food experience and help us to bring affordable, healthy and delicious options directly to them?

With more than 30+ years of experience cooking and serving fantastically-delicious Caribbean cuisine, West Indies Soul Food will make you proud to be a participant. With your gracious support we can get this important project out on the road together!

Thank you very much for your time – and potentially, for your much-needed assistance.
Please contact me, at your convenience, for additional details and information. 

If you choose to participate, I will be forever grateful for your kindness and generosity. But in case that’s not quite enough, a complimentary gift basket - including our *signature sauces, a certificate for *20% off West Indies Soul’s professional catering services, and a *50% off one-time purchase at our MN State Fair food booth (Summer 2016) - is our heartfelt THANK YOU to all supporters who are able to give $1000.00 or more.

With God’s Blessings,

Sharon Richardson-Noel

story:
• Gorilla Conservation Coffee is 100% Arabica, hand-picked and fresh roasted, producing a unique aroma and flavor that includes hints of caramel, butter and almonds.
  • This delicious blend is named after the lead silverback of the Mubare gorilla family – Kanyonyi, who we have known since he was a baby.
  • You can make a difference to community livelihoods and help save critically endangered mountain gorillas by buying coffee and visiting the gorillas and the farmers at Bwindi.

Hidden in the dense rain forests that stretch across the southwest border of Uganda, East Africa, dwells a gentle giant that has intrigued and amazed the world for hundreds of years. Uganda is home to half of the estimated 880 mountain gorillas who are alive today, but are struggling for a tomorrow. Gorillas' are threatened by human disease and encroachment of their forest home by people who are poor and depend on the forest for food and fuelwood. Surrounding the gorillas’ protected habitats in Bwindi Impenetrable Forest are communities who grow coffee as a livelihood, but lack the skills needed to produce substantial amounts of high quality coffee and a steady market.

Gorilla Conservation Coffee is a social enterprise created through a partnership between Conservation Through Public Health (CTPH) and Worldwide Fund for Nature Switzerland. Gorilla Conservation Coffee pays a premium price to help coffee farmers, living around Bwindi Impenetrable National Park, improve their lives, which in turn helps to protect the gorillas and their habitat.

Gorillas live in groups and are led by adult male silverbacks. Kanyonyi is the lead silverback of Mubare gorilla group located in Bwindi Impenetrable National Park.

Conservation Through Public Health (CTPH) is working with Uganda Wildlife Authority, local communities and other organizations to improve education, health care and livelihoods, so that humans and mountain gorillas—like Kanyonyi and his family—can coexist.

We train local farmers to grow the best coffee that can collect a premium price using sustainable agriculture techniques. Some of our farmers used to poach and now, with the help of Gorilla Conservation Coffee, are making sure that the mountain gorilla and its habitat are protected and preserved.

The photos above demonstrate our process from trainings to growing coffee to finding the best cherries to roast and package and sell to consumers like you! 

$1.50 of every kilogram of coffee that you purchase will be donated to help save mountain gorillas through supporting the work of Conservation Through Public Health, an award-winning Ugandan registered NGO and US registered non-profit established in 2003 to promote biodiversity conservation by enabling people, wildlife and livestock to coexist through improving their health and livelihoods in and around protected areas in Africa.

By buying Gorilla Conservation Coffee you will reduce threats to the gorillas and their habitat by giving coffee farmers an alternative livelihood away from poaching; and supporting the expansion of CTPH’s award-winning model of Village Health and Conservation Teams to additional villages around the national park. Each Village Health and Conservation Team community volunteer is responsible for bringing about positive behavior change in at least 50 households located within frontline parishes that have regular interaction with gorillas both inside and outside the forest. This model has been in operation for 10 years and has resulted in reduced conflict between people and gorillas, reduced disease incidences in gorillas, improved attitudes towards gorillas and reduced degradation of their forest habitat.

Visit www.ctph.org to learn more about mountain gorilla conservation efforts and learn more about the work of CTPH founder and CEO, Dr. Gladys Kalema-Zikusoka

Visit www.gorillaconservationcoffee.org to learn more about the social enterprise and our farmers

Kanyonyi (pictured above) is the lead silverback of the Mubare Gorilla Group and who we have named our first coffee blend after.

*For the safari perks you must choose to book within two years. Must give 3 month’s notice to Gorilla Conservation Coffee to allow adequate time to book. Flights and transport will not be covered by Gorilla Conservation Coffee or CTPH. We can guarantee three complementary nights at the Gorilla Conservation Camp or we can help you book at another camp or lodge at your own expense. We will cover the cost of one (1) gorilla tracking permit for donors at the $5,000 level; gorilla tracking permits will not be covered for $1,000 level.
story_txt:
Gorilla Conservation Coffee is 100% Arabica, hand-picked and fresh roasted, producing a unique aroma and flavor that includes hints of caramel, butter and almonds.
This delicious blend is named after the lead silverback of the Mubare gorilla family – Kanyonyi, who we have known since he was a baby.
You can make a difference to community livelihoods and help save critically endangered mountain gorillas by buying coffee and visiting the gorillas and the farmers at Bwindi.

story:
The Cobblehaus Experience:

At Cobblehaus we will focus on traditional “Olde World Styles” with “New World Twists”.  We will highlight the German and Belgian styles. Some of those brews will be our flagships ... Dusseldorf Alt and Belgian Triple. We will also brew other German and Belgium styles.  Our "Twists" will include a selection of modern craft styles including … Black IPA, Double IPA and Imperial Stout. This is just a small selection of the brews that will be available at Cobblehaus.

 

Project Description

Cobblehaus is asking for your assistance in making the brewery taproom a reality. The taproom will be great place for friends and neighbors to get together and enjoy craft beer, conversation and good times. With its rustic décor and beers inspired by the old world masters, you’ll find it easy to take a break from the fast paced world of today.

Cobblehaus is seeking $12,000 to create the taproom that is fitting for the Cobblehaus experience.  The funds will be used to decorate and furnish the seating and bar area in order to provide our customers a unique and memorable experience, like the one I had many years ago.

Additional funds raised above and beyond the project goal will be used to expand our fermentation and keg fleets so we can provide a wider range of craft options to everyone in the taproom.

 

The Perks

In return for your generosity, there is a selection of perks available.  The perks include Cobblehaus logo gear,  party experiences, and being  a brewer for the day.  Enjoy your craft beer at home with custom logo glassware.  Bring your friends and family to the grand-opening party or schedule your very own private get-together.  Have you ever wanted to become a professional brewer ... now is your chance.  You will get to create your very own style and have it brewed, marketed and served at the brewery.  What more could a craft beer lover want???

As a thanks to everyone pledging to the campaign, we would like to personally thank you ... face to face.  After your pledge, you will receive a voucher for your perk.  Just bring in the voucher, receive the perk and allow us to personally shake your hand and thank you for the wonderful gift.  We certainly understand that this may not be convenient for everyone, so we will ship your perk to you promptly if that is your preference.

If you want to help Cobblehaus meet its goals and assist with making the taproom a reality, but none of the pledge levels fit with your personal situation,  no worries.  Any help that you can provide by spreading the word would be greatly appreciated.  Tell your friends, share on Facebook, Tweet the campaign, yell from your front porch ... any and all help is greatly appreciated.  Don't forget the great sharing tools that Indiegogo makes available as well.

 

Risks and Challenges

Cobblehaus is already well into the process of opening the brewery.  We are working through the process and potential risks involved for the business.  We are already deep into the permitting and construction activities and have made it through the major potential road blocks.  We are very confident that we are very close to making Cobblehaus a reality for Coraopolis.  Having a successful campaign will allow us to provide the environment that we want and that our customers deserve.

story:
Our Story

My name is Glenn Millar.  I have an enjoyable life.  I certainly can't complain.  Every weekend I'm doing something pretty exciting.  I've also taken a lot of very cool trips around the world.   But I didn't realize how good it was until a friend told me that she had hidden my posts on Facebook.  When I asked why, she told me because I was always doing amazingly fun things and it depressed her because she wanted that too, but had no idea how to get it.  That's when I thought: 

"Why can't everyone have an amazing social life?"  Adventures in Common was born.


Adventures in Common - Fun and Friendships . . . For Life

So what makes a great social life?  Amazing activities; a wonderful group of friends to do them with; maybe a special someone to accompany you and go home with afterwards.  That shouldn't be that hard.  But we all know it is.

At Adventures in Common, our members get to choose from 50-100 events every month.  No matter what they like to do, we do it.  As our members go on activities, they make friends and meet people to date in the most comfortable and fun way possible: doing activities they love.  

After a short-time in our club, our members have a new group of friends and feel a part of a very special community.  
 

   


What About Dating?

I can't tell you how many of my friends complain about the dating sites - how frustrating, time consuming and unfulfilling they are.  With Adventures in Common, our members get to know each other slowly and casually in a fun, no-pressure environment.  Love blossoms naturally. 
 

   


Isn't This Just Meetup?

Nope! 

With Meetup, if you want to choose from dozens of different activities each month, you have to join dozens of Meetups.  Some are good.  Some are not so good. There's no consistency in quality.  Our events are all high quality, and hosted by professionals.  At Meetups, you never know how many people will be there or who they are.  At Adventures in Common, you'll see both lots of new faces and also lots of familiar friends as you become part of our community.  

How We Make Money

We think having a great social life should not only be easy, but inexpensive as well.   

At Adventures in Common, we charge less than $2 a day, and you can join for a month at a time with no commitment.  Of course, our members have to pay for some of the events as well, but we never charge more than they would pay if they did the activity on their own.  Plus, we give our members a variety of exciting events no matter what their budget, from bare bones to luxury.  Whether you join us for free events like games nights and hikes, or for luxury trips around the world, you know you'll have the time of your life.  

There's another adventures club in the Bay Area.  You might have heard their radio ads.  They charge $2500 upfront to join, plus paying for all the events.  We thought there was a better way.
 


National and International Expansion

We're opening our first two locations in the San Francisco Bay Area in early 2017. Then as those flourish, we are expanding across the US and into Europe.  Expect us to be in every major US city in 5 years. 

Changing People's Lives

About 20 years ago, I started a smaller club which was the predecessor to Adventures in Common.  We had over 100 marriages and hundreds of lifelong friendships.  It was so fulfilling to see people really connecting and looking forward to our activities.  I can't wait to do it again!

Management Team

In case you're wondering if we're just a bunch of travel bum types and might not make this a successful business, we're actually successful business people.  I've got an MBA from Dartmouth and have 30 years of marketing experience.  On my board is the former consulting CFO for Lyft, a lawyer of 23 years, a financial analyst, and a serial entrepreneur who is the founder of an $60M online dating company.  We take fun seriously!  


How We'll Use Your Contribution

Your contribution will be used to develop our app, for a marketing blitz to launch our company, and to pay our employees until our number of members grows high enough so revenues exceed costs, (projected to be at month 12). 

Risks and Challenges

Our biggest challenge is getting started and having enough people to get to critical mass. This is why we are selling pre-memberships and working with groups to get people signed up in advance.  We're expecting to open our doors with at least 200 members.

Another challenge is ensuring we have enough money in the bank to pay our expenses until our build up of subscription memberships can cover our costs.  We've carefully calculated this number and won't be launching until we have hit that dollar number.  However, one of the benefits of this business is that we have revenue on Day 1, so it's much easier to predict how much cash we'll need from the day we officially open, unlike businesses which don't have an immediate revenue model.

story:
Short Summary

Our brewery here in central Alberta was started with a core ideal—to make the best beer possible. With the support of all of you we've had a fantastic first year doing just that and hope to continue that in years to come. To do so, we've found two Cognac foeders that we want to bring back to the brewery.

These foeders will open up a wide array of beer possibilities for us and we're very excited for them. Your help is truly appreciated in allowing us to continue to experiment and offer new, exciting beers for you to share with us.

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need two foeders, not just one. The ability to blend and stagger brews is important because the beer will be in these foeders for months and years at a time.

And shipping big oak tanks out of France is not the cheapest thing in the world.

So, we need the 20 thousand dollars to order the 2x 30 hL (hectoliter, 1 hL = 100 L) foeders and ship them here. (i.e. $5538 USD/per plus ~$4000USD for shipping)

Being previously filled with Cognac we are excited and hope that we can extract some of the delicious Cognac-ness and impart it into the first beers we run through the foeders. There is a wealth of beer styles that we are able to put into these vessels and our eyes are wide with the possibilities.

And that is what we are offering to you, the opportunity to receive the first two commerical batches (one from each foeder) that we rack into these—the new centrepieces of our brewery. If the Cognac character is present in the oak these are the two and only two beers* that will have it.

*as per indiegogo and AGLC rules, we are offering vouchers that will be exchanged for the aforementioned beer at the brewery in Lacombe for off-premise consumption*

This, in addition to a whole basket of other merch and a few opportunities for you to experience life in our world... 

 

The Impact

We won't pretend that we are changing the world by embarking on this path.

What we do believe, though, is that we can continue to grow our relationship with you by treating you as well as you've all treated us. We believe in trust and openness and friendship and growing the community around us whether in our hometowns or wider afoot. We've been so happy with how you've supported us and we hope to do the same to you and others in the years to come.

 

Risks & Challenges

While we've been able to handle the challenges that have presented themselves to us thus far, this foeder adventure is a new test.

There are two main risks:

  • A loss in shipping. Unlikely but possible, insurance will be in place to cover a loss there.
  • Quality of the foeders. We have never set eyes on these so are trusting our broker to ensure that the condition of these is perfect. To alleviate this risk, we have arranged for a cooper (barrel maker) to fly to France and make any repairs that are necessary.

*one other note, AGLC rules prohibit other liquor licensees from directly contributing to this campaign.*

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

Of course, we realize that not everyone will be able to contribute to this campaign, and we will very much appreciate you spreading the word to your friends and families.

(There are share buttons near the top to the right if you so desire)

 

As always,

Thank you.
The Blindman Brewing Crew

story:
Be good...

I want to introduce you to a fantastic little company called Joa Bath and Body.  We’ve been making skin care products with globally and locally sourced natural ingredients since 2008. My name is Cindy and I’m the owner of this incredible business.

Our products are great and our customers love them and have been featured in Best Health and Southern Living Magazines. 

Be better...          

The business has been steadily growing and we are so thankful for that, however we feel that it’s time to launch to the next level. We've got a lot to do and the excitement is building to the point of overflow. 

We're working on something new that's nearly finished. The biggest challenge for us is marketing. We need to be able to send our product to marketers and influencers. We're trying to get the word out and need your help.

Be good to others...

At Joa we believe in  paying it forward. We want to use the proceeds to start a scholarship fund.  We’d like to be able to start by the end of the current school year, which doesn’t give us much time. To make all this happen, we need to expand the business. That’s why we need your help! We want to embark on a very bold marketing campaign with bloggers, vloggers, and advertisers.

We already have a few organizations lined up that we want to work with and that will greatly benefit from our scholarships. They do so much for inner city kids, providing them with homework help, sports, after school drop-ins, and so much more.

To our family, friends, and generous supporters, thank you for all your help. Check back here often to see our progress.

Other ways to spread goodness

If you’re unable to contribute, that’s okay too. Perhaps you feel inspired to roll up your sleeves and volunteer or donate to a cause that is close to you. Fantastic! We’d love to hear about it. In the meantime, please spread the love around by sharing our story with you inner circle.

Be better...          

The business has been steadily growing and we are so thankful for that, however we feel that it’s time to launch to the next level. We've got a lot to do and the excitement is building to the point of overflow. 
We're working on something new that's nearly finished. The biggest challenge for us is marketing. We need to be able to send our product to marketers and influencers. We're trying to get the word out and need your help.

Be good to others...
At Joa we believe in  paying it forward. We want to use the proceeds to start a scholarship fund.  We’d like to be able to start by the end of the current school year, which doesn’t give us much time. To make all this happen, we need to expand the business. That’s why we need your help! We want to embark on a very bold marketing campaign with bloggers, vloggers, and advertisers.

We already have a few organizations lined up that we want to work with and that will greatly benefit from our scholarships. They do so much for inner city kids, providing them with homework help, sports, after school drop-ins, and so much more.
To our family, friends, and generous supporters, thank you for all your help. Check back here often to see our progress.
Other ways to spread goodness

If you’re unable to contribute, that’s okay too. Perhaps you feel inspired to roll up your sleeves and volunteer or donate to a cause that is close to you. Fantastic! We’d love to hear about it. In the meantime, please spread the love around by sharing our story with you inner circle.

story:
Michael currently lives in a bad, mentally abusive and unstable, enviroment. So, to get them out of there, he and Caelan (his current boyfriend) are working on moving him from his current residence in the United Kingdom to Canada to live with Caelan.

Money will go towards getting Michael a Passport and a Plane Ticket to get to Canada. Any extra money from donations and commissions will go towards food and comfort.

story:
My name is Alex, I was born and raised in Uruguay, South America, I came to the USA in 1983. I graduated from one of the top schools of design " Art Center College of Design" in 2001 with a BFA. My passions are inventing ( finding solutions to facilitate the needs for everyday people), and spending time with my wife, kids, and my family.

  • One of my hobbies is GOING FISHING with my brothers, nephews, and cousins. Every year when the fishing season begins, we get together and go fishing. We rent a cabin in the wilderness for a few days and we relax, eat, drink, and most important we enjoy competitive fishing among ourselves.

    After hearing so many different stories and seeing so many types of inconvenient and hard to use bite alarm attachments for fishing rods; i decided to create a product that is compact and easy to use. 

    I call it "e-striker nano"  The only fishing rod bite alarm that is SMALL, LOUD, BRIGHT, and can be used on any type of fishing rod due to its way of attachment.  No need to remove it, cast as much as you want.

    "No need for clamping devices, no need for light indicators that just illuminate, no need for passing lines through a device to get it activated, and no need to attend and remove such devices".

 YOU NEED e-striker nano

  • A device that attaches to any fishing rod, and it's  always there on your next catch.

Uses two replaceable 3volt button cell batteries with a lifespan of 150,000 flashes, it also has an on/off switch for a long lasting lifespan.

  • Size: ( 2") x (.65") x (5/8" (at its highest part)) small & compact, bright & loud, and It can be heard and seen from 60 feet way.

With your help I will be able to put this in your hands and on the marketplace for all the anglers out there to enjoy. It is a must have in your tackle box...

What We Need & What You Get

  • Your contributions will help me produce the first batch of the e-striker nano; it will help to pay for the tooling for manufacturing as well as the first batch so I can introduce  this great product into the marketplace.
  • I have created three types of perks; 
  • COMES IN (GRAY/ORANGE) OR (ORANGE/GRAY) YOUR CHICE
           $6 will  get you one e-striker nano (100 units available)
            $12 will get you two e-striker nano's (50 units available)
            $24 will ghettos four e-striker nano's (50 units available)

Your contribution will help Anglerfish come to the surface and put unique and innovative products in the hands of every fishermen. No matter if you are young or old, Anglerfishusa will always be there on your next catch!

  • These are some descriptive words I came up with for the e-striker nano;

Innovative, Unique, Easy to Use, Cross Platform, Small, Effortless, Bright, Loud, Day or Night

Risks & Challenges

As we all know the manufacturing process for any product takes time and effort. Finding the right partner to produce a product is one of the most important pieces of a puzzle. I have been searching among many manufactures in China and have found the right people for this project.
The most important things I look for are; Trust, Communication, and Quality and rest assure that I have found them all.

The following is process objective for the ( e-striker nano bite alarm) by AnglerfishUSA.

1. Confirmation of engineering CAD drawings are correct and ready to process.

2. Once approved the tooling (mold making) process begins and the lead time is between 15-20 days.

3. Mass production samples will begin, first shot samples will be provided to me to ensure that the product is correct and free of errors and making sure that the quality is at its optimum stage. The lead time for this process is 7 days.

4. After the approval has been given by me, production will start, and the lead time for this is 10 days

5. Once production ends the shipping process will begin from China to the USA and the lead time is 15-25 days

6. Once the goods are in my procession, the delivery process to my backers will begin..

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't contribute please don't feel bad, there are other ways you can help. Please get the word out and make some noise about this awesome product, you can even use Indiegogo share tools!

Thankx in advance!

Alex Keossian 

AnglerfishUSA

story:
Events About Clay

Hi there! We are the Public Programs team from Stepping Up: the 2015 Australian Ceramics Triennale that will be hitting Canberra in July at the Australian National University.

The Triennale is the premier Australian ceramics conference. Local and International guests will be flocking to Canberra for the occasion. Our aim as the Public Programs team is to create exciting fringe events where Canberra locals can get together with visitors to the Triennale, eat, drink, chat and play with clay. Getting to know people is an important part of building a lively community, and having casual, fun events is a great way to welcome outsiders to the wonderful world of ceramics.

We're planning two evenings of ceramic related entertainment:

  • Slip Graffiti - a fun night of dancing, eating and arting. This event will be held at the ANU food co-op and will feature the creation of a community artwork made with painted layers of clay, live bands, and a hearty dinner of hot soup and hot drinks sold in handmade bowls and cups for you to take home and treasure.

  • Movie Night - A cosy evening of ceramics-focused film, including locally made claymations. More details to come.

How You Can Help

To keep these events accessible and free, we need your help and generosity! Venue hire is our biggest cost, but we also need funds to make the events really special with sound setups for live music, beautiful ingredients for delicious dinners, and projectors for seeing clay on the big screen.

We appreciate any contribution, great or small. In return we'll give you some fantastic events to fill your evenings in the week before the conference.

Spread the Word

Remember to share this page on Facebook, Instagram, or your social media of choice. We would love the exposure.

See you at Stepping Up!

Thank You....
