story:
WHAT THE CYCLONISOR™ DOES
    • The CYCLONISOR™ softens water without the use of chemicals.
    • The CYCLONISOR™ is an effective pre-treatment for Reverse Osmosis units.
    • This means that you can bath and shower in water free from chemicals, particularly chlorine which has now been published to be damaging to health.
    • When compressed air is introduced into the CYCLONISOR™ it increases the oxygenation of the water.
    • For Industrial machines and air conditioners the CYCLONISOR™ removes Boiler Scale (CaCO3) that clogs pipes and pumps. 
    • Dairy Cows drinking water that is run through a CYCLONISOR™ provides Oxygen enriched soft water which gives a major increase of Milk and Cream.
    • The CYCLONISOR™ eliminates most maintenance for Desalinators on Cruisers and Trawlers, and provides constant Pristine Oxygenated water from sea water.

    THE AMAZING CYCLONISOR

    Over the last twelve years we have been developing our system of mini cyclones in  cylinders.  It has had many rebirths and improvements, but now has the ability to carry out all the applications that we record below.

    With the help of generous friends we have developed our system to the stage where we will have 330 completed Cyclonisors available in  mid July.  Our units are being built in a factory in Zhongshan, which is owned by an Australian, Kaz Bialecki, (to see, scroll to the end of the script).  With the $60,000 that we are seeking we will be able to buy additional tooling to speed up production starting with the next 1000 cyclonisors with  larger production numbers to serve  markets where freshwater is lacking.  It will also allow us to to set up the team to be available to follow through with the first round of installations.

    BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE CYCLONISOR AND WHAT IT DOES



    Click here to print out the booklet for the Installation Instructions.



    CONTINUALLY REPLENISHED FRESHWATER
    Using natural principles of Cyclones in cylinders and also the effect of water flowing over rapids in mountain streams, water can be replenished as shown here.

    The appearance of WATERMILK™ is seen to develop  in the video, after the water has churned through the 3 cylinders of the CYCLONISOR™.  It simulates water flowing down a mountain stream, and you will see the turbidity is most pronounced in the video above in the 3rd Cylinder, which gives the appearance of milk.............so  we named it WATERMILK™.



    NASA has shown  that the drought in California is now listed as a MEGADROUGHT across America.  Our Crisis Unit can solve many of the problems.  God willing....... we can make a real difference with the help of  our Indiegogo Contributors and are truly thankful to all those who would like to share with us for our Freshwater Project Worldwide.

    OUR TEAM IS ESTABLISHING CYCLOWATER™ DAY WORKSHOPS

    Because of the DROUGHT CRISIS Cyclowater Global is establishing Day Workshops  organized through our Team members to provide detailed Installation and Maintenance instruction from our Cyclowater accredited Engineers for home owners and technicians.

    THE CRISIS UNIT

    The Compact CYCLONISOR™ Crisis Unit 
    This is our Crisis unit.   The CYCLONISOR™  reduces the power required to provide freshwater from sea water by 50% and pre-treats  the inflow of water to the Reverse Osmosis unit   .  The CYCLONISOR™ is a breakthrough that actually gets rid of Boiler Scale which is a main cause of failure for Reverse Osmosis units. 

    Crisis Units consist of the CYCLONISOR™ and a Reverse Osmosis unit on a Pallet that can supply 1000 gallons per day of fresh water.  Charities and NGO organizations can have the Crisis Unit made up in a security cabinet able to be air dropped for Tsunami and Earthquake survivors.  Water that is contaminated from creeks, bores or the ocean, is able to be purified with the CYCLONISOR™ Crisis Unit.  It needs on site power provided by a generator or solar power.  In Disadvantaged countries there is a great need for the Crisis Unit for bores that have become contaminated.

    We supply the CYCLONISOR™  as a Perk.  We do not supply the Reverse Osmosis Unit and Pumps with the necessary security cabinet.




    The Crisis Unit can supply disadvantaged countries with clean drinking water at minimal cost, and it will supply constant fresh water for Tsunami and Earthquake survivors.

    Our Certificate of Appreciation
    Here is the Certificate that we have designed.  If you wish to donate, but you do not wish to purchase any of the Perks, then you can print out this Certificate and add you name to it in the appropriate place and also the amount of your donation. 

    Click on this link to print out the US Letter Size Certificate.

    Click on this link to print out the A4 Size Certificate.


    THE WATER CYCLE

    The above diagram illustrates the Water Cycle which takes freshwater from the oceans by cyclones and wind turbulence which then falls as rain.  The  CYCLONISOR™ simulates  functions of the Water Cycle and also flowing mountain streams.  We registered the name CYCLONISOR™ that is used in our amazing systems.

    By generating mini cyclones in the 3 cylinders in a case, the forces observed in cyclones that both fly outwards and inwards in the cylinders actually tear water molecules apart to produce Hydrogen, Oxygen and OH ions as well as H202 (Hydrogen Peroxide).  This eliminates bacteria and viruses and revitalizes water.

    Drought Relief
    We can provide freshwater in droughts for country homes in Australia and now America.  We have found that the action of Cyclones taking up fresh water out of sea water, is simulated with the CYCLONISOR™ in line with a Reverse Osmosis unit when treating effluent from the outlet of septic tanks, so that freshwater can be supplied like what happens in Nature.    It means it is now possible to shower as often as you like and bath as often as you like, without using up your supply of freshwater.

    Mini Cyclones in the CYCLONISOR™ Gather H2O Molecules
    From noting the five or so cyclones each year off the coast of Queensland, Australia, we observed most of them formed rain depressions that can provide some 40 million tons or more of rain on the coast.  Cyclonisors apply principles of  cyclones over the oceans that only suck up Hydrogen and Oxygen molecules to form pure water.

    The CYCLONISOR™ Harnesses Natures Forces
    From Google noting Cyclones produce Centrifugal and also Centripetal forces, which are the forces simultaneously flying outwards and inwards, in opposite directions.   You see the evidence of massive forces in Twisters.  In our cylinders the  Centrifugal forces cannot fly out as they do in the atmosphere, and are compounded against the inside wall of the cylinders.  So the two opposing lines of forces form an Interface that tears the water molecules apart, and produces Hydrogen and Oxygen ions and also H2O2, which are hostile to bacteria and viruses. 

    Over a ten year period we found that we could treat water and eliminate Legionella and other micro organisms without filters or chemicals. 

    Mitsubishi PLC Units Monitor & Record CYCLONISOR™ Purity
    We use Bluetooth controls and with sensors incorporated will monitor home water purity  that can be recorded on the home computer or cell phone.  This is Good News for the growing concern by more and more people who do not want chemicals and herbicides in their house water.

    Because there are no moving parts in the Cyclonisors they  will not wear out with ten or more years of constant use.
     
    Our Cyclonisors have High Quality Manufacture
    It has taken over ten years of research to produce the CYCLONISOR™ that we have today.  We have established dies and production with our associate, and Team member Kaz Bialecki, at his Prestige factory complex in Zhongshan in China.

    The target for our Indiegogo campaign is for $60,000 to install initial CYCLONISOR™ units, and we now have at least 10 specific CYCLONISOR™ applications, some of which need a Reverse Osmosis unit and some which do not.

    Cyclonisors are Supplied Direct to You
    Because we will supply direct to Householders our Early Bird Contributors can have attractive Perks for those who contribute what ever they can to our amazing project which truly provides "Worldwide Water Solutions for the 21st Century".  The demand for the Cyclonisors that provide drought relief will grow rapidly.

    Please Check the Numerous Benefits of our Cyclonisors
    It is our belief that by  supplying  the Cyclonisors direct to home owners we can support co-operative groups communicating with Indiegogo Contributors for directly providing freshwater with Cyclonisors.   Because of the serious droughts in America,  homes without water need to have priority.

    THE CHLORINE ELIMINATION UNIT FOR THE WHOLE OF HOUSE

    This unit does not need a Reverse Osmosis unit.  It is for homes supplied with town water where the house owner wants to eliminate Chlorine and other chemicals from all the water for the Bathroom, Kitchen and Laundry in the house. 


    Here is Dr Robyn Trompf MD, explaining how happy she is with her Cyclonisor Unit for getting rid of Chlorine

    You order the CYCLONISOR™ as a Perk for the Chlorine Elimination Unit for the Whole House.

    ·   Mitsubishi PLC/ CEU supplied direct as a Perk
     
    You will need to order the following equipment which is not supplied by us.

    • 1 x· DAB URINOX 40/50 110v or 240v Pump with Tap pressure control
    • ·1 x 150 or 200 gallon Poly Tank
    • ·1 x 20 inch by 4 ½ inch Filter Housing
    • ·1 x 20 inch by 4 ½ inch Carbon Filter
    • ·2 x 1 inch 24 volt AC Normally OFF Solenoids
    Note   We have programmed the Mitsubishi CEU/ PLC for the specific functions needed for the Chlorine Elimination Unit (CEU).  The necessary PLC's  are shipped separately from the Cyclonisors.

    You purchase this PLC (fully programmed for the Chlorine Elimination Unit) as a Perk. The CYCLONISOR™ unit with the  Mini Air Compressor provides  Oxygenated baths and showers without chemicals.  You need,  say a 200 gallon Poly tank to store water from your normal supply that has Chlorine and other chemicals in it.  We run this through the CYCLONISOR™ late each night, and supply your water that is Oxygenated to the house from the tank through the CYCLONISOR™ , as you turn each tap on in the house.  As the water in the tank drops by 30 or so gallons it is filled back up from your normal house water main supply.

    I

    COOLING TOWERS

    The advantages are listed in the Letter below from Wassons  Engineering Plastics.

     
    The CYCLONISOR™ is supplied as a Perk

    You will need to purchase the following equipment, which we don't supply.

    • DAB URINOX 40/50 110V or 240V Pump· Entry Poly Pipe 1 inch or 25mm  
    • Exit Hose can be ¾ inch or 20mm can be used.
    • Foot Valve at the bottom of Sump water tank connected to Entry Pipe.
    Boiler Scale build up is removed by the CYCLONISOR™  running continuously for 1 or 2 weeks in a small installation and 6 to 8 weeks for larger installations such as with 12 or 15 injection molding machines.  This allows for elimination of the build up of Boiler Scale from all machines and plumbing pipes connected to all the machines.

    After the initial period of eliminating Boiler Scale a timer can be used to provide a daily work cycle to maintain elimination of Colony Forming Units (CFU).  Regulations require regular 2 or 3 monthly tests for Legionella that is eliminated by the CYCLONISOR™ constantly recycling the Sump water of the Cooling Tower.  With any indication of Algae or a test showing Legionella the duration of the CYCLONISOR™ operation period has to be increased.

    The CYCLONISOR™ complies with the International regulation AS/NZ366.3:2000 for Non Chemical elimination of Legionella.

    Compressed Air at 80 psi provides high degree of bacteria control.  It is connected to the intake through a ¼ inch tube from an Air Compressor or a 80 psi regulator from an available Compressed Air circuit.  You will need an Electric Timer for ON and OFF duty Cycles for the Air Compressor.                  

    LUXURY CRUISERS AND TRAWLERS



    Primary targets for "Low Hanging Fruit" applications include the CYCLONISOR™ simply connected as pre-treatment for sea water for cruisers and trawlers that already have desalinators. The CYCLONISOR™ eliminates most of the maintenance on desalinators and reduces Total Dissolved Solids (TDS) or the hardness factor of sea water by 70%  (see chart).  This means that the electric power for the pump is substantially reduced, while still providing the same amount of continuous fresh water.

     


    You order the CYCLONISOR™ as a Perk.

    You will need to purchase the following equipment, which we do not supply:

    • DAB URINOX 40/50 110v or 240v Pump connect inline to Pre-Treat Feed Water to the Desalinator.  The Main Storage Tank can be totally filled with ONLY CYCLONISED OXYGENATED water.
    • You do not need to use the plastic hoses on the jetties to top up your tank.

    COMMERCIAL FISH TANKS AND AQUAPONICS

    Restaurants with fish tanks, and also Aquaponics rely on bubbling air through the tank water, that often does not provide enough Oxygen to keep fish alive.   An Air Compressor connected to the CYCLONISOR™  provides Dissolved Oxygen in the tank similar to the effect of a flowing mountain stream.

    In Nature,  fish prefer to swim against the flow, and are energized with the increased Dissolved Oxygen that eliminates bacteria and fungus and keeps them healthy without added Chemicals.

    You order the  CYCLONISOR™ for Fish Tanks, with a Perk:
    You will need to purchase the following equipment, which we do not supply:

    • ·DAB URINOX 40/50 110v or 240v Pump 
    • ·80 psi Air Compressor with ON and OFF Duty Cycle Timer
    SWIMMING POOLS


    Imagine a pristine pool with Dissolved Oxygen and a minimum of chlorine!  The CYCLONISOR™ with a suitable  Air Compressor substantially increases Dissolved Oxygen in the swimming pool.   The Cyclonisor™ changes Calcium Carbonate calcite into aragonite that increases the pH of the water which makes it much softer.

    Pools require a custom built CYCLONISOR™ to suit the number of gallons that are in the pool.  We are able to quote the price for a larger CYCLONISOR™ and the necessary pump to provide for the number of thousands of gallons in the pool .

    Please contact us on:   info@cyclowater.com

    CAR WASH CENTERS


    Owners of car wash centers enjoy real cash savings with the CYCLONISOR™ where Losses can be turned into Profits by:

    • saving up to 80% of water costs
    • spray jets staying clean much longer
    • using less detergent
    • customers' cars glow like new with the oxygenated sparkling rinse

    Here is Ken McKnight, who has four Car Wash centers, telling us about the advantages of the CYCLONISOR™ for his Carwash Business.

    You order the CYCLONISOR™ as a Perk

    You will need to purchase the following equipment, which we do not supply:

    • DAB URINOX 40/50 110V or 240v Pump installed in Wash Water feed line.
    • 1 x 1 inch 24v AC solenoid valve that is controlled by a Timer that is programmed to suit each application.
    • 2 x 24 hour electric Timers
     The CYCLONISOR™ can treat the stored water Tank, that supplies the Feed Line to the Wash bays.

    DAIRY COWS

    For dairy cows the CYCLONISOR™ provides very soft Oxygenated water which has given a 25% increase in the production of milk and cream.

    You order the CYCLONISOR™ as a Perk

    You will need to purchase the following equipment, which we do not supply.
    • DAB URINOX 40/50 110v or 240v Pump
    • 80 psi Air Compressor for a Compressed Air line connected to the CYCLONISOR™, with ON and OFF Duty Cycle Timer
    • Install to recycle water in the  Main Storage Tank to upgrade and Oxygenate the Water Supply.
    ISLAND RESORTS

    To get fresh water from seawater requires the use of a Reverse Osmosis unit, which normally requires constant maintenance.  By using our CYCLONISOR™ as a pre-treatment, the  cost of electric power is reduced by as much as 50% and minimizes maintenance of the Reverse Osmosis unit .  This is because the CYCLONISOR™ softens the water.  It means that  the Reverse Osmosis unit does less work, and the membrane doesn't get clogged with Boiler Scale.

    If you wish to purchase the CYCLONISOR™  for large Resorts, it needs to be custom designed.  The standard CYCLONISOR™ with an 1000 gpd Reverse Osmosis Unit  would service 4-5 cabins. 

    Please contact us on:  info@cyclowater.com

    WHOLE OF HOUSE RE-USE


    The CYCLONISOR™ Softens Reverse Osmosis Feed Water
    Freshwater from  Reverse Osmosis units  are Approved by Governments and Councils all around the World to supply water for homes.  Reverse Osmosis was developed 50 years ago and has been in use for providing Freshwater from sewage water on Space Stations for decades.  Specifications of the Reverse Osmosis you select can be checked by your local County.  Currently, in growing numbers of Countries,  Reverse Osmosis units supply some 12 Billion gallons of Fresh water  daily for  house water Mains, with fresh water above the World Health Organization (WHO) standard for purity .  The Reverse Osmosis units we specify for our Whole of House Unit have to meet the International Standard ISO 9001 Bureau Vertias Certification as well as ISO 14001 UKAS Management Systems.   Our Mitsubishi Melsec Modules, that meet the above noted specifications, control the CYCLONISOR™ and Reverse Osmosis functions and can monitor the water quality supplied to each house.  With Bluetooth, the water quality can be recorded daily on your home computer or your Cell phone. 

    Amazing Benefits of the CYCLONISOR™ with Reverse Osmosis
    For a new house with a septic tank, the Whole of House Unit uses a CYCLONISOR™  that pre-treats septic tank effluent, and can also pre-treat water from the sea ; rivers; creeks; bores  or dams.  So, for the new house, you can initially fill the septic tank with any water so that the Reverse Osmosis Unit will provide freshwater for the  Main storage tank for the house.  Once the house is operating, with the Main Freshwater Tank  filled and the septic tank working, the drainage from the Bathroom; Kitchen and Laundry, fills the  effluent water tank that will be purified by the Reverse Osmosis.  The effluent is Pre-treated by the CYCLONISOR™ and from the Reverse Osmosis freshwater is pumped to the Main Tank for the house water supply. 


    Here is Lavinia Bolton talking about her experiences with the Whole of House Unit which was installed on her house in 2009.

    The CYCLONISOR™ is the Key to Constant Reuse of Freshwater
    The Whole of House Unit incorporates the CYCLONISOR™ to pre-treat the  water supply to the Reverse Osmosis unit to reduce the TDS of the effluent from the septic tank and also to eliminate Boiler Scale as part of the Pre-Treatment .  A second CYCLONISOR™ unit with a Mini Air compressor then Oxygenates the purified water from the Reverse Osmosis Unit that flows back to the Main storage tank for the house that also receives rain water and dew from roof guttering.

    Whole of House Installation Procedure for the CYCLONISOR™
    Complete Installation with instructions are provided so that the Whole of House water supply system can be assembled and installed by the home owner with a plumber and electrician.  Home owners  in Country areas with the  extended drought, are able to  provide their local Water Authority with the Specifications of the Reverse Osmosis unit that is being used.   The CYCLONISOR™ Pre-treated Reverse Osmosis unit has a Bluetooth Mitsubishi Digital Control and Monitoring surveillance system.  The Mitsubishi controls are available as Perks with our Indiegogo  Campaign.  Country Counties with worsening droughts and serious lack of water in Lakes and Aquifers  are able to note the recorded benefits for water purity.

    Monitored Freshwater Purity with the CYCLONISOR™ System
    To our knowledge no Water Authorities have regulations for daily monitoring Water purity service for homes using Town water that can have chemical content that may vary from time to time.

    You will need to order 2  Cyclonisors that you can order as a Perk.
    You will also need to order the WHU/PLC as a Perk

    Note       We have programmed the Mitsubishi WHU/PLC for the specific functions you need for the Whole of House Unit (WHU) for Country homes with a septic tank.  The necessary PLC's  are shipped separately from the Cyclonisors.

     You would need to purchase the following equipment which we do not supply.

    • 1 x DAB URINOX 40/50 110v or 240v Pump
    • 1 x DAB URINOX 40/50 110V OR 240V Pump with Tap pressure control
    • 150 or 200 gallon Poly Tank for Freshwater
    • 150 or 200 gallon Black In ground  Poly tank
    • 1 x 20 inch by 4 ½ inch Filter Housing with a 10 micron Filter
    • 1 x 20 inch by 4 ½ inch Filter Housing with a Carbon Filter 
    • 5 x 1 inch 24 volt AC Normally OFF Solenoids

    Independent Laboratory Report
    Checking the Chart below you can see that the Tap Water is far more polluted with Trihalomethanes (THM) than the Effluent Grey water.  Around the World THM Chlorine compounds are now documented with 75 Scientific papers on Google  as being directly linked with many diseases as noted by Joseph G Hattersley in the Journal of Orthomolecular  Medicine.  Also, The Australian Newspaper on 5th  June 2008 noted a  study by UK and Taiwan scientists over a 2 year period on birth defects linked to Trihalomethanes in Town water, for  396,049 babies .




    The Amazing CYCLONISOR™ Closed Loop for Reverse Osmosis Wash Water
    The left over water or "wash water" from the Reverse Osmosis unit is fed back into the septic tank inlet.  This means that there is no drainage problems and the CYCLONISOR™ Pre-treated  Feed water to the Reverse Osmosis unit upgrades the Reject or Wash water, that increases the aerobic bacteria in the septic tank.  The  purified water supplied from the Reverse Osmosis is fed through the  second CYCLONISOR™ with Oxygenation increased by the Mini Air Compressor and revitalized to the level of a flowing mountain stream.  

    Our Patents and Trade Marks

    The US Patent Number for the CYCLONISOR™ is US 8,622,225 B2 which was granted on January 8,   2014 with the Title FLUID PURIFICATION USING HYDRAULIC VORTEX SYSTEM.

    On 17th July 2014, we also applied for a derivative Provisional Patent entitled:  IMPROVEMENTS IN FLUID PURIFICATION USING HYDRAULIC VORTEX FLUID with the Provisional Patent Application No 2014902753 which covers the specific detail and design of the Cylinders that we have developed to generate the Compound Multiplication of Vortices with major production of Dissolved Oxygen in Fluids.  We are currently preparing the Full Specification for the International Patent Co-operation Treaty Application (PCT) which covers the Patent in all countries in the World Trade Organization for 30 months.

    We have Trade Mark Registration for            CYCLONISOR™,     CYCLOWATER™,  and     WATERMILK™

    Production
    We have formed an association with a company who have a factory in Zhongshan , China, Digitek Electronics Technology.  This Company is owned by an Australian from Canberra in Australia, Kaz Bialecki, who has been manufacturing in China for the last 20 years. We will have 330 Cyclonisors produced in July this year  with increased production of a further 1000 to follow with a  build up to 20,000 per month.

     Here are three of our team members.

    Here you see Gabrielle, Kaz and Brien, our founder and inventor of the Cyclonisor™.

    This is inside the Injection Molding section of the Digitek factory.

    This is the Digitek factory complex in Zhongshan, China where our equipment is being made.

    Brien Goninan and Gabrielle Wilkins, with our Team Members, Kaz Bialecki, Victor Gurney and Leland Lim, are very grateful for your support and as a Team, we have the resources to walk you through the processes of installation and servicing the Cyclonisors for the applications you choose.

    Disclaimer

    "Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

    Paypal needs the above disclaimer to be displayed on this  page
    Please note:  We are very very confident that we will deliver to you all.  The parts are straight forward to manufacture and we foresee no problems.

    We are grateful for your support.

    Brien Goninan and Gabrielle Wilkins

    Find this Campaign on Facebook at:     https://www.facebook.com/cyclonisor

    Send this quick link to this page for your friends:    http://me/at/cyclonisor
story_txt:
WHAT THE CYCLONISOR™ DOES

The
CYCLONISOR™ softens water without the use of chemicals.
The
CYCLONISOR™ is an effective pre-treatment for Reverse Osmosis units.
This
means that you can bath and shower in water free from chemicals, particularly
chlorine which has now been published to be damaging to health.
When
compressed air is introduced into the CYCLONISOR™ it increases the oxygenation
of the water.
For
Industrial machines and air conditioners the CYCLONISOR™ removes Boiler Scale
(CaCO3) that clogs pipes and pumps.  
Dairy
Cows drinking water that is run through a CYCLONISOR™ provides Oxygen enriched
soft water which gives a major increase of Milk and Cream.
The
CYCLONISOR™ eliminates most maintenance for Desalinators on Cruisers and
Trawlers, and provides constant Pristine Oxygenated water from sea water.

THE AMAZING CYCLONISOROver the last twelve years we have been developing our system of mini cyclones in  cylinders.  It has had many rebirths and improvements, but now has the ability to carry out all the applications that we record below.With the help of generous friends we have developed our system to the stage where we will have 330 completed Cyclonisors available in  mid July.  Our units are being built in a factory in Zhongshan, which is owned by an Australian, Kaz Bialecki, (to see, scroll to the end of the script).  With the $60,000 that we are seeking we will be able to buy additional tooling to speed up production starting with the next 1000 cyclonisors with  larger production numbers to serve  markets where freshwater is lacking.  It will also allow us to to set up the team to be available to follow through with the first round of installations.BRIEF DESCRIPTION OF THE CYCLONISOR AND WHAT IT DOESClick here to print out the booklet for the Installation Instructions.CONTINUALLY REPLENISHED FRESHWATER Using natural principles of Cyclones in cylinders and also the effect of water flowing over rapids in mountain streams, water can be replenished as shown here.
The appearance of WATERMILK™ is seen to develop  in the video, after the water has churned through the 3 cylinders of the CYCLONISOR™.  It simulates water flowing down a mountain stream, and you will see the turbidity is most pronounced in the video above in the 3rd Cylinder, which gives the appearance of milk.............so  we named it WATERMILK™.

NASA has shown  that the drought in California is now listed as a MEGADROUGHT across America.  Our Crisis Unit can solve many of the problems.  God willing....... we can make a real difference with the help of  our Indiegogo Contributors and are truly thankful to all those who would like to share with us for our Freshwater Project Worldwide.OUR TEAM IS ESTABLISHING CYCLOWATER™ DAY WORKSHOPSBecause of the DROUGHT CRISIS Cyclowater Global is establishing Day Workshops  organized through our Team members to provide detailed Installation and Maintenance instruction from our Cyclowater accredited Engineers for home owners and technicians.
THE CRISIS UNIT
The Compact CYCLONISOR™ Crisis Unit  This is our Crisis unit.   The CYCLONISOR™  reduces the power required to provide freshwater from sea water by 50% and pre-treats  the inflow of water to the Reverse Osmosis unit   .  The CYCLONISOR™ is a breakthrough that actually gets rid of Boiler Scale which is a main cause of failure for Reverse Osmosis units.  Crisis Units consist of the CYCLONISOR™ and a Reverse Osmosis unit on a Pallet that can supply 1000 gallons per day of fresh water.  Charities and NGO organizations can have the Crisis Unit made up in a security cabinet able to be air dropped for 
Tsunami and Earthquake survivors.  Water that is contaminated from 
creeks, bores or the ocean, is able to be purified with the
 CYCLONISOR™ Crisis Unit.  It needs on site power provided by a generator
 or solar power.  In Disadvantaged countries there is a great need 
for the Crisis Unit for bores that have become contaminated.We supply the CYCLONISOR™  as a Perk.  We do not supply the Reverse Osmosis Unit and Pumps with the necessary security cabinet.The Crisis Unit can supply disadvantaged countries with clean drinking water at minimal cost, and it will supply constant fresh water for 
Tsunami and Earthquake survivors. Our Certificate of AppreciationHere is the Certificate that we have designed.  If you wish to donate, but you do not wish to purchase any of the Perks, then you can print out this Certificate and add you name to it in the appropriate place and also the amount of your donation. 

Click on this link to print out the US Letter Size Certificate.Click on this link to print out the A4 Size Certificate.

THE WATER CYCLEThe above diagram illustrates the Water Cycle which takes freshwater from the oceans by cyclones and wind turbulence which then falls as rain.  The  CYCLONISOR™ simulates  functions of the Water Cycle and also flowing mountain streams.  We 
registered the name CYCLONISOR™ that is used in our amazing systems.By generating mini cyclones in the 3 cylinders in a case, the forces observed in cyclones that both fly outwards and inwards in the cylinders actually tear water molecules apart to produce Hydrogen, Oxygen and OH ions as well as H202 (Hydrogen Peroxide).  This eliminates bacteria and viruses and revitalizes water.Drought ReliefWe can provide freshwater in droughts for country
 homes in Australia and now America.  We have found that the action of Cyclones taking 
up fresh water out of sea water, is simulated with the CYCLONISOR™ in line with a Reverse Osmosis unit when treating effluent from the outlet of 
septic tanks, so that freshwater can be supplied like what happens in Nature.    It means it is now possible to shower as often as you like and bath as often as you like, without using up your supply of freshwater.Mini Cyclones in the CYCLONISOR™ Gather H2O MoleculesFrom noting the five or so cyclones each year off the coast of Queensland, Australia, we observed most of them formed rain depressions that can provide some 40 million tons or more of rain on the coast.  Cyclonisors apply principles of  cyclones over the oceans that only suck up Hydrogen and Oxygen molecules to form pure water. The CYCLONISOR™ Harnesses Natures ForcesFrom Google noting Cyclones produce Centrifugal and also Centripetal forces, which are the forces simultaneously flying outwards and inwards, in opposite directions.   You see the evidence of massive forces in Twisters.  In our cylinders the  Centrifugal forces cannot fly out as they do in the atmosphere, and are compounded against the inside wall of the cylinders.  So the two opposing lines of forces form an Interface that tears the water molecules apart, and produces Hydrogen and Oxygen ions and also H2O2, which are hostile to bacteria and viruses.  Over a ten year period we found that we could treat water and eliminate Legionella and other micro organisms without filters or chemicals.  Mitsubishi PLC Units Monitor & Record CYCLONISOR™ PurityWe use Bluetooth controls and with sensors incorporated will monitor home water purity  that can be recorded on the home computer or cell phone.  This is Good News for the growing concern by more and more people who do not want chemicals and herbicides in their house water.Because there are no moving parts in the Cyclonisors they  will not wear out with ten or more years of constant use.  Our Cyclonisors have High Quality ManufactureIt has taken over ten years of research to produce the CYCLONISOR™ that we have today.  We have established dies and production with our associate, and Team member Kaz Bialecki, at his Prestige factory complex in Zhongshan in China.The target for our Indiegogo campaign is for $60,000 to install initial CYCLONISOR™ units, and we now have at least 10 specific CYCLONISOR™ applications, some of which need a Reverse Osmosis unit and some which do not.Cyclonisors are Supplied Direct to YouBecause we will supply direct to Householders our Early Bird Contributors can have attractive Perks for those who contribute what ever they can to our amazing project which truly provides "Worldwide Water Solutions for the 21st Century".  The demand for the Cyclonisors that provide drought relief will grow rapidly.Please Check the Numerous Benefits of our CyclonisorsIt is our belief that by  supplying  the Cyclonisors direct to home owners we can support co-operative groups communicating with Indiegogo Contributors for directly providing freshwater with Cyclonisors.   Because of the serious droughts in America,  homes without water need to have priority.THE CHLORINE ELIMINATION UNIT FOR THE WHOLE OF HOUSEThis unit does not need a Reverse Osmosis unit.  It is for homes supplied with town water where the house owner wants to eliminate Chlorine and other chemicals from all the water for the Bathroom, Kitchen and Laundry in the house.  Here is Dr Robyn Trompf MD, explaining how happy she is with her Cyclonisor Unit for getting rid of ChlorineYou order the CYCLONISOR™ as a Perk for the Chlorine Elimination Unit for the Whole House.·   Mitsubishi PLC/ CEU supplied direct as a Perk You will need to order the following equipment which is not supplied by us.


1 x· DAB URINOX 40/50 110v or 240v Pump with Tap pressure control


·1 x 150 or 200 gallon Poly Tank

·1 x 20 inch by 4 ½ inch Filter Housing

·1 x 20 inch by 4 ½ inch Carbon Filter


·2 x 1 inch 24 volt AC Normally OFF Solenoids




Note   We have programmed the Mitsubishi CEU/ PLC for the specific functions needed for the Chlorine 
Elimination Unit (CEU).  The necessary PLC's  are shipped separately 
from the Cyclonisors.
You purchase this PLC (fully programmed for the Chlorine Elimination Unit) as a Perk. 
The CYCLONISOR™ unit with the  Mini Air Compressor provides  Oxygenated baths and showers without chemicals.  You need,  say a 200 gallon Poly tank to store water from your normal supply that has Chlorine and other chemicals in it.  We run this through the CYCLONISOR™ late each night, and supply your water that is Oxygenated to the house from the tank through the CYCLONISOR™ , as you turn each tap on in the house.  As the water in the tank drops by 30 or so gallons it is filled back up from your normal house water main supply.I


COOLING TOWERS


The advantages are listed in the Letter below from Wassons  Engineering Plastics.


 The CYCLONISOR™ is supplied as a PerkYou will need to purchase the following equipment, which we don't supply.

DAB URINOX 40/50 110V or 240V Pump· Entry Poly Pipe 1 inch or 25mm   




Exit Hose can be ¾ inch or 20mm can be used.

Foot Valve at the bottom of Sump water tank connected to Entry Pipe.
Boiler Scale build up is removed by the CYCLONISOR™  running continuously for 1 or 2 weeks in a small installation and 6 to 8 weeks for larger installations such as with 12 or 15 injection molding machines.  This allows for elimination of the build up of Boiler Scale from all machines and plumbing pipes connected to all the machines.After the initial period of eliminating Boiler Scale a timer can be used to provide a daily work cycle to maintain elimination of Colony Forming Units (CFU).  Regulations require regular 2 or 3 monthly tests for Legionella that is eliminated by the CYCLONISOR™ constantly recycling the Sump water of the Cooling Tower.  With any indication of Algae or a test showing Legionella the duration of the CYCLONISOR™ operation period has to be increased.The CYCLONISOR™ complies with the International regulation AS/NZ366.3:2000 for Non Chemical elimination of Legionella.Compressed Air at 80 psi provides high degree of bacteria control. 
 It is connected to the intake through a ¼ inch tube from an Air 
Compressor or a 80 psi regulator from an available Compressed Air 
circuit.  You will need an Electric Timer for ON and OFF duty Cycles for
 the Air Compressor.
                  LUXURY CRUISERS AND TRAWLERS


Primary targets for "Low Hanging Fruit" applications include the CYCLONISOR™ simply connected as pre-treatment for sea water for cruisers and trawlers that already have desalinators. The CYCLONISOR™ eliminates most of the maintenance on desalinators and reduces Total Dissolved Solids (TDS) or the hardness factor of sea water by 70%  (see chart).  This means that the electric power for the pump is substantially reduced, while still providing the same amount of continuous fresh water. 
You order the CYCLONISOR™ as a Perk.You will need to purchase the following equipment, which we do not supply:



DAB URINOX 40/50 110v or 240v Pump connect inline to Pre-Treat Feed Water to the Desalinator.  The Main Storage Tank can be totally filled with ONLY CYCLONISED OXYGENATED water.




You do not need to use the plastic hoses on the jetties to top up your tank.


COMMERCIAL FISH TANKS AND AQUAPONICSRestaurants with fish tanks, and also Aquaponics rely on bubbling air through the tank water, that often does not provide enough Oxygen to keep fish alive.   An Air Compressor connected to the CYCLONISOR™  provides Dissolved Oxygen in the tank similar to the effect of a flowing mountain stream. In Nature,  fish prefer to swim against the flow, and are energized with the increased Dissolved Oxygen that eliminates bacteria and fungus and keeps them healthy without added Chemicals. You order the  CYCLONISOR™  for Fish Tanks, with a Perk:You will need to purchase the following equipment, which we do not supply:

·DAB URINOX 40/50 110v or 240v Pump  



·80 psi Air Compressor with ON and OFF Duty Cycle Timer

SWIMMING POOLSImagine a pristine pool with Dissolved Oxygen and a minimum of chlorine!  The CYCLONISOR™ with a suitable  Air Compressor substantially increases Dissolved Oxygen in the swimming pool.   The Cyclonisor™ changes Calcium Carbonate calcite into aragonite that increases the pH of the water which makes it much softer.Pools require a custom built CYCLONISOR™ to suit the number of gallons that are in the pool.  We are able to quote the price for a larger CYCLONISOR™  and the necessary pump to provide for the number of thousands of gallons in the pool .Please contact us on:   info@cyclowater.comCAR WASH CENTERS


Owners of car wash centers enjoy real cash savings with the CYCLONISOR™ where Losses can be turned into Profits by:

saving up to 80% of water costs

spray jets staying clean much longer

using less detergent

customers' cars glow like new with the oxygenated sparkling rinse

Here is Ken McKnight, who has four Car Wash centers, telling us about the advantages of the CYCLONISOR™ for his Carwash Business.You order the CYCLONISOR™ as a PerkYou will need to purchase the following equipment, which we do not supply:

DAB URINOX 40/50 110V or 240v Pump installed in Wash Water feed line.

1 x 1 inch 24v AC solenoid valve that is controlled by a Timer that is programmed to suit each application.

2 x 24 hour electric Timers 


 The CYCLONISOR™  can treat the stored water Tank, that supplies the Feed Line to the Wash bays. DAIRY COWS
For dairy cows the CYCLONISOR™ provides very soft Oxygenated water which has given a 25% increase in the production of milk and cream.You order the CYCLONISOR™ as a PerkYou will need to purchase the following equipment, which we do not supply.

DAB URINOX 40/50 110v or 240v Pump

80 psi Air Compressor for a Compressed Air line connected to the CYCLONISOR™, with ON and OFF Duty Cycle Timer

Install to recycle water in the  Main Storage Tank to upgrade and Oxygenate the Water Supply.

ISLAND RESORTSTo get fresh water from seawater requires the use of a Reverse Osmosis unit, which normally requires constant maintenance.  By using our CYCLONISOR™ as a pre-treatment, the  cost of electric power is reduced by as much as 50% and minimizes maintenance of the Reverse Osmosis unit .  This is because the CYCLONISOR™ softens the water.  It means that  the Reverse Osmosis unit does less work, and the membrane doesn't get clogged with Boiler Scale.If you wish to purchase the CYCLONISOR™  for large Resorts, it needs to be custom designed.  The standard CYCLONISOR™ with an 1000 gpd Reverse Osmosis Unit  would service 4-5 cabins.  Please contact us on:  info@cyclowater.comWHOLE OF HOUSE RE-USE

story:
About the Historical Hall of Fame

The Historical Hall of Fame honors those that have made an historical impact on world history. Maybe they did something heroic. Maybe they invented or created something that changed the way we live and do things. Maybe they made an impact on pop culture. 
Becoming a member of the Historical Hall of Fame is considered the highest honor someone can receive. Before someone can become a member, they most first be nominated by the public. People from all walks of life and from all over the world nominate the nominees. The nominees will then be brought before the Historical Hall of Fame for a vote.

Why should I support the Historical Hall of Fame? What do I get for my financial pledge?

All funds raised go to the building of the Historical Hall of Fame name brand,  Museum, library, learning center and Web site. The Historical Hall of Fame will also help sponsor other Museums, places of learning and start the Historical Hall of Fame scholarship program.

With every $5 you pledge, you get to nominate one nominee for the Historical Hall of Fame. As a supporter your name will be listed as a sponsor in the Historical Hall of Fame library, on the web site and in the museum on the supporter's wall. 


The Impact

 

As a backer you are helping make the Historical Hall of Fame apart of history.

 

Risks & Challenges

As with any project there can be setbacks. If there is any we will let you know right away. We will continue to move forward with the Historical Hall of Fame


Other Ways You Can Help

Please help get the word out about the Historical Hall of Fame.
story_txt:
About the Historical Hall of Fame The Historical Hall of Fame honors those that have made an historical impact on world history. Maybe they did something heroic. Maybe they invented or created something that changed the way we live and do things. Maybe they made an impact on pop culture. Becoming a member of the Historical Hall of Fame is considered the highest honor someone can receive. Before someone can become a member, they most first be nominated by the public. People from all walks of life and from all over the world nominate the nominees. The nominees will then be brought before the Historical Hall of Fame for a vote.    Why should I support the Historical Hall of Fame? What do I get for my financial pledge?All funds raised go to the building of the Historical Hall of Fame name brand,  Museum, library, learning center and Web site. The Historical Hall of Fame will also help sponsor other Museums, places of learning and start the Historical Hall of Fame scholarship program.With every $5 you pledge, you get to nominate one nominee for the Historical Hall of Fame. As a supporter your name will be listed as a sponsor in the Historical Hall of Fame library, on the web site and in the museum on the supporter's wall. 
 
   The Impact As a backer you are helping make the Historical Hall of Fame apart of history.     Risks & Challenges  As with any project there can be setbacks. If there is any we will let you know right away. We will continue to move forward with the Historical Hall of Fame    Other Ways You Can Help Please help get the word out about the Historical Hall of Fame.

story:
The MAGDALENA HALL HOTEL first opened it's doors in 1917 and has since served our community in so many ways. The first to enjoy her comforts were the cowboys and ranchers who drove herds to Magdalena, New Mexico; the end of the trail, where the cattle were shipped by train to the east. (second only to Chicago in number of cattle shipped) Miners and prospectors also checked in on their way to our local mines. The Magdalena Hall Hotel served our village for so many years and then fell on hard times and was abandoned. Eighteen years ago the hotel was reopened as apartments, but has blossomed into so much more. The hotel boast a cozy little cafe that is supplied by our high schools greenhouse, local gardeners, and local ranchers. The cafe uses organic whenever possible. Local artist's works that are for sale adorn the walls. There are also several little shops (Emporium 404) that sell artwork, antique jewelry, period clothing , collectible books and more. During the warmer months it is not uncommon for 10 to 15 of our local talent to gather at the hotel to play music. On any given night you can hear harps to harmonica, steel drums to violin, guitars to piano. We depend on the M.H.H. But unless we make a change the hotel will have to close. As an apartment building, in a village of less than 1000 people, there are just not enough tenants to make the M.H.H. viable. It would have closed years ago if not for the generosity and hard work of Linda Mansell, she has donated her time and sweat to keep the doors open. The owners, Stan Schuman and James Emerson have done their part by paying the overhead when the rent receipts fall short.

It is time for the Magdalena Hall Hotel to return to her glory days of a working hotel. Most of the work is done! We just need money to turn the apartments back into hotel rooms. We need your help to keep the building  alive. 


Thank you 

James Emerson,Stan Schman and Linda Mansell

story:
I've born in Kenya 31 years ago. I was without options to go to secundary school, but I was lucky to have people on the way who trust me and teach me. Since I was a young boy, I've loved Land Rovers. Now, after many years being a mechanic employed in some companies, I dream to start my own workshop. First steps are done, but still need help to have the place ready to start. 

Kenya is not an easy county, but good opportunies are there. To run your own business can allow you to have a normal & simple life. I want to start not only a business for me, also a training center for young people to have an opportunity to learn a profession for them to have also a way to improve their life.

After getting the site where to locate the workshop, I still need to fundraise some money to buy materials, tools, equipment... and why not a mobile workshop to help drivers off road!!

If you are planning to visit Kenya, you are welcome to come and visit us!

story:
Over half of American women are unhappy with their bodies, and 4 out of 5 say looking in the mirror makes them feel bad.* Does that make you angry? Do you want to help eradicate body-shaming? Do you want to PAY writers to tell their gutsy stories, and then read and share them with family and friends?

Then Women with Guts is the place for you.

Women with Guts is an online magazine where women can come together and share their struggles, stories, and triumphs around body-image, as well as forum to celebrate the gutsy things we do - no matter our shape, size, or age.

We are photographing women in beautiful, powerful, gutsy poses and settings. My goal is to show their vitality, joy, sass, humor, intelligence, and sensuality. Photos and interviews are being published on www.WomenWithGuts.com. In Bloomington, we will also mount an art show called “Women with Guts”.

Our goal is $7000, which may sound like a lot, but in reality, this will only pay for SEVEN MONTHS of 10 writers publishing one article a week. We already have 5 writers on board and have been fielding requests from many others.

Besides paying writers (what a novel thought?!?), the funds will be used for:

  • Website hosting and development

  • Photo shoots

  • Art show materials including: photo printing, installation materials

  • Gift cards for online contests

  • Branded merchandise (T-shirts, mugs, etc.)

  • Marketing materials

If we reach our ‘Stretch Goal’ of $10,000, we will additionally be able to:

  • Purchase memberships to various women’s groups such as N.O.W. (the National Organization for Women)

  • Participate in national events and conferences

  • Host special events

  • Offer music downloads of positive, uplifting songs for women

  • Purchase camera lens specifically for portraits

  • Publish celebrity interviews / bylines

Be a part of the movement to take pride in our bodies, and say NO to body-shaming.  And let's celebrate our brains and hearts a little more often! 

I do want to make it absolutely clear that this is not just a site for women - it’s for anyone who *cares* about the women in our lives: our partners, daughters, nieces, mothers.

ALL of us need to celebrate the accomplishments and bravery of the women in our lives!

ALL of us need to take responsibility for our words and actions.

ALL of us need to question our favorite retailers for their choices in everything from advertising to mannequins.

ALL of us need to take Hollywood and the media to task for their role in how women are portrayed.

Please join me and be a part of celebrating our amazing beauty, brains, and bodies. Be a part of making change by supporting this new platform for community, conversation, grit, and guts!

Thank you!

Rachael Himsel

Founder and Editor of Women with Guts

And the Women with Guts Founding Team Members: Avery Norris, Leenette Wells, Eva Mahan-Taylor, Tristra Yeager, Tory Crowe, Angela Huxford, Jen Molica, Rebecca Ross DeLong, Tiffany Hanner, Stephanie Cook, Wanda Himsel Haas, Angela Himsel, Sarah Himsel Burcon, Mary Hohl, Elizabeth Eblen, Lydia Hillenburg, Marie Metelnick, Thea Freygang, and Jeremy Hogan

*Glamour Magazine survey: http://www.glamour.com/health-fitness/2014/10/b...

story:
Hi everyone!

We are friends and ex colleagues of Wee Keong. Hence trying to raise some funds to help the mum with some of the legal fees. Hopefully you can help too.

If you do any doubts, PM us at Facebook Page, will add you as friend to show that we are friends of Moo Wee Keong.


Expecting to meet up with Mdm Kuek this Wednesday (18 March 2015). However , due to the new update on the charges and bails of both, they may be extending their stay in Malaysia.

All donation will be handed over to Mdm Kuek directly, updates on the account will be updated here and on Facebook Page.

Thanks you for your kind support


Netizens outraged that Malaysian father and son face murder charges over death of robber

PUBLISHED ON MAR 12, 2015 10:28 PM

118053100PRINT

Netizens are outraged over the news that Malaysian chef Mo Yi Hong (right) and his son Wei Qiang (centre) are being charged with murder after allegedly killing a robber who broke into a house where they were staying. -- PHOTO: SIN CHEW DAILY/ASIA NEWS NETWORK


PETALING JAYA (THE STAR/ASIA NEWS NETWORK) - Netizens are outraged over the news that a Malaysian chef and his son are being charged with murder after allegedly killing a robber who broke into a house where they were staying.

Chef Mo Yi Hong, 56, and his son Mo Wei Qiang, 28, are facing the death penalty for the alleged murder of Chen Wen Bao in Seremban, Negri Sembilan on Feb 24.

Chen allegedly slashed Mo's wife Guo Shu Lan, a Singaporean, before the family fought back.

Chen was killed in the ensuing scuffle. An accomplice managed to flee the scene.

On Thursday, Facebook users defended the actions of the father and son, claiming that they acted out of self-defence.

"This is absurd! Can someone tell me why is there a trial for this?! So the next time someone comes into my home with a knife, I should just let it be because fighting back may result in his death and hence, mine too, What a lesson," said Facebook user Sew Yen Jung Platypus.

Another user Ik CheongLoon commented: "The family should be allowed to defend themselves after robbers entered their house."

"Personally, if a person comes into my house illegally with the intention to rob & slashes my family members with a knife, he has given up all his rights," said Daniel Wong.

Also sharing the same view, Kelvin Loo Quan Huei posted: "If a man I don't know enter my house and hurt my loved ones, his actually digging s own grave."

Some even joked that robbers should be treated differently from now on.

"Next time when a robber enters your house, please accept him with a warm welcome, nice food. Tell them where you keep all the money," commented Alan Boey.

Adibah A Hamid wrote: "Woh! Cant even defend oneself? There were two robbers what do you expect people to do? Sit still and let them cut us up and hurt our loved ones?"

Ms Guo, who received 25 stitches on her arm, said her husband and son were acting in self-defence.

She also claimed that Chen was conscious when they tied him up, and it was not clear how he died.

- See more at: http://www.straitstimes.com/news/asia/south-eas... http://

Netizens are outraged over the news of a case in Malaysia where a father and son face the prospect of the death penalty for killing a man they say attempted to rob them. str.sg/oCp

Madam Kuek Soo Lan, whose husband and son are facing the murder charge, has vowed to do everything in her power to save them. She was slashed during the robbery attempt. str.sg/oC3

story:
Hi Everyone,

We are the Flood Sisters from New York.

In 2008, we saved our father's life from kidney disease by "thinking outside the box" and posting an ad on craigslist for a donor. It was a shot in the dark idea as we were not blood matches for him.

Result:

Over 100 people nationwide responded, a woman in California was a perfect match and saved our father's life.

Today:

Our non-profit organization, " The Flood Sisters Kidney Foundation of America" in 2008 was born. We have saved 6 lives already and more in process. 

Our Major Initiatives:

Our organization educates the public on kidney health and living kidney donation. We provide living kidney donor matching services within our platform nationwide.

Our Request:
We need a new efficient mobile friendly website to be able to save more lives on our online platform. Funds will go to benefit a new Flood Sisters website.
The Impact:
Our existing website has saved six lives.  Imagine how many more lives will be impacted by a new website. Most of our members come to us through our website so a new website is crucial to help us save more lives!
If you can't contribute financially, please share our campaign with friends via Facebook, Twitter, blogs and other social media.

Today: Our non-profit organization, " The Flood Sisters Kidney Foundation of America" in 2008 was born. We have saved 6 lives already and more in process. Our Major Initiatives:Our organization educates the public on kidney health and living kidney donation. We provide living kidney donor matching services within our platform nationwide.Our Request:We need a new efficient mobile friendly website to be able to save more lives on our online platform.
