story:
500 MILLION SMALL FARMS IN AFRICA ALONE!

My name is Jim Lee and I am the founder of Zenion Industries, Inc. (est. 1979) located in Northern California.  I am the inventor of many electronic products which have been licensed to other companies in the fields of medicine, air cleaning and industrial controls.  This latest product, the Ion-A-Gro, is one of my most exciting accomplishments.  It will dramatically improve the way we grow our food in a completely natural and organic manner, just as nature intended.

It has taken us over a dozen years and hundreds of thousands of dollars of our own money to study and develop this innovative product to its current level.  It is now ready to enter its final step into the worldwide marketplace.  It is not without challenges because it is new and not easily understood.  Our sales and production demands have not yet reached quantities sufficient to bring the retail price point down to our target of less than $25.  This is where we need your help.  We must increase awareness of this new product and broadcast the validity of its effectiveness.  While we have received many positive testimonials from actual users, greater exposure is needed to convince our target market of the legitimacy of this technology. More importantly, this technology will help food producers around the world grow crops safely and more efficiently, thus mitigating a growing global food shortage.

Zenion has established a rather unique business model which, we believe, will get us over the final hurdles while simultaneously providing a "win-win" scenario for all involved.  Zenion intends to evolve into a "not-for-profit" organization which will use net revenue from direct sales to fund charitable distribution of the product to worldwide growers who could not otherwise afford to purchase units. Not to be confused with a "non-profit" organization which rely on donations, our organization, Zenion, will use sustainable cash revenues to fund distribution of the product to those most in need.

This is not a get-rich-quick project; indeed, the net revenues will be re-invested into inventory for distribution primarily into third-world countries.  I am approaching 70 years of age and have been blessed with a long successful career.  I neither require nor desire personal profit from this venture.  I look forward to a comfortable retirement in the not-too-distant future* using accumulated revenue from patent royalties from other products I invented and successfully brought to market.  I have invested large sums of money and thousands of unpaid man hours to bring this wonderful ionic technology to its current level.  Nothing would please me more than to witness its distribution into worldwide applications.  Also, I hope this final product becomes the instrument of  a humanitarian effort embraced by many.
  
*Note: a succession plan is in place
____________________________________________________________________________

WHAT'S INSIDE  

                                                         

  4" Watertight case     circuit assembly   Bottom tungsten emitter & Top solar panel

_____________________________________________________________________________

ONE OF MANY TEST RESULTS

Chart above depicts comparative results of only four (4) cherry tomato plants

_____________________________________________________________________________

What We Need & What You Get

We want to raise both money and public awareness to make this technology available to literally everyone.  This will involve expensive direct video marketing campaigns and product sample distribution.  We are targeting only $85,000 with this campaign, which will be used to pay for more publicity to increase the momentum we seek.  The research and development is finished, Tooling and manufacturing is in place,  Beta testing has been completed.

We have set aside a sizable portion of our existing inventory as perks.  The goal is to get these devices into the hands of actual users, whether backyard gardeners or small truck farmers, who will spread the word of their positive experience. 
 
Even if we do not reach our initial goal, we will have made strides to increase product exposure and public awareness, and chipped away at the most difficult hurdle of all...educating our market!

While the beneficial effects of treating plants using increased atmospheric ionization have been studied and validated for decades, only now has it become practical. My patent pending technology uses state-of-the-art electronics and physics to overcome the problems faced by earlier researchers.  It is quite complex and not easily understood by most people and therein lies the challenge. We must first educate and validate our target audience who will become users and buyers. This translates to extremely high customer acquisition cost and long breakout periods.  We must also ramp up sales and production to achieve the optimum end price point.

The primarily solar powered product is designed to deliver many years of continuous use.  Since it has no moving parts and does not require batteries the useful life has more to do with the built in solar panel than anything else.  When the purchase price is divided by many years of use, it becomes quite inexpensive. Communicating and demonstrating this to the potential user is the real challenge.

                           

             

A single treated tomato plant on the left    Compare just  one week of produce

    and a  untreated plant on the right                                  out of 11 weeks total


The Impact                "The Greenest of Green"

Imagine, if you will, if we could increase crop yields by 30% or more while simultaneously optimizing water use and minimizing infestation by insects. Imagine doing this without chemicals, herbicides, or genetic alterations.  Imagine further, if we can accomplish this with a zero carbon footprint by using solar power only. Well, this product does exactly that!  By safely ionizing the carbon dioxide and oxygen the plant absorbs during photosynthesis, a more efficient metabolic rate is achieved resulting in higher yields.  This whole process occurs within the natural diurnal (daily) cycle plants follow.  Most insects (herbivores) are discouraged from feeding upon treated plants due to the harmless electric field generated during the process.

The poor truck farmer in east Ethiopia will be able to simply hang one of the devices above a group of plants (up to 12 plants), then just go about his normal routine.  Later, he will realize he has a healthier crop producing more fruits or vegetables with less water (more absorption and less loss to evaporation) and fewer insect issues.  He may also experience shorter crop cycle time and less fertilizer demand.  After harvest he will simply wipe clean the solar array on the top of the unit and the pure tungsten emitter on the bottom of the device and be ready to use it again in additional growth cycles year after year.

Yes, it is going to rain and be overcast some days.  Also, prevailing winds are going to blow away the majority of ions the device is producing.  All of these factors have been considered and dealt with in the design of this device.  The waterproof device will shut down in some circumstances then restart when conditions improve. The minimum ion concentration required by most plants have been calculated through years of research; thus, losses due to environmental effects have been factored into the design to insure plants received an average needed concentration through an entire growth cycle.  And NO, the device does not use radioactive isotopes or generate ozone or oxides of nitrogen.  It is completely safe!

Indoors, the Ion-A-Gro can be operated using grow lights or with an included wall adapter to power the device on a 24/7 basis if desired. The wall adapter uses less than 1/10 of a  watt of energy, making it extremely energy efficient.

Risks & Challenges

As with any new product or technology, risk and challenges always exist.  We have met most of the challenges and are through the start-up R & D phase and into actual production and distribution.  As required by law, our international patent applications were published in mid-March 2015 which exposed drawings and schematics to possible "Knock Off" activity.  This is always a threat as product success evolves.  We doubt possible knock offs will be capable of competing effectively with our offshore pricing, quality control, and unique design. But, if they do, we will have patent protection and brand identity.  Also, as the saying goes, "Imitation is the highest form of flattery".  After all, our primary goal is to get this technology into as widespread use as possible, both domestically and in third world countries.

The Cannabis connection:  While not our primary focus, it was inevitable that the growers of medical marijuana would gravitate toward this product.  A new L.L.C has been formed and licensed to distribute the product in this emerging industry. We granted them a non-exclusive restricted license for use in only legal medical growing enterprises.  They have their own web site at www.ionagro.com.  We regard this as a "means to an end" in that it generates revenue and increases our production levels, thereby helping to reduce manufacturing costs.  We also have grape growers as well as  groups raising competition orchids and the like purchasing the product from our dealers and our web site. 

               

         

Zenion Merlot vineyard     Left side is ion treated        Multiple Plant Treatment 

The product itself has been engineered to the highest safety standards and, where applicable, is listed with Underwriters Labs (U.L) and Foreign Standards (CE).


TESTIMONIALS:

"In January we placed an Ion-A-Gro above a very tired looking phalaenops orchid.  Four months later my orchid has doubled its leaf output and has two full spikes of blooms. We can't wait to see what it will do for our newly planted tomato plants!"

Linda Musick, Retired Teacher,  and   Dr. Roy Musick, M.D. (retired),
Santa Rosa, CA
______________________________

"I bought an Ion-A-Gro recently and hung it above one of my tomato plants and to say the least the results are dramatic!  Thank you for an honestly great product."

Larrry Smith, Railroad Engineer (retired),   Roseburg, OR
_____________________________

"I could not believe my eyes.  I witnessed the Ion-A-Gro product in a separated part of my friend's garden and everything was growing so much larger and healthier compared to their untreated plants."

Ben Blom, Landscape Contractor ,  Rohnert Park, CA
______________________________

"I was rather skeptical at first, but after just a few weeks it was obvious the Ion-A-Gro was having a huge effect upon my garden plants.  Compared to untreated  plants, there was almost a two to one increase in plant size and fruit/produce production. Wow!"

B. Blake,  I.R.S. Revenue Officer (retired),   Penngrove, CA 
________________________________
While testing the Ion-A-Gro units for several cycles our yields have been significantly increased.  As well, we have noticed that while mites existed in our facility, they appeared to be significantly reduced in the grow rooms that were utilizing Ion-A-Gro units.  So far there is reason to believe that the units are of profound interest to any grower, hobbyist or commercial enterprise.

Mike Nelson
Senior Vice President
PalliaTech, Inc.
_____________________________________________________________________________


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute to our campaign perhaps you can still help by aiding us in getting the word out to your friends, family and associates.  You can direct them to this campaign website by using any of the Indiegogo share tools or you can direct them to our website at www.zenion.org where they can review a full description of the technology, its history and some current testimonials from actual users.
_____________________________________________________________________________

WHAT'S COMING:

We have had numerous requests to provide a much larger and more powerful unit to handle larger areas both indoors and out.  We have designed and prototyped a commercial-sized unit which is capable of handling an entire greenhouse or large outdoor growing area.  Our initial consumer beta test product was called i-Grow and would only handle about three plants at a time.  The upgraded Ion-A-Gro product will handle up to 12 plants simultaneously.  This new commercial-sized unit will handle up to 100 plants at a time!

   

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

We have also designed and built a commercial growers test kit which provides tools to monitor atmospheric ionization levels, soil P.H, light levels, temperature and dew point as well as air movement.

                                             

These items can be purchased separately or as a bundled kit which includes tracking forms and customized algorithms.

_____________________________________________________________________________

A FEW OF OUR TARGETED INTERNATIONAL FOOD CHARITIES:

It was two years ago that the world population estimate hit 7 billion.  Here at Heifer International, we're continuing our work of helping smallholder farmers around the world learn sustainable agriculture practices, increase their family's nutrition and income and contribute to community and economic development. Empowering smallholder farmers, especially women, to grow more food more sustainably is the best solution to ending hunger and poverty worldwide.

                                 

Eighty percent of the developing world's food

is raised on about half a billion small farms.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WORLD FOOD PROGRAMME

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                                                            

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Farm Africa U.S.A., Inc. 
 a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization which supports programs run by Farm Africa.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Additional technical information and studies are available at:         www.zenion.org
story_txt:
500 MILLION SMALL FARMS IN AFRICA ALONE!

My name is Jim Lee and I am the founder of Zenion Industries, Inc. (est. 1979) located in Northern California.  I am the inventor of many electronic products which have been licensed to other companies in the fields of medicine, air cleaning and industrial controls.  This latest product, the Ion-A-Gro, is one of my most exciting accomplishments.  It will dramatically improve the way we grow our food in a completely natural and organic manner, just as nature intended.

It has taken us over a dozen years and hundreds of thousands of dollars of our own money to study and develop this innovative product to its current level.  It is now ready to enter its final step into the worldwide marketplace.  It is not without challenges because it is new and not easily understood.  Our sales and production demands have not yet reached quantities sufficient to bring the retail price point down to our target of less than $25.  This is where we need your help.  We must increase awareness of this new product and broadcast the validity of its effectiveness.  While we have received many positive testimonials from actual users, greater exposure is needed to convince our target market of the legitimacy of this technology. More importantly, this technology will help food producers around the world grow crops safely and more efficiently, thus mitigating a growing global food shortage.

Zenion has established a rather unique business model which, we believe, will get us over the final hurdles while simultaneously providing a "win-win" scenario for all involved.  Zenion intends to evolve into a "not-for-profit" organization which will use net revenue from direct sales to fund charitable distribution of the product to worldwide growers who could not otherwise afford to purchase units. Not to be confused with a "non-profit" organization which rely on donations, our organization, Zenion, will use sustainable cash revenues to fund distribution of the product to those most in need.

This is not a get-rich-quick project; indeed, the net revenues will be re-invested into inventory for distribution primarily into third-world countries.  I am approaching 70 years of age and have been blessed with a long successful career.  I neither require nor desire personal profit from this venture.  I look forward to a comfortable retirement in the not-too-distant future* using accumulated revenue from patent royalties from other products I invented and successfully brought to market.  I have invested large sums of money and thousands of unpaid man hours to bring this wonderful ionic technology to its current level.  Nothing would please me more than to witness its distribution into worldwide applications.  Also, I hope this final product becomes the instrument of  a humanitarian effort embraced by many.
  

*Note: a succession plan is in place

____________________________________________________________________________

WHAT'S INSIDE  

                                                         


  4" Watertight case     circuit assembly   Bottom tungsten emitter & Top solar panel
_____________________________________________________________________________
ONE OF MANY TEST RESULTS
 

Chart above depicts comparative results of only four (4) cherry tomato plants
_____________________________________________________________________________
  What We Need & What You Get
We want to raise both money and public awareness to make this technology available to literally everyone.  This will involve expensive direct video marketing campaigns and product sample distribution.  We are targeting only $85,000 with this campaign, which will be used to pay for more publicity to increase the momentum we seek.  The research and development is finished, Tooling and manufacturing is in place,  Beta testing has been completed.

We have set aside a sizable portion of our existing inventory as perks.  The goal is to get these devices into the hands of actual users, whether backyard gardeners or small truck farmers, who will spread the word of their positive experience. 
 
Even if we do not reach our initial goal, we will have made strides to increase product exposure and public awareness, and chipped away at the most difficult hurdle of all...educating our market!

While the beneficial effects of treating plants using increased atmospheric ionization have been studied and validated for decades, only now has it become practical. My patent pending technology uses state-of-the-art electronics and physics to overcome the problems faced by earlier researchers.  It is quite complex and not easily understood by most people and therein lies the challenge. We must first educate and validate our target audience who will become users and buyers. This translates to extremely high customer acquisition cost and long breakout periods.  We must also ramp up sales and production to achieve the optimum end price point.

The primarily solar powered product is designed to deliver many years of continuous use.  Since it has no moving parts and does not require batteries the useful life has more to do with the built in solar panel than anything else.  When the purchase price is divided by many years of use, it becomes quite inexpensive. Communicating and demonstrating this to the potential user is the real challenge.
                           
             
A single treated tomato plant on the left    Compare just  one week of produce
    and a  untreated plant on the right                                  out of 11 weeks total
    The Impact                "The Greenest of Green"

Imagine, if you will, if we could increase crop yields by 30% or more while simultaneously optimizing water use and minimizing infestation by insects. Imagine doing this without chemicals, herbicides, or genetic alterations.  Imagine further, if we can accomplish this with a zero carbon footprint by using solar power only. Well, this product does exactly that!  By safely ionizing the carbon dioxide and oxygen the plant absorbs during photosynthesis, a more efficient metabolic rate is achieved resulting in higher yields.  This whole process occurs within the natural diurnal (daily) cycle plants follow.  Most insects (herbivores) are discouraged from feeding upon treated plants due to the harmless electric field generated during the process.

The poor truck farmer in east Ethiopia will be able to simply hang one of the devices above a group of plants (up to 12 plants), then just go about his normal routine.  Later, he will realize he has a healthier crop producing more fruits or vegetables with less water (more absorption and less loss to evaporation) and fewer insect issues.  He may also experience shorter crop cycle time and less fertilizer demand.  After harvest he will simply wipe clean the solar array on the top of the unit and the pure tungsten emitter on the bottom of the device and be ready to use it again in additional growth cycles year after year.

Yes, it is going to rain and be overcast some days.  Also, prevailing winds are going to blow away the majority of ions the device is producing.  All of these factors have been considered and dealt with in the design of this device.  The waterproof device will shut down in some circumstances then restart when conditions improve. The minimum ion concentration required by most plants have been calculated through years of research; thus, losses due to environmental effects have been factored into the design to insure plants received an average needed concentration through an entire growth cycle.  And NO, the device does not use radioactive isotopes or generate ozone or oxides of nitrogen.  It is completely safe!

Indoors, the Ion-A-Gro can be operated using grow lights or with an included wall adapter to power the device on a 24/7 basis if desired. The wall adapter uses less than 1/10 of a  watt of energy, making it extremely energy efficient.

    Risks & Challenges
As with any new product or technology, risk and challenges always exist.  We have met most of the challenges and are through the start-up R & D phase and into actual production and distribution.  As required by law, our international patent applications were published in mid-March 2015 which exposed drawings and schematics to possible "Knock Off" activity.  This is always a threat as product success evolves.  We doubt possible knock offs will be capable of competing effectively with our offshore pricing, quality control, and unique design. But, if they do, we will have patent protection and brand identity.  Also, as the saying goes, "Imitation is the highest form of flattery".  After all, our primary goal is to get this technology into as widespread use as possible, both domestically and in third world countries.


The Cannabis connection:  While not our primary focus, it was inevitable that the growers of medical marijuana would gravitate toward this product.  A new L.L.C has been formed and licensed to distribute the product in this emerging industry. We granted them a non-exclusive restricted license for use in only legal medical growing enterprises.  They have their own web site at www.ionagro.com.  We regard this as a "means to an end" in that it generates revenue and increases our production levels, thereby helping to reduce manufacturing costs.  We also have grape growers as well as  groups raising competition orchids and the like purchasing the product from our dealers and our web site. 


               
         
Zenion Merlot vineyard     Left side is ion treated        Multiple Plant Treatment 
The product itself has been engineered to the highest safety standards and, where applicable, is listed with Underwriters Labs (U.L) and Foreign Standards (CE).
 
 
TESTIMONIALS:
"In January we placed an Ion-A-Gro above a very tired looking phalaenops orchid.  Four months later my orchid has doubled its leaf output and has two full spikes of blooms. We can't wait to see what it will do for our 
newly planted tomato plants!"Linda Musick, Retired Teacher,  and   Dr. Roy Musick, M.D. (retired),Santa Rosa, CA______________________________"I bought an Ion-A-Gro recently and hung it above one of my tomato plants and to say the least the results are dramatic!  Thank you for an honestly great product."Larrry Smith, Railroad Engineer (retired),   Roseburg, OR_____________________________"I could not believe my eyes.  I witnessed the Ion-A-Gro product in a 
separated part of my friend's garden and everything was growing so much 
larger and healthier compared to their untreated plants."Ben Blom, Landscape Contractor ,  Rohnert Park, CA______________________________"I was rather skeptical at first, but after just a few weeks it was 
obvious the Ion-A-Gro was having a huge effect upon my garden plants.  
Compared to untreated  plants, there was almost a two to one increase in plant size and fruit/produce production. Wow!"B. Blake,  I.R.S. Revenue Officer (retired),   Penngrove, CA 
________________________________
While testing the Ion-A-Gro units for several cycles our yields have been significantly increased.  As well, we have noticed that while mites existed in our facility, they appeared to be significantly reduced in the grow rooms that were utilizing Ion-A-Gro units.  So far there is reason to believe that the units are of profound interest to any grower, hobbyist or commercial enterprise.

Mike Nelson
Senior Vice President
PalliaTech, Inc.
_____________________________________________________________________________

   Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot contribute to our campaign perhaps you can still help by aiding us in getting the word out to your friends, family and associates.  You can direct them to this campaign website by using any of the Indiegogo share tools or you can direct them to our website at www.zenion.org where they can review a full description of the technology, its history and some current testimonials from actual users.
_____________________________________________________________________________
WHAT'S COMING:
We have had numerous requests to provide a much larger and more powerful unit to handle larger areas both indoors and out.  We have designed and prototyped a commercial-sized unit which is capable of handling an entire greenhouse or large outdoor growing area.  Our initial consumer beta test product was called i-Grow and would only handle about three plants at a time.  The upgraded Ion-A-Gro product will handle up to 12 plants simultaneously.  This new commercial-sized unit will handle up to 100 plants at a time!

   
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
We have also designed and built a commercial growers test kit which provides tools to monitor atmospheric ionization levels, soil P.H, light levels, temperature and dew point as well as air movement.


                                             
These items can be purchased separately or as a bundled kit which includes tracking forms and customized algorithms.
_____________________________________________________________________________
A FEW OF OUR TARGETED INTERNATIONAL FOOD CHARITIES:
It was two years ago that the world population estimate hit 7 billion.  Here at Heifer International, we're continuing our work of helping smallholder farmers around the world learn sustainable agriculture practices, increase their family's nutrition and income and contribute to community and economic development. Empowering smallholder farmers, especially women, to grow more food more sustainably is the best solution to ending hunger and poverty worldwide.

                                 
Eighty percent of the developing world's food
is raised on about half a billion small farms.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



WORLD FOOD PROGRAMME
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

story:
Explications des CONTREPARTIES

Les Points cadeaux pourront être utilisés sur www.capdemocratie.org pour :

_ accéder à des dossiers thématiques, articles et fonctions réservées aux abonnés et soutiens actifs de l’Institut Cap Démocratie ;

_ soutenir des élus et des candidats en leur permettant de promouvoir leurs convictions et campagnes sur www.capdemocratie.org

_ participer aux concours annuels de www.capdemocratie.org dotés de cadeaux fort utiles à votre engagement démocratique. 

Plus vous possédez de Points cadeaux de l’Institut Cap Démocratie, plus vous avez accès aux fonctionnalités du site www.capdemocratie.org et plus vous pouvez soutenir des candidats et des élus.

10 € = 10 Points cadeaux

25 € = 30 Points cadeaux

50 € = 75 Points cadeaux

100 € = 175 Points cadeaux

500 € = 1000 Points cadeaux

1000 € = 2500 Points cadeaux

Au-delà de 1000 €, tout € = 2.5 Points cadeaux

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

• Pourquoi ce nom ; Institut Cap Démocratie ?
Parce que :
➢ Les électeurs votent de moins en moins et le grand gagnant des élections est très souvent le taux d’abstention.
➢ Les électeurs ont de moins en moins confiance dans leurs politiques.
➢ Quand nous votons, nous votons de plus en plus contre quelqu’un ou un projet, alors que nous devrions voter pour quelqu’un ou un projet. Les électeurs doivent savoir pour qui et pour quoi ils votent.
➢ Combien d’électeurs connaissent le nom de leur député européen ? de leur sénateur ? de leur conseiller général ? Le lien humain entre les élus et les électeurs est en danger.
➢ Combien savent ce que leurs élus font après avoir été élus ? Quelles sont leurs fonctions ? leurs prises de positions ? leurs actions ? leurs votes ?...
➢ Les promesses électorales sont trop souvent oubliées une fois l’élection passée et ne reviennent dans les médias qu’aux échéances électorales suivantes.
➢ Les liens personnels entre les électeurs et les élus sont trop souvent parasités par les partis politiques et assujettis à des volontés nationales ne rejoignant que très rarement le quotidien des électeurs.
➢ La Démocratie est en danger si ces liens ne sont pas rétablis au plus vite !

• Comment agir ? 
« Car celui-là qui veille modestement quelques moutons sous les étoiles, s’il prend conscience de son rôle, se découvre plus qu’un serviteur. Il est une sentinelle. Et chaque sentinelle est responsable de tout l’Empire. » Antoine de Saint-Exupéry, Terre des hommes

« Toute personne a le droit de prendre part à la direction des affaires publiques de son pays, soit directement, soit par l’intermédiaire de représentants librement choisis.» Déclaration Universelle des Droits de l’Homme du 10/12/1948 (art. 21-1)



➢ L'Institut Cap Démocratie est votre outil pour agir et rétablir ce lien démocratique entre électeurs et élus.
➢ L'Institut Cap Démocratie veut que la Démocratie ne soit plus un feu de paille électoral mais bien une réalité quotidienne vécue par les électeurs et les élus.
➢ L'Institut Cap Démocratie va rassembler sur un même outil, accessible à tous et gratuit, tout ce qui concerne vos élus de façon à ce que vous puissiez non seulement savoir qui ils sont, ce qu’ils font et ce qu’ils disent sans avoir à passer des heures en recherche de ces informations, mais aussi afin que vous puissiez voter en conscience et au plus près de vos convictions. Ne plus voter contre, mais voter pour !
➢ Investissez-vous dans l'Institut Cap Démocratie : c’est votre outil, faite-le vivre ! Soyez un acteur de la Démocratie en devenant un relais de l'Institut Cap Démocratie. Pour cela vous pouvez, dès l’ouverture du site :

  1. Inviter vos élus locaux et nationaux à renseigner leurs fiches sur Institut Cap Démocratie.
  2. Créer votre compte sur Institut Cap Démocratie
  3. Nous envoyer les informations des élus que vous soutenez (ou non) afin que nous puissions apporter le plus de renseignements possibles sur chacun (seules les données vérifiables et vérifiées seront mises en ligne). Plus nous renseignerons leurs fiches, plus ils seront visibles et connus par les électeurs.
  4. Diffuser autour de vous l’existence de l'Institut Cap Démocratie.
  5. Inviter vos amis et relations à s’inscrire dès aujourd'hui sur http://capdemocratie.org/#newsletter
  6. Soutenir financièrement ce projet. Plus nous serons aidés, plus nos capacités d’actions seront élevées. Pour pouvoir ouvrir le site de l'Institut Cap Démocratie au 3ème trimestre 2015, nous avons besoin de trouver 30.000 €, aidez-nous à lancer l'aventure en dépassant ces 5.000 premiers € nécessaires. Que vous soyez élus et/ou électeurs, vous pouvez soutenir ce projet, car c’est votre outil, quelles que soient vos convictions politiques. Paiement par chèque à l’ordre de Institut Cap Démocratie avec reçu fiscal ou par cette campagne de crowdfunding.
➢ Si vous êtes un élu, nous vous invitons à nous contacter par courriel (institut@capdemocratie.org). Nous vous enverrons alors un questionnaire qui vous permettra de bien renseigner votre fiche sur Institut Cap Démocratie.

Soyez un acteur de la Démocratie en devenant un relais de l'Institut Cap Démocratie. Pour cela vous pouvez, dès l’ouverture du site :

Créer votre compte sur Institut Cap Démocratie


Nous envoyer les informations des élus que vous soutenez (ou non) afin que nous puissions apporter le plus de renseignements possibles sur chacun (seules les données vérifiables et vérifiées seront mises en ligne). Plus nous renseignerons leurs fiches, plus ils seront visibles et connus par les électeurs.


Diffuser autour de vous l’existence de l'Institut Cap Démocratie.


Inviter vos amis et relations à s’inscrire dès aujourd'hui sur http://capdemocratie.org/#newsletter


Soutenir financièrement ce projet. Plus nous serons aidés, plus nos capacités d’actions seront élevées. Pour pouvoir ouvrir le site de l'Institut Cap Démocratie au 3ème trimestre 2015, nous avons besoin de trouver 30.000 €, aidez-nous à lancer l'aventure en dépassant ces 5.000 premiers € nécessaires. Que vous soyez élus et/ou électeurs, vous pouvez soutenir ce projet, car c’est votre outil, quelles que soient vos convictions politiques. story:
Who Is Behind This Campaign

Hey there everyone, 

I am George Delaportas and I am a Computer Expert, an inventor and an innovator.

I was born and raised in the beautiful island of Corfu, located in the Ionian Islands at the western borders of Greece. I am a Greek with passion in innovation and technology. I believe that nothing is "impossible" and that's how I step forward in my life. I am a proud Rotarian and I serve people around the world through my activities. I am also a Prodigy in Computers and Cyber-Security since the age of 15. 

I decided to start this campaign so that all together further develop and finalize what I call "3D WiFi Bubbles" and which I strongly believe is the biggest Innovation ever happened in WiFi.

You can find more on me at: http://about.me/gdelaportas


What Is This About

I have developed a fantastic solution for the hospitality / tourism industry that also helps underdeveloped countries.

My solution is called: "3D WiFi Bubbles".
3D WiFi Bubbles is a technology that provides Open Free WiFi & added-value services for hotels, cafe bars, restaurants, malls, airports, etc. in a dynamic 3D space radius (bubble).

Essentially, 3D WiFi Bubbles introduces a new way for businesses to make money and a new market for customers to enjoy unique and tailor-made services.


Why Is This Useful For My Customers

This technology enables your customers to:

  1. Get instant WiFi access on the Internet (without password)
  2. Have access ONLY when they are in your outlet (no more "free" Internet for people passing by or customers of outlets nearby)
  3. Use less battery while they are connected (save 2+ hours)
  4. Captive portal: ads, promos and offers in their smartphones (without any app)
  5. Enjoy unique services in a white Label custom made mobile App


Why Would I Want It For My Business

3D WiFi Bubbles also provides added-value services for your business such as:

  1. Dynamic control of your Internet speed depending on your customers' class (simple, VIP)
  2. Ability to profile your customers' from their smart devices (position, drink/food, time/frequency of presence/staying)

  3. Total security by guarding your perimeter or inner space



How Do I Install It

In order to start using 3D WiFi you need to have the 3D WiFi Bubbles (generator) Box which is actually an access point/hot spot.

To install it just:

  1. Choose a high place to put it. (e.g. ceiling, somewhere high on a wall...)
  2. Plug-in the AC Cord and an Ethernet cable from your router.
  3. Users/customers choose the “3D-WiFi-Bubbles” network -while in range- from any smart device and get connected.

Stage Of Development

I have already developed the prototype and I have a Proof-of-Concept running in a large cafeteria. People seem to enjoy it and all is good so far. My solution is online for more than one month without any issues or glitches.

     


Here you see the 1st Proof-of-Concept.

The prototype is consisted of 5 things (hardware):
  1. The main terminal (Access Point)
  2. SD Card (8GB)
  3. WiFi antenna
  4. Ethernet cable 100/1000 (1.5m)
  5. EU Charger - 240V/2A (2m)
The software that lies inside the SD Card is the heart and brain of 3D WiFi Bubbles. It's the "3D WiFi Fencing" technology that enables  precise control over space and lets the "Bubbles" transmit information in the specified 3D range.

The cafeteria where I put it, is: "Kalimera" and in Greek it means: "Good Morning".

Furthermore, I have found 2 big hotels around Greece that will host my invention.


Social Impact

Finally, 3D WiFi Bubbles technology will help underdeveloped countries and will save thousands:

  1. People get Free & fast WiFi access instantly -without password- so they can ask for help very quickly (e.g police)
  2. Eco-friendly/Assists Economy - Battery consumption lowers down while users are connected (saves 2+ hours)
  3. Dynamic control of the Internet speed - Assists old and obsolete infrastructures to perform better (e.g ISPs, Telcos)
  4. Ability to profile communities and their consumed resources from their smart devices - Smart cities (position, water/food, time/frequency)

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

It's logical for people to have questions. Some people don't understand the technology behind 3D WiFi Bubbles and the solution itself. So, I gathered all the common FAQs I could recall so far and I placed them here to help you see the value and the big picture.

How is this different from what other existing solutions like SocialWiFi does?

SocialWiFi along with all other similar solutions expect from their users/customers to get connected in a network where a password is required and/or usually redirect them to a captive portal. This a prerequisite since they don't have the "3D WiFi Fencing" technology that encloses a certain space into a bubble and lets only customers to connect. Furthermore, these solutions do not do anything else other than fetching personal data and information from the connected social media accounts for their benefit and the benefit of businesses. 3D WiFi Bubbles on the other hand cares about personal data and takes security very seriously. No personal information is shared for no reason to any business owner or third party tool unless explicitly allowed and confirmed by the user/customer!

Does 3D WiFi Bubbles use GPS or Google location services?

Absolutely not. 3D WiFi Bubbles is a WiFi technology and does not need either GPS or any Google location services to function. After all, GPS is useless indoor and Google location services have near to zero precision in such cases. Furthermore, GPS and all location services drain battery too fast and it was my intention from the very beginning to put them off the way. With 3D  WiFi Bubbles, WiFi is all you need!

Can this solution charge my phone while I am connected?

No. 3D WiFi does not charge your phone. But, it tries to minimize your battery consumption by utilizing smart algorithms that alter your WiFi speed and transmission quality per case. It usually makes a very good job and saves up to 4 hours of battery time. (Depending on your battery capacity, running applications and type of your smart device)

Why, can't anyone else do that or even worse copy that?

3D WiFi Bubbles is currently based on a patented hardware (Raspberry Pi). For testing purposes this is fine but I am planning to create my very own proprietary board. It is true that anyone could get a Raspberry Pi, a WiFi antenna and all the stuff and replicate the hardware. What anyone else couldn't do though, is to replicate or copy the changes I've made in its firmware, some other altered technical details and finally the source code that lies inside it.

Will this device ever hit the market?

Most certainly yes. I already have some good feedback from people around me who seem to be intrigued by what this device can do and how services provided from within it will change the landscape.

Which underdeveloped countries will be most affected from this invention?

I have conducted a serious research from the tools that I am given by the Rotary International. I found that in Nigeria people suffer most. Especially in Lagos, the obsolete infrastructures (lack of stable electrical network, telecommunications, etc.) and the unstable climate and political environment (gangs, water issues, diseases) push people to the edge. These people have no way of escaping and when there are bursts of crisis have almost zero ways to communicate.


My Goal

The reason I started this campaign is because I need you to help me build the final project (hardware and software) so that I can offer quality services to businesses and humanitarian aid in underdeveloped countries. Like every visionary and dreamer I hope for the best outcome with a look to a better future, more secure, more human and more accessible to everyone...

Thank you all for your support in advance!


Honestly yours,
George Delaportas
Innovator and Inventor

I am a Greek with passion in innovation and technology. I believe that nothing is "impossible" and that's how I step forward in my life. I am a proud Rotarian and I serve people around the world through my activities. I am also a Prodigy in Computers and Cyber-Security since the age of 15. I decided to start this campaign so that all together further develop and finalize what I call "3D WiFi Bubbles" and which I strongly believe is the biggest Innovation ever happened in WiFi.You can find more on me at: http://about.me/gdelaportas

story:
Short Summary

We are April and Azur Moulaert, former vagabonds that ended up in Burlington, Vermont.  We love Vermont.  We are passionate about food.  We are passionate about sustainable agriculture (both of us have our MS degrees in this field).  We have a strong connection to Latin America (Azur is Costa Rican). As sustainable agriculture loving foodies, we see some gaps in the Vermont food system.

One of these gaps is the lack of locally produced tortillas.   Presently you cannot buy tortillas in Burlington, Vermont at the local markets that are organic.  You cannot buy tortillas at the markets in Vermont  that are produced using local corn.  And you certainly cannot buy tortillas in Vermont that are produced the traditional way through nixtimalization  (http://decolonizeyourdiet.org/2013/07/making-gm...).

(http://www.motherearthnews.com/real-food/make-m...)

Tortillas produced through nixtimalization are more nutritious than those found in the supermarket (that are typically produced with masa) and they taste much better.  Therefore, we see an opportunity to create an added value product using organic locally produced corn.    The corn shown in the photo  below is organic dent corn from Maine.  We will source a similar corn from Vermont and neighboring upstate New York, based on availability.  We have already identified two sources for this years production.  In the future we hope to have farmers grow special ancient grain variety of corns for us, but these are presently not possible to find in the quantities needed.  


With your donation, we can get to where we want and need to be quicker, and we can demonstrate that others share our passion.  If it's a good idea, why not contribute?

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $30,000 to help us cover about half of  the cost of the equipment that we need to make the tortillas.  The equipment is pricey, but necessary to produce tortillas at the scale we wish to.   The photo below is similar to the the type of equipment we will be buying.  

We are working actively on our business plan. We have visited a business similar to the one we wish to open in Portland, Maine and were inspired and educated by the fabulous Lynn Rowe (http://www.pachangatortillas.com/).  Azur went through the whole production process with her.   We have identified a space and we expect to enter into a lease agreement in the next month or so.

We have the energy, we have the passion, we need YOU!

If we do not reach our goal, we will figure out a way to make this happen.  But we would love to have your help.

The Impact

Your contribution will help support farmers in Vermont, will encourage farmers to grow organic corn (few do!), and will taste yummy and make you smile!

Risks & Challenges

We are concerned about the lack of organic corn currently grown in Vermont.  We have done the research, and we find it shocking that much of the Vermont landscape is planted to corn, and it is mostly field corn for animals that is not organic and GMO.

We are hoping that we help to increase the market for locally sourced organic corn, and that we can get contracts with farmers to grow this type of corn for us.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help moneywise- we could use any help you can offer!  At a minimum, please spread the word on the campaign.

story: hi everyone basically i trying to raise funds for my wife family in the philippines to treat them to a car to make life much easier for them getting around saving having to use public transport all the time which is in the home city is tricycles which are not great if carrying alot of shopping etc cos they squeeze as many people as possible on to them although for me its fun to go on them and have done plenty they are not great to use and not that safe really, soo the reason im asking for help in funding this is because im currently saving up to make large repairs to my wifes family home aswell as its got alot of damage from all the typhoons and other bad weather that pass through the philippines i want to able to reapit the home and get a car at the same time so if anyone can help even small donations it would highly appreciated and really is for a good cause

story:
Short Summary

Hi my name is Gromiko Tchanmeni, I am 21 years of age and I am the CEO of our real estate company located in Cameroon. I work with my fraternal twin brother Enstein. We are sophomores in college and we reside in Maryland. Ever since middle school it has been a passion of ours to not only open a real estate company in Cameroon, but to build a community base environment to help others feel at home. We have managed to save up enough money to buy two lands were we can begin to build.

The mission of our campaign is to build affordable apartments for the masses. Building a community base environment is our first priority and we strongly believe that real estate will play a big role in that. Our core values are to establish a community atmosphere, ignite excitement and to assure low cost of living. This campaign is tremendously important to us because we sincerely feel that we have an obligation to help reshape the living conditions back home. Buying our first two land is a stepping stone towards that direction.

To contribute whether it be money or word of mouth would be a valuable tool to help us reach our goal. Reaching our goal will help us complete a four level apartment building that would be sold at a very low price. Aside from that the money will also be used to build a recreational park, so kids can have a place to have fun while being monitored by their family. 

What We Need & What You Get 

We would need $705,500 to help build our four level apartment building. Before building, there will be a couple of equipment's we would need. Cement, Iron bars, sand, glass and wood. Iron bars are extremely important because it will help strengthen and hold concrete in tension. A total of $12,000 would be needed for that.

1. Foundation would need to be put in place which would cost $100,000

2. The whole apartment building will have four levels. Each levels would consist of two apartments. Each apartments will have two bedrooms, two bathrooms, a kitchen and a living room. 1500 square foot per apartments. It will cost $55,000 per apartment to have that set up. A total of $440,000.

3. Solar panels will be set up to bring about electricity to the building. We love the idea of solar panels because it not only preserves the environment, it is renewable and cost effective for our consumers. Our consumers will never have to worry about electricity shortage. $100,000 would be needed for that.

4. $32,000 will be needed for electric wiring and plumbing system for the entire building.

5. Because of living conditions, it is sometimes difficult for people to get access to clean drinkable water. My brother and I came up with the idea of building an independent water system connected to the building that will purify the water before it comes in, so people can use it without getting sick. A cost of $20,000 will be needed for that.

6. We wanted to also build a recreational park not too far from the building for kids to enjoy themselves while being monitored by their family. A cost of $1,500 will needed for that.

7. A grand total of $705,500 will be needed to build the entire building

The Impact

My brother and I are excited about this project, it is a dream that is slowly coming to reality. Our project will provide accessibility to clean water, a safe environment for children, affordable housing for families and a cheaper alternative to electricity through the solar panels we will install. Contributions from others will change the living conditions and reshape the way people live. Our goal goes beyond the line of just building, it also entices an overall objective to help uplift others from their current living conditions. 

Risks & Challenges

There is really no risk that is involved with our campaign. However, there are definitely going to be some challenges that we would face down the road. Examples of those challenges can include a difference of opinion in regards to building the apartments. Another example can be our working team not being on schedule. These challenges are typical challenges that every new entrepreneur faces when building a project. 

Other Ways You Can Help

I encourage those who read this campaign to contribute and spread the word around whether it by Facebook, Instagram, Snap chat or emails.

story:
The Kinette Club of Barrie

The Kinette Club of Barrie is a Canadian-based non-profit organization that strives to serve the community’s greatest needs.

In our six years of operation, The Kinette Club of Barrie has supported such initiatives as C.O.P.E., Season’s Center for Grieving Children, The David Busby Center, Senior’s Wish Association, The Royal Canadian Legion, Hospice Simcoe,

Christmas Cheer, Rainbows Canada, and Cystic Fibrosis Canada. 

The Club Executive:

President / Treasurer - Bonnie Davies, is the new President of the Club and has been the Treasurer for the past 2 years.

Project Chair - Veronique Delaunois, was a founding member of the Kinette Club of Barrie, and President of the Club from 2011-2014.  Has been the project chair of Cocktails and Gowns since 2011.

Other Great Projects:

About the Project:

The Kinette Club of Barrie’s Cocktails & Gowns fundraising event is an annual event that was started in 2012. This is the club’s largest fundraising event of the year. 

It will be held on April 25th, 2015 at the Edge Hill Banquet Hall, Barrie, Ont

Time : 6:30pm.

This year’s event is themed “An Evening in Paris” and will consist of a French-themed dinner, a French-themed fashion show, entertainment, and a silent auction.

The fashion show will be the main focus of the event. The show is created by students who are studying in the European Pattern Making course and are thought by Maria Calautti, owner of Le Grand Chic Italia School of Fashion. The students will choose a French designer and one of his/her designs and recreate it. During the show we will be able to see a presentation of the original design, the outfit created by the student and the reason why they choose a particular designer and their creation. The event should reflect an Evening in Paris with all its glamour.

Past Event Pictures :


Event Goals

The goal for this fundraising event is to be able to raise funds for our community and to make our community a better place to live. One of our main donations is to o Cystic Fibrosis Canada to help find a cure for this disease.

We are looking to raise a total of $10,000 and are hoping that you will be able to help us achieve our goal through your support of this project.

Other Great Projects:

Great Strides Walk (Yearly)


The Impact

The successful completion of this project will allow the Kinette club to continue to provide support for many of the great projects that we support on a yearly basis.

Please see our web page for details.
www.barriekinettes.ca

Risks & Challenges

This projects has minimal risks to the Event.  The main one being that not enough Tickets are sold to the even to break even.  We are confident the event will run as it has in the past 2 year.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please post event to your face book page and spread the word!
  • Text, Tweet and Tweet again.

is a Canadian-based non-profit organization that strives to serve the
community’s greatest needs. 
In our six years of operation, The
Kinette Club of Barrie has supported such initiatives as C.O.P.E.,
Season’s Center for Grieving Children, The David Busby Center,
Senior’s Wish Association, The Royal Canadian Legion, Hospice
Simcoe, 
Christmas Cheer, Rainbows Canada, and Cystic Fibrosis Canada. 
The Club Executive:
President / Treasurer - Bonnie Davies, is the new President of the Club and has been the Treasurer for the past 2 years. 
Project Chair - Veronique Delaunois, was a founding member of the Kinette Club of Barrie, and President of the Club from 2011-2014.  Has been the project chair of Cocktails and Gowns since 2011.
Other Great Projects:

About the Project:

The Kinette Club of Barrie’s
Cocktails & Gowns fundraising event is an annual event that was
started in 2012.  This is the club’s largest fundraising event of
the year. 
It will be held on April 25th, 2015 at the Edge Hill Banquet Hall, Barrie, Ont
Time : 6:30pm. This year’s event is themed “An Evening in Paris”
and will consist of a French-themed dinner, a French-themed fashion
show, entertainment, and a silent auction.
The fashion show will be the main focus
of the event.  The show is created by students who are studying in
the European Pattern Making course and are thought by Maria Calautti,
owner of Le Grand Chic Italia School of Fashion.  The students will
choose a French designer and one of his/her designs and recreate it. 
During the show we will be able to see a presentation of the original
design, the outfit created by the student and the reason why they
choose a particular designer and their creation.  The event should
reflect an Evening in Paris with all its glamour.
Past Event Pictures :






Event Goals
The goal for this fundraising event is
to be able to raise funds for our community and to make our community
a better place to live.  One of our main donations is to o
Cystic Fibrosis Canada to help find a cure for this disease. 
  We are
looking to raise a total of $10,000 and are hoping that you will be
able to help us achieve our goal through your support of this project.
Other Great Projects:
Great Strides Walk (Yearly)
 The Impact
The successful completion of this project will allow the Kinette club to continue to provide support for many of the great projects that we support on a yearly basis.Please see our web page for details.www.barriekinettes.ca
  Risks & Challenges
This projects has minimal risks to the Event.  The main one being that not enough Tickets are sold to the even to break even.  We are confident the event will run as it has in the past 2 year.
  Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help: 
Please post event to your face book page and spread the word!
Text, Tweet and Tweet again.

story:
I am raising funds for horse transportation to a site in East Hampton for S.E.E.R.'s.  "public intervention" project summer 2015 ,and also for a mobile outreach throughout Suffolk County,Long Island New York.

S.E.E.Rs'   Mission is threefold ;

~ To promote the belief that a horse is of value because of its nature ,being or "Medicine" as opposed to the popular belief that a horses value is equal to its ability to perform physically

~ To provide a horse experience to people who would benefit from it,but cannot afford it.

~ To give horses in desperate situations a new lease on life

 ****UPDATE ****3/27   The remaining 3 Shires have moved to my barn in Easthampton !!! Feeding them is a massive commitment ! 

Although SEER incorporated in 1999, the mission has been my life for over 40 years. I am equally involved with all three aspects.During the 90s' I was moving in the direction of horse rescue,happily many other farms & individuals embraced that. People give me horses with behavior issues and I recycle them,or help privately owned  sport horses transition into pleasure horses when they retire.

I became aware of horse slaughter while attending an auction on Long Island in 1971. My sister and I started " recycling" horses soon after,fortunately we had the use of my families farm in Bay Shore at the time.

Riding thru suburbia on my horse in the 70's,I would always stop and let people love up the horse,sometimes even giving rides.

I would ride into the poorest communities,and to downtown Bay Shore where the outpatients of the mental hospitals roamed. Sometimes even on the grounds of Pilgram State  Phychiactric Hospital. Just to cheer people up with my horse.It's  amazing the vast numbers of people who were locked up in these places before A.A. did so much to help people ,and pharmaceuticals gave people the freedom to be responsible for their own sanity ( or lack of).  As a young girl riding past the barred windows, I suspected the population represented a large portion of the avant guard.(My eldest sister who trained for nursing at Kings Park,concurs.) I had compassion for these people because they had no freedom and were powerless.Maybe that's the attraction with horses,freedom and power,in both a physical and other worldly way.Horses empower their riders,and in my case gave me a lot of freedom.I would go on my horse where I would never go alone. I felt a need to share the beauty of the horses with people in need.

I still do.


My horses and I relocated to Long Islands famous beach community ,the Hamptons,in 1987. People from New York City love to escape to the "country" here.We have many fine stables,that teach people to ride and compete on performance or sport horses. I worked in sport  horse barns full time from 1983-92, when I opened a boarding stable for pleasure horses in East Hampton. ( Cove hollow Stable 92-2001)While working in the  Riding Academy's ,I would always feel kind of sad tacking up (saddling) a horse for new students and seeing how some of them just wanted to love and BE with horses.

However,the precious horse time was to be spent as a"learning" experience.After a couple weeks it seemed the love of horses paled next to the love of having the teachers attention,and getting egos stroked while dominating a powerful animal. Good stuff right? Builds self esteem. Sports are good for the masses,and many people thrive in this environment. Others kind of shrivel up and drop out.Free thinking, sensitive,artistic people are deprived of what would be a gratifying horse experience,because out here in the suburbs of New York City it's just not available.


I am raising funds to create a "public intervention" or " installation" with my horse Tucker as living sculpture. To offer a site where people can freely and safely interact with a free and safe horse.

            

Tucker 2009 ( recycled 2006,he was unmanageable )

I have also had a desire to bring him to schools and teach about pleasure horses,how a relaxed uncomplicated life makes a relaxed uncomplicated SAFE "pleasure" horse.I have been invited to create a program for a children's museum.Whats been holding me back is transportation.The $5000. Is a modest amount to lease a truck and horse trailer for six months,and I need to act on it now or risk missing the opportunity.


There is another project S.E.E.R.  has been working on,funds in excess of $5000. would go to creating a Sanctuary for four very special horses,that may need to be relocated as soon as 3/17/15. ( I already have one here in East Hampton as of 12/14)

They are a rare breed of draft horse,three of them are mares,one a proven broodmare with very impressive bloodlines.I met their owner in cyberspace almost 2 years ago. The Clydesdale I had owned for 21 years passed away,and I reached out to the local draft horse communityBubbaThe " people's Horse" Is Dead 4/17/13.   I first visited this barn 6 /11/13, a week later 5 of the horses were relocated,and shortly after their owner was charged with 5 counts of abuse

                  The above horses were relocated 6/17/13 and have since gained 600lbs 

      She was found guilty and will be sentenced 3/17/15. I have been very interested in what is going on here below the surface,and astonished at how all encompassing it is.Now that the State of New York is involved there will definatly be some big lifestyle changes for her.,and the horses.  We both would like the 4 remaining horses to stay together( a mare and her filly & a brother and sister) being cared for by me and turned out on grass.They came to her barn as yearlings,are untrained,and have never had grass pasture. We feel I am the best person to help them as a group become acclimated to a different environment.I have extensive experience ,and am eager to give these horses the opportunity to share their " Medicine" thru my brand of Equine Facilitated Therapy. In addition to that,many of the interns from our local farming school at Quail Hill are interested in farming with horses and  would love an opportunity to work with draft horses locally instead of traveling to Pennsylvania or New England. 

I became interested in carriage driving as a young girl,and over the years have trained many of my own horses as well as clients' horses to drive.Carriages appealed to me then and now because it's a shared experience.                                                                          

The barn behind me houses the Roy Lester Carriage Museum,in Amagansett N.Y.
Two of the carriages are Coaches,yesterday's version of a stretch Hummer &  Bentley.They are designed to be drawn by four horses,and have occasionally appeared in local parades,but not in a long time,Coaching horses are in short supply in The a Hamptons. Back in the 80's I helped a woman I was working for train her horse to pull a carriage for her wedding. She is now a past president of the American Driving Society,and I am assured to have assistance when I feel the four draft horses are ready to train at that level. The purpose being to bring life to the Museum through living history demonstrations , and appearing in local parades,as I did when I had three Clydesdales . I rescued two Clydesdales in 97. Back then Draft horses were not anywhere near as popular as they are now..but that's another story.
Indigo go has given me an option they call " in demand". It means to continue running a campaign after the goal is reached. My goal is to have horse transportation,so I can bring my awesome horse Tucker out to interact with people,and believe me,when the other horses get here cash is going to be " in demand" I will be updating as it unfolds. 

I have listed this under community ,because SEER has always been about Horses AND People. The animal section is kind of ugly sometimes,This is about Beauty and Love ;  
It's. About  Horses Rehabilitating  People who find themselves in Un Stable  Environments
My passion is helping people find freedom.My Medicine is to Empower.

Kadeeshte

story:
Perk $10 Custom Thank You Pictures

You will receive a custom Thank You Pictures with one of the models at home on your name and a big kiss. Also  customize the message what is on the pictures. 

And if you add the perk $1000 when you make the holiday in Germany you  will be introduced to the girls. Have fun.


Perk $20 Custom Pictures + American Vintage Poker Decks

You will receive a custom Thank You Pictures (Perk $10)   and a full high quality Poker Decks Cards, only for adults.  In this moment we have order 2000 poker decks half with random pictures with girls and half with pictures  from Kama Sutra  (The book of love) with  modern pictures and  explanations.                                  Choose what is for you.
 This will be a elegant Poker Deck to have at home you can show them to your friends or have fun with somebody special. 
In October when we release public this product will cost $22. 
That's why this is an awesome Perk Custom Pictures + Poker Decks.

Perks $30-$60 Kama Sutra + Poker Decks

The Kamasutra is the bible of sex positions. It was written in India in Sanskrit - historian's think it first appeared between 400 BCE and 200CE!

Originally it wasn't just a sex positions manual but a whole way of life! However, if it's sex positions you're after then you've come to the right place!

The Kama Sutra contains very detailed instructions to different sex positions and we've come up with handy.
This is literally a piece of art we have worked a lot for this high quality Book you have 365 position (perk $60) with modern pictures and explanations.
Is a must have book for somebody who will learn new stuff or make something special for his loved one.
This a special Indiegogo offer because the cost of paying models, photography and editing this book was huge, when we launch this book in October the price will be at least 20% more and without the Poker Decks.
We hope that this Book will have a beautiful impact on your sex life.


Perk  $1000 Fun in Germany


You come five days in Germany  and have eternal fun something that you will not forget all the life ... let me tell you more.
Hotel, food, transport, guide and some entrance all inclusive.

You must pay your fly or bus and for a lot of fun every night is ok when you have $100 with you. I mean in this $100 some entrance in special clubs $10-$15 what you pay for the drinks of girls and if you want a night to remember is ok $50-$80.

I wanted to clarify this aspects because is very important to me that my customers are satisfied if you have any questions don't hesitate to contact me.

This package is possible in: 

August                 7-11 or 14-18 or 21-25      you decide the date.

September         4-8 or 11-15  or 25-29       you decide the date.

October               2-6 or 16-20 or 23-27       you decide the date.

You have included  and paid from us:

  • Hotel, food, transport, guide.
  • Entertainment Park (Europa Park) http://www.europapark.de/en
  • Pools Park  (Aqua Tool) https://www.aquatoll.de/startseite/
  • Biggest Zoo from Germany http://www.wilhelma.de/
  • Ludwigsburg Castle  http://www.schloss-ludwigsburg.de/start/
The program and all the Night Activity we decide together at the first diner.
And please help to promote help a friend to make a dream  reality.

Don't hesitate to ask if you have questions and I hope to see you soon.

                                                                             With respect Claudiu C.

story:
Small Businesses Do NOT "have" to Fail!

Marie had no choice; she had to start a business to make ends meet. She soon realized she was by herself and had no help. She knew custom blankets but did not know how to market, sell or manage her business.

This is the plight of many entrepreneurs who “have” to be in business because they are underemployed or have a business idea and no one to help. We, “Nerds” put our heads together and developed affordable technology that is FREE until the small business makes enough money to pay us.

We also developed a Marketing curriculum and a Sales curriculum that we would like to teach for FREE, but that costs money!


About us

My name is Stan Washington, founder and president of Honor Services Inc. After graduating from University of Illinois, I was recruited to GTE as a programmer of the 911 system. Years later I was recruited to James Martin & Co. where I consulted on business strategy. I was then recruited to McDonald's Corp where I spent the bulk of my tenure. 

I became the executive of Operations and Technology, managing technology for 14,000 locations. After surviving many reorganizations and down-down-sizing’s, I chose to become an entrepreneur. With no, plan, no direction, I struck it out on my own and ran into many problems.  It reminded me of my entrepreneur parents.

Six dollars and fifty cents was my allowance when I was in high school. That consisted of fifty cents to go to school, fifty cents to eat lunch and fifty cents to return home for five days. If I lost one quarter I had to miss a meal. This was the plight of my entrepreneur father and many others in my neighborhood who "had" to do something because jobs were not accessible. 

I partnered with some great people who knew Technology, Marketing and Sales and we are bringing this knowledge to those in need! WYRB will assist us in spreading the word on radio.


Here is how YOU can help!

We plan to help enthusiastic small business owners who need Marketing, Sales and Technology resources by supplying vital training to point people in the right direction, just like I did at McDonald’s corp.

1. We will deliver Sales training for "Low Cost" to FREE to those who have invested $1000 or 1000 hours into their business. We will determine the validity of the request through an interview. (The entrepreneur must purchase our sales book and workbook). This needs your financial support!

2. We will deliver Marketing training for "low Cost" to FREE to those who qualify, just like those listed above. This takes time and needs your financial support.

3. We will deliver Technology training on our solution. Honor Services Office is a Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Invoicing and Email Marketing tool that is designed to grow as your business grows. We made this "low cost" to FREE to help small businesses get a solid start, but this needs to be subsidized.

4. We developed low cost resources to help the Do-it-Yourself’ers. Our Peaceful Selling curriculum helps teach new and existing entrepreneurs ways to grow their business with “sales” techniques. Our Plans to Prosper curriculum teaches marketing strategies that can be used to grow and expand the business. Each comes with a book and workbook.

5. We offer services (not for free) to execute the marketing for small businesses. We help the small business owners with executable marketing to drive in sales. 

Our books, "Plans to Prosper:Strategies, Systems and Tools for Small Business Marketing Success" and "Peaceful Selling: Easy Sales Techniques to Grow Your Small Business" will be used as the initial curriculum. These can be found on Amazon.com and have received a 4.5 star rating by Small Business Trends. We will expand to other facets of the business in the future.


Our Impactful Plan that includes YOU

On April 18th, we will start with our first event. “Ways to Empower My Business” at Chicago State University. We will introduce business owners to enable connections to be made, discuss our books and do a signing, and get many entrepreneurs to sign-up for our intense training that moves them from being “hustlers” to CEO’s.

This event, and others like it will have a cost. Marketing, locations and follow-up to ensure that we are successful will need your funding. We plan on using the knowledge we got from helping McDonald’s owner operators grow their business into the millions. (believe it or not, some McDonald’s fail, so we will use the “Plan for Success” to help!)

We will execute training in four week waves. With a month off for follow up in between. This will total six waves a year.  We plan to start in Chicago and expand to other cities as partners come along side of us. The great part about our project is we have already finished building everything! We are READY NOW! But we cannot do this alone and need your help.


Risks & Challenges

Opportunity International is a company who supplies “Micro” loans to small businesses in countries who can’t even afford infrastructure. This has been a roaring success because a loan of $50 is huge to someone who wishes to keep their dignity but cannot afford large loans. What has this got to do with us?

We feel that people "valuing” our business is risky. It will be up to us to help make the value proposition a reality. When something is FREE, it is not always valued. We need to charge people enough to make it valuable but low enough to make it affordable.


Other Ways You Can Help

We pray for our customers and all those who support them. We ask that you do the same! If you have other “In-kind” donations, then feel free to contact us at (888)611-7725 or visit www.honorservicesoffice.com. Please tell many others about our cause and campaign.  Buy our books and share them with a business. Invite us to be on television, radio or news. Spread the word! Blessings!
