curriculum that we would like to teach for FREE, but that costs money!



About us
My name is Stan Washington, founder and president of Honor Services Inc. After graduating from University of Illinois, I was recruited to GTE as a programmer of the 911 system. Years later I was recruited to James Martin & Co. where I consulted on business strategy. I was then recruited to McDonald's Corp where I spent the bulk of my tenure. 
I became the executive of Operations and Technology, managing technology for 14,000 locations. After surviving many reorganizations and down-down-sizing’s, I chose to become an entrepreneur. With no, plan, no direction, I struck it out on my own and ran into many problems.  It reminded me of my entrepreneur parents.
Six dollars and fifty cents was my allowance when I was in high school. That consisted of fifty cents to go to school, fifty cents to eat lunch and fifty cents to return home for five days. If I lost one quarter I had to miss a meal. This was the plight of my entrepreneur father and many others in my neighborhood who "had" to do something because jobs were not accessible. 
I partnered with some great people who knew Technology, Marketing and Sales and we are bringing this knowledge to those in need! WYRB will assist us in spreading the word on radio.


Here is how YOU can help!
 
We plan to help enthusiastic small business owners who need
Marketing, Sales and Technology resources by supplying vital training to point people
in the right direction, just like I did at McDonald’s corp. 
1. We will deliver Sales training for "Low Cost" to FREE to those who have
invested $1000 or 1000 hours into their business. We will determine the
validity of the request through an interview. (The entrepreneur must purchase our
sales book and workbook). This needs your financial support!
2. We will deliver Marketing training for "low Cost" to FREE to those who
qualify, just like those listed above. This takes time and needs your financial
support.
3. We will deliver Technology training on our solution. Honor
Services Office is a Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Invoicing and
Email Marketing tool that is designed to grow as your business grows. We made
this "low cost" to FREE to help small businesses get a solid start, but this needs to be
subsidized.
4. We developed low cost resources to help the Do-it-Yourself’ers.
Our Peaceful Selling curriculum helps teach new and existing entrepreneurs ways
to grow their business with “sales” techniques. Our Plans to Prosper curriculum
teaches marketing strategies that can be used to grow and expand the business.
Each comes with a book and workbook.
5. We offer services (not for free) to execute the marketing for
small businesses. We help the small business owners with executable marketing
to drive in sales. 
Our books, "Plans to Prosper:Strategies, Systems and Tools for Small Business Marketing Success" and "Peaceful Selling: Easy Sales Techniques to Grow Your Small Business" will be used as the initial curriculum. These can be found on Amazon.com and have received a 4.5 star rating by Small Business Trends. We will expand to other facets of the business in the future.




Our Impactful Plan that includes YOU 
On April 18th, we will start with our first event. “Ways to Empower
My Business” at Chicago State University. We will introduce business owners to
enable connections to be made, discuss our books and do a signing, and get many
entrepreneurs to sign-up for our intense training that moves them from being “hustlers”
to CEO’s. 
This event, and others like it will have a cost. Marketing, locations
and follow-up to ensure that we are successful will need your funding. We plan
on using the knowledge we got from helping McDonald’s owner operators grow
their business into the millions. (believe it or not, some McDonald’s fail, so
we will use the “Plan for Success” to help!)
We will execute training in four week waves. With a month off
for follow up in between. This will total six waves a year.  We plan to start in Chicago and expand to
other cities as partners come along side of us. The great part about our
project is we have already finished building everything! We are READY NOW! But
we cannot do this alone and need your help.


Risks & Challenges  
Opportunity International is a company who supplies “Micro”
loans to small businesses in countries who can’t even afford infrastructure.
This has been a roaring success because a loan of $50 is huge to someone who
wishes to keep their dignity but cannot afford large loans. What has this got to do with us?
We feel that people "valuing” our business is risky. It
will be up to us to help make the value proposition a reality. When something is FREE, it is not always valued. We need to charge people enough to make it valuable but low enough to make it affordable.
   
Other Ways You Can Help 
We pray for our customers and all those who support them. We ask
that you do the same! If you have other “In-kind” donations, then feel free to
contact us at (888)611-7725 or visit www.honorservicesoffice.com. Please tell many others about our cause and
campaign.  Buy our books and share them
with a business. Invite us to be on television, radio or news. Spread the word!
Blessings!

story:
PROJECT MOVED TO COMMUNITY: 
https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/wifi-zone-caputera-brazil


     on the web


Dear Reader,

If you were born and raised in a free and developed country, you only start to understand how lucky you are, once you travel to a country without those characteristics. Even simple necessities like electricity, clean water, sewage are non-existant, or only available to the upper class.

I married my Brazilian wife in 1998 and we lived in Amsterdam. During the family visits to Brazil, I understood why Brazil is still called a third-world country. 

Despite housing some of the richest people in the world and having one of the worlds highest tax incomes, in many places development of public infrastructure is stuck in the 18th century. Mainly due to the outrageous government corruption.


Brazil has major potential, but this potential stays underdeveloped, because of lack of access to proper education. If only the people could be connected to the internet at very low cost or even free, the internet could fill up the gap in education.

In 2010 I started up our Dutch-Brazilian company, with as its sole purpose to connect the unconnected in Brazil to the internet. In the following years we acquired the license to offer our connection in the whole Brazilian territory, established a small datacenter, created a small pilot project, participated in government tenders and prepared over 20 projects in three states. 

All this we have achieved with the help of 74 backers who along the years together put up $250.000.


Despite the very positive reactions of civil servants at the Brazilian ministry of telecommunications, and our best price at the government tenders, we still did not win any tender. Due to our refusal to participate in corruption. 


Project Caputera

Project Caputera is one where we can place our Integrated Radio Masts on condominio grounds, without interference of corrupt government officials. 

The project is divided into 6 phases, and we are now raising the money to execute the first three. We estimate that we can connect 250 houses until June 2015, and a thousand more until December 2015.  www.riklsat.nl/projects/riklsatprojects8.html

We will be charging a connection fee of $35 per month, for those who can afford it, and we will create free access points for those who cannot. After all, if you have no drinking water, internet is not going to be your first concern.




Funding

Even with our highly efficient and economic Integrated Radio Mast and our team of volunteers we still do need to invest more money before we get to the breakeven point. 


We have chosen the flexible funding principle, because even if we are unable to raise the whole amount, with smaller amounts we get there too. It will just take longer.

We are not a non-profit company. We want to make a fair profit (35%) so we can grow gradually, creating jobs, innovation and education. In my view the most social thing to do is create equal opportunities, and invest in them. 

And there is a lot still to be done. Thirty-eight million households in Brazil are not connected to the internet yet. 


Who are we looking for?

If you are reading this and you are in India, you would have your own non-developed internet to think about first. And if you are in Greece, you have other worries altogether. 

I am appealing to the reader who thinks beyond governments, countries and cultures. A reader who looks upon this planet as an astronaut does: a beautiful blue fragile sphere hanging out in total darkness. 


We cannot afford to wait for governments trying to resolve trade barriers. We cannot wait  for countries to form free trade zones. We cannot wait for cultural differences to be merged into one idyllic super culture. 

The closest and affordable alternative to being an astronaut is being an internaut. Let’s connect those who are unconnected.

Best regards,

Richard Kloostra - Founder & Director Riklsat Enterprises



What we do with your funds

As said above we have chosen the flexible funding principle. The amount that will comfortably realize the first three phases of project Caputera is roughly $200 K. We have set our goal at $300 K though, to prepare for (probable) taxes on the raised amount, for (probable) delays when importing equipment, for (probable) legal and accounting costs,  and to comfortably deliver the perks while installing the project.

Below you’ll find a pie chart explaining expected spending for the Caputera project.

If we raise lower amounts we will go slower, if we raise more will we go faster. Aside from the perks we will keep you posted about the progress by giving you a user account on our discussion platform www.ourcompanytogether.com 

The coming months we will be introducing our other projects on indiegogo, raising the bar every time. 


What do we do with profit?

As mentioned above, we are not a non-profit company. We are just not as attractive for traditional investors as the average fortune 500 company, because of our social way of looking at profit. 

We believe that creating well paid jobs is profit. We believe that our customers, employees and suppliers are our investors too. We believe all of these stakeholders should have real influence on company policy. 

To get a better idea about our base rules on dividend and employee participation take a look at these links:

On profits, dividend and general economics, billionaire mr. Nick Hanauer: http://www.ted.com/talks/nick_hanauer_beware_fe...

On employee participation award winning Brazilian entrepreneur mr. Ricardo Semler: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=USC1RE8jE50  & http://www.npo.nl/tegenlicht/04-02-2013/VPWON_1... 


Your Perks

If you are still here it means we are now on the same page. You now understand why it is so hard for us to get funded. 

Crowdfunding by law does not allow us to offer you shares or other future financial gains, so we have invented some small amount perks that will give you the feeling that you are really helping out. Your support will not be forgotten. 

For major investors or businesses we have included perks based on our experience on setting up a business in Brasil.

And for the adventurous type, we offer a type of internship in Brazil.


Your Impact

If you have watched the Semler and Hanauer talks, there is not much to add about the impact. We will be creating equal opportunities and continue to invest in them. The more people join this way of life, the less inequity will exist. 

I would like to leave you with the artist impression that our backer Lisa Cruysberg made about the impact, and about our continuous funding efforts.




Risks & Challenges

Our Caputera project has a timetable for realization until December 2015. The main factor slowing us down is import delay. We have two initiatives going to improve on that. 

One is obtaining an unrestricted import license, called Radar/Siscomex. We started the application for it in 2011, when we imported our pilot project Sitio Santa Rosa. As mentioned before we do not condone participating in corruption, therefore obtaining these licenses take much longer than they should.

The other one, which is local fabrication, removes the import problem altogether. On local fabrication we are negotiating with three parties, two techno parks and a university. 


Your Contribution

If you decide to contribute, but you cannot afford large amounts, know that that’s the idea of crowdfunding. Many times $11 gets the job done too. We have gotten this far with 74 people investing on average $75 a month. Imagine where we will get with 3.000 people doing that.

And if you are not in the position to contribute financially, but you do support the general idea, please spread the word around. Besides your own networks LinkedIn, facebook, googleplus, the Indiegogo platform provides tools to inform others about our project.

We thank you for taking the time to read, and hope to welcome you soon as one of our backers.

story:
AguaSAC: One Sentence

Improve quality of life for adults with special needs by providing many employment opportunities packaging all-natural mineral rich artesian spring water, applying custom designed labels and distributing finished goods to local clientele. 


Why Indiegogo: Two Sentences

A production facility to package pristine water in the AguaSAC pouch by exceptional people requires a good size building with ample parking, equipment, raw materials and adequate funds to run the operation for the first few months.  Because we know it takes a community to raise these exceptional individuals we're asking your support to help us secure a fantastic site close to our provider of awesome personnel and purchase the needed tools to make this integrated production facility a reality.


The AguaSAC Story

Hello... my name is Liesl Harder Kielp and I've been a Package Engineer for most of my career.  A few years ago, I designed the AguaSAC pouch to hold water and wanted to sell it to all the big beverage companies and make lots of money... imagine that!  After the package was designed and I began the testing process, I realized there were a lot of people with significant cognitive challenges who either had no quality opportunities for employment or very limited ones available.  Realizing the filling, labeling and distribution of the AguaSAC pouch was a perfect fit to employ this segment of our population, I set about creating the production systems necessary to make this crazy thought a reality... an integrated production environment where half the employees were mainstream and the other half had a significant cognitive challenge.

We started filling the pouches and hired ValleyLife members to apply the labels.  As demand grew, we hired Andrew to help deliver the pouches to our clients and just recently hired Pattie to take over the filling of the pouches with Andrew at our temporary production facility.  The good news, by ramping up production slowly and methodically, we've learned what's needed to fill this package in higher volumes AND more importantly, We've learned how to divide up the jobs so we can have an employee rich production facility where our associates never experience boredom from doing one task repetitiously yet they can still have duties that are organized and simple to perform.


Why Do We Need AguaSAC?

Do you know there are no statistics that follow the unemployment/under-employment rate of adults with cognitive challenges?  I can tell you this... in 2014, STARS did a study in the State of AZ and found that 80% of all individuals diagnosed with Autism in our state were still in High School!  All these people are going to need jobs after graduation.  And those are just people with Autism!  What about those with Down Syndrome, traumatic brain injury and birth defect.  One in ten children in Arizona schools have a developmental disability according to a recent report by the ASU Morrison Institute.

Our growth calls for franchises throughout the United States.  Not only will those operations employ even more individuals with special needs, but like our first facility here in Phoenix, will be a transparent center for other businesses to learn how they too can truly integrate their workforce.


What Will Be At AguaSAC?

With your contribution to this campaign, not only will we be able to immediately hire over 10 individuals with significant cognitive challenge, we will also be able to help other companies learn how easy it is to integrate their employees and begin the needed to completely eliminate unemployment and under-employment for this portion of our population.


We will offer jobs that run in 6 and 8 hour shifts to accommodate the abilities of our associates and every associate regardless of the position for which they have been hired will learn every task completed in the production center.  We are committed to have a "we" environment and will implement a buddy system to further promote total integration. 

Extra Details: Why Indiegogo?

In order to do something great for people who cannot always do something great for themselves as well as others like them around the nation, I'm taking on a project that's bigger than me and them: it's expensive to build a production facility that caters to individuals with special needs.  We have the vision, the plan, and the vendors lined up to make this production facility a reality for Phoenix in April 2015 - all we need is the community support to fund its installation.


We are committing 100% of the community funds raised by this campaign to not only lease a space zoned for light industrial production, but also secure the necessary equipment, tooling and raw materials to properly launch production. We have been working with Realtors to find a site with enough space and parking to accommodate the needs of ALL our employees.  We have also finalized our equipment list and the personnel needed to properly install everything to assure our pouches of pristine water are the best ever available.  


Perks: More Details

Our goal with this campaign is to raise enough money to purchase the needed equipment AND have some extra funds to handle cash-flow requirements for our initial 6 months of production while we ramp up the operation, train everyone and aggressively increase our sales.  And yet, we want you and everyone else to know that you are part of the community that employs adults with special needs after they graduate!

Mugs: This mugs is pretty cool and while it has the AguaSAC logo on the front, on the back is shares the story, "I help employ Adults with Special Needs".


T-Shirts:  They do the same... the AguaSAC logo on the front and the back shares our mission, "I Help Employ Adults with Special Needs".


We cannot say it or share it enough!

Tank You Very Much:  Our holding tank for the spring water is pretty large.  Not only are we going to paint your names on the tank, we're going to paint them in mural form on the entire tank and when you come to tour, we want you to sign under your name so we know you stopped in!  We're going to list you in our Guided Tour brochure and this will be used for years to come as more people learn how we truly integrate our workforce.

Prime The Pump:  Water in the AguaSAC pouch is the best one can consume.  Unlike water treated with reverse osmosis, our water keeps all it's nature given, exceptional components.  Hence, we need a series of pumps to move the water through filters, ozonation and UV light to assure it's completely microbial free.  Because this is such a critical part of our production, we want to do something similar to our holding tank and create a mural with all the names of our contributors at this level and allow you sign when you come in for your tour.  Your contribution is so important and this mural will stay with these components for the lifetime of our existence, even after they are replaced due to age and use.  You are part of the community who have stepped up to the plate to raise our special associates and we want to always remember your invaluable contribution.

Clean As A Whistle:  Filling the AguaSAC pouch requires a clean environment where our associates wear lab coats, hair nets, face masks safety goggles and gloves to keep everything sterile.  On one side of the clean room, so those touring the facility have a chance to see our personnel operating together, there will be a glass wall.  We will hire the same artist to again, create another mural with the names of our contributors that they can sign when touring.  We ask that these contributors also sign the mural so we know they've been on the tour and we will include their names in our Guided Tour brochure.

Name a Piston Filler:  A piston filler can be small or large depending on the application.  Our piston fillers will be small, able to accurately measure 10 ozs of spring water into each pouch.  The piston fillers will be cleaned daily and have a set protocol for maintenance so they last for years.  Instead of calling the fillers "one" and "two", we'd like to have a couple contributors give them names.  Again, another way to remember we are a community supported organization and there are members who have given generously that we wish to forever remember.  Not only will the name chosen be placed on the filler as well as our Guided Tour brochure, but it will also be used in our marketing and publicity materials.

Name the Production Area:  This is our largest contribution level and we're only offering one.  The individual/entity making this contribution not only gets to name our production facility, that name along with "Funded By" will be painted on a canvas that will be mounted at the entry of our facility.  No longer will we be called the AguaSAC Production Center, we will now use the name chosen by this contributor AND we will also recognize the source of the funds in our marketing and publicity materials.  We would love to have you join us for our grand opening and enjoy a custom guided tour from Andrew.  As the very first Production Facility for AguaSAC, this center, regardless of where it's located will forever be referred to by the name this contributor chooses.


How Can I Learn More?

Visit our official web site at www.AguaSAC.com and our social media sites, especially Facebook.  We are obsessive about going above and beyond to deliver an incredible work experience for individuals with special needs.  We have tried to keep regular pictures and updates on Andrew's progress with AguaSAC as well as other things happening in the world of individuals with special needs.  Please feel free to share your stories and pictures on our Facebook page.  We would love to connect with all of you and invite you to tour our facility once in operation.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot contribute, perhaps you know someone who can.  We need the following:

  • Contributors, of course!  Share this campaign with everyone you know.
  • Individuals, businesses, retailers, educational entities, etc who want to use the AguaSAC pouch as a promotional tool, sell it in their retail establishment or receive empty pouches with custom labels applied for alternative food or beverage products.

In order to do something great for people who cannot always do something great for themselves as well as others like them around the nation, I'm taking on a project that's bigger than me and them: it's expensive to build a production facility that caters to individuals with special needs.  We have the vision, the plan, and the vendors lined up to make this production facility a reality for Phoenix in April 2015 - all we need is the community support to fund its installation.



We are committing 100% of the community funds raised by this campaign to not only lease a space zoned for light industrial production, but also secure the necessary equipment, tooling and raw materials to properly launch production. We have been working with Realtors to find a site with enough space and parking to accommodate the needs of ALL our employees.  We have also finalized our equipment list and the personnel needed to properly install everything to assure our pouches of pristine water are the best ever available.  




Perks: More Details





Our goal with this campaign is to raise enough money to purchase the needed equipment AND have some extra funds to handle cash-flow requirements for our initial 6 months of production while we ramp up the operation, train everyone and aggressively increase our sales.  And yet, we want you and everyone else to know that you are part of the community that employs adults with special needs after they graduate!
Mugs: This mugs is pretty cool and while it has the AguaSAC logo on the front, on the back is shares the story, "I help employ Adults with Special Needs".



T-Shirts:  They do the same... the AguaSAC logo on the front and the back shares our mission, "I Help Employ Adults with Special Needs".



We cannot say it or share it enough!
Tank You Very Much:  Our holding tank for the spring water is pretty large.  Not only are we going to paint your names on the tank, we're going to paint them in mural form on the entire tank and when you come to tour, we want you to sign under your name so we know you stopped in!  We're going to list you in our Guided Tour brochure and this will be used for years to come as more people learn how we truly integrate our workforce.
Prime The Pump:  Water in the AguaSAC pouch is the best one can consume.  Unlike water treated with reverse osmosis, our water keeps all it's nature given, exceptional components.  Hence, we need a series of pumps to move the water through filters, ozonation and UV light to assure it's completely microbial free.  Because this is such a critical part of our production, we want to do something similar to our holding tank and create a mural with all the names of our contributors at this level and allow you sign when you come in for your tour.  Your contribution is so important and this mural will stay with these components for the lifetime of our existence, even after they are replaced due to age and use.  You are part of the community who have stepped up to the plate to raise our special associates and we want to always remember your invaluable contribution.
Clean As A Whistle:  Filling the AguaSAC pouch requires a clean environment where our associates wear lab coats, hair nets, face masks safety goggles and gloves to keep everything sterile.  On one side of the clean room, so those touring the facility have a chance to see our personnel operating together, there will be a glass wall.  We will hire the same artist to again, create another mural with the names of our contributors that they can sign when touring.  We ask that these contributors also sign the mural so we know they've been on the tour and we will include their names in our Guided Tour brochure.
Name a Piston Filler:  A piston filler can be small or large depending on the application.  Our piston fillers will be small, able to accurately measure 10 ozs of spring water into each pouch.  The piston fillers will be cleaned daily and have a set protocol for maintenance so they last for years.  Instead of calling the fillers "one" and "two", we'd like to have a couple contributors give them names.  Again, another way to remember we are a community supported organization and there are members who have given generously that we wish to forever remember.  Not only will the name chosen be placed on the filler as well as our Guided Tour brochure, but it will also be used in our marketing and publicity materials.
Name the Production Area:  This is our largest contribution level and we're only offering one.  The individual/entity making this contribution not only gets to name our production facility, that name along with "Funded By" will be painted on a canvas that will be mounted at the entry of our facility.  No longer will we be called the AguaSAC Production Center, we will now use the name chosen by this contributor AND we will also recognize the source of the funds in our marketing and publicity materials.  We would love to have you join us for our grand opening and enjoy a custom guided tour from Andrew.  As the very first Production Facility for AguaSAC, this center, regardless of where it's located will forever be referred to by the name this contributor chooses.


How Can I Learn More?

Visit our official web site at www.AguaSAC.com and our social media sites, especially Facebook.  We are obsessive about going above and beyond to deliver an incredible work experience for individuals with special needs.  We have tried to keep regular pictures and updates on Andrew's progress with AguaSAC as well as other things happening in the world of individuals with special needs.  Please feel free to share your stories and pictures on our Facebook page.  We would love to connect with all of you and invite you to tour our facility once in operation.



Other Ways You Can Help Even if you cannot contribute, perhaps you know someone who can.  We need the following:


Contributors, of course!  Share this campaign with everyone you know.
Individuals, businesses, retailers, educational entities, etc who want to use the AguaSAC pouch as a promotional tool, sell it in their retail establishment or receive empty pouches with custom labels applied for alternative food or beverage products.

story:
Take a m0mnt to change the world!

Each of us has a charitable cause we’re passionate about.  Whether we helped a family member fight through cancer, adopted our best friend from a nearby shelter, or met an inspirational survivor at a 5K last summer.  

But very few of us can afford to hand that cause large sums of money.  And we're all too busy to help bring more attention to the great work their doing.

m0mnt.org is about having a big impact for those causes!

  • Built to raise awareness for the causes you're passionate about
  • 90% of our membership fees go to charity EVERY MONTH
  • Members hand a big check to the charity with the most votes EVERY MONTH
  • Nominate causes YOU care about
  • A fully awesome members only social network
  • 10% goes to keeping m0mnt.org AD-FREE and Private/members only
  • Your info is NOT for sale
  • $5/month
Join m0mnt and become a catalyst for change!

We're all in this together!

We want to give a giant check to our first winning charity nominee in May!

  • This campaign is to raise funding for our first community charity donation.
  • Join the movement and help us get m0mnt.org off the ground!
  • Every dollar raised here will go to the first winning nomination on m0mnt.org. Even if we only get 20 bucks... it'll go straight to the winning charity.  If we happen to get a gagillion dollars, well guess what... that goes straight to the winning nomination.
  • This is all about showing the world what m0mnt.org is all about... and handing a charity a gagillion dollars is exactly what we're designed to do.

Its about making a huge Impact!

By giving this campaign money you're taking action towards making our world a better place.  Imagine a world where we all thought about, talked about, and took action for charitable causes EVERY day.

Thats the world I want to raise my daughter in.  Thats the world we all deserve...and thats the world m0mnt.org is trying to create.

Risks & Challenges

We definitely have challenges.

  • People are SO busy these days that its tough to get people to deviate from their routines long enough to join anything...let alone the m0mnt.org community... 
  • Another obstacle is the small percentage of people willing to make a 30 second video for a charity.  No matter how passionate for a specific cause, it can be scary to put oneself out there like that.  Members do not have to nominate anything, ever... but it is the life blood of what m0mnt.org is all about.
But these obstacles are temporary.  In fact, over the next few months m0mnt.org will be growing faster and faster.  And the more members we have the bigger the donation checks, and the bigger the impact across the web as we raise awareness for the causes our members care about!

Other Ways You Can Help

There are 3 ways to help m0mnt.org:

1.  Join.  The more members the bigger the impact on charities and causes around the world EACH month!

2.  Spread the word.  Share this campaign...share a link to m0mnt...tweet about us...call your family...tell you mailman about us.  The more people talking about m0mnt.org the more positivity being spread around the globe.

3.  Tell a charity about us.  Tell them help is on the way.  Tell them that our members are working to get them the awareness and funding they need.

story:
Short Summary

Hello! I'm Kollin McCoy, teen entrepreneur! I have been trying to start the perfect company for over 3 years now... and I think I may have found it! I feel very confident in Fizzer! I have the ideas and inspiration... now I just need the cash! Starting a new company isn't cheap... but that's where you can help me on my journey! I feel like with a little luck and a few blessings from god, this company can do great things!

What We Need & What You Get

We need money... bad! All money made from this campaign will go towards getting this company started! Once it finally gets off the ground, we should be able to stay afloat! 

Your in luck! We put a lot of thought into our donators! The perks for this campaign are some of the best you will find! If you are a gamer and you donate, you will be in heaven! 

Risks & Challenges

Obviously with every new company, there are going to be some challenges. Ours mainly have to do with cash. Here are some of the problems we are expecting to face on our journey to success.

- Funding gum production

- Funding soda production

- Paying for Copyright and Trademarks

- Paying for websites and other internet bills

- Funding box production

- Paying for the perks for donators

We will be tackling these problems by hopefully getting money from this campaign as well as getting some extra cash from investors and sponsors!

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, you can still help!

Here are a few things that we would really appreciate you doing for us!

- Sharing our campaign and company to your friends!

- Visiting our website every month or so to see what's new!

- Following us on social media sites such as YouTube and Twitter!

story:
Short Summary

          We help small and medium size businesses generate leads by creating an ecosystem, where in a service provider/ vendor can contact and generate leads/business opportunities without having to spend much on marketing and sales force.

          This platform is specifically designed to help SME’s and SOHO’s business owners who may not be able to leverage online business opportunities through digital presence over web and mobile. 

How does it work?

         We have come across a gap that exists in the vendor management process for the tier-2/ tier-3 corporate which can be addressed through platform like FaceConnect.  Our platform enables the procurement team to have a handy access to the hive of qualified/certified vendors who can bridge the gap, successfully. Thus, we create a win-win situation for the listed vendor and the corporate.

What you get?

  • Qualified business leads and sales opportunities.
  • Digital marketing and lead generation - through our portal as well as on social media.
  • Mini website / Digital catalog for your company.
  • Your own branded mobile application to showcase your products / services.

Sample screenshots

1) Mobile Brochure

2) Company Listing on Website


What can we do with your support?

                We have gathered several interesting requirements from our existing users and we are excited to implement these enhanced features and make it available to larger audience.

Here is what we plan for next 3 months

For Sellers

  • Member Dashboard 
  • Business Profile (to add and update contact details, business information and company fact sheets)
  • Add/Edit “Statutory Information”.
  • Manage Products / Services listing
  • Lead generation tools: Lead Alerts, Contact Buyers, enquiries by email
  • Posting “Sale Offers” (this section shows the current selling offers by a seller)
  • Transaction History

For Buyers

  • Contacting the seller (Used for sending business inquiries).
  • Posting “Buy Requirements” (this section highlights the current requirements of a buyer, looking to purchase products from a supplier).
  • Transaction History

Advanced Features: Once we complete, above enhancements, we would like to offer

  • Mobile Friendly Version
  • Android App
  • IOS APP
  • SEO Services for sellers

What keeps us unique?

  • FaceConnect‘s business listings of vendors is based on the pin code/geography of vendor location and it ensures no two vendors are catering to the same requirement within the same locality and hence avoid any competition.
  • This is a first of its kind platform for corporate to access verified vendors list and get going.
  • FaceConnect endeavor is to bridge the gap and hence help you.


You can Visit FaceConnect at www.faceconnect.biz

story:
Bizzshout's Mission

Our founder developed the innovation for Bizzshout! after recognizing how difficult it was to use social media to promote a personal or business brand to properly advance people and businesses. This promotional platform design will also serve as a solution to help millions of companies escape the "pay-for-post-policy" at Facebook Pages and other platforms, resulting in true organic reaches through promoted shouts. 
                

With Bizzshout!, users can reach out to other people, businesses and students for two main purposes: 

1. Growing unlimited social business connections to increase discovery, knowledge and resources: areas of expertise.

2. Promoting their personal or business brand, products, services and creativity within the accessible social business culture. This enables users to advance awareness of their brand via targeted and active advocates. 

By participating in this process, you can inspire increased support, recognition and social commerce for future members in a business-casual environment from your Me Page.

   

Contributors 

Each contributor will be instrumental in helping launch the live phase of our distinct and unique platform from beta-testing. Our goal is to help transform the lives of students, people, entrepreneurs and businesses by enabling them to advance their personal branding, creativity, innovations and social commerce ambitions. 

The Bizzshout! platform will assist anyone who is passionate about promotional and discovery services, including our local, national and global neighbors. By joining us via this IndieGoGo campaign, you will be able to help yourself and other forward-thinking individuals who are looking for a better way to harness the structure and promotional power of social media to grow and earn!  


Summary

Bizzshout! has the potential to change the way business-minded individuals connect with each other for promotional purposes. Our platform has been designed to meet the unique needs of students, businesses and individuals who are interested in resourceful and effective promotional solutions at their Worldview Page.


Therefore, instead of risking intrusive self-promotion on Facebook to friends or breaking their Page policy with "overly promotional" posts, or paying for a Premium service on LinkedIn, Twitter's expensive "Promote Products" suite or promoted pins on Pintrest via cost-per-click basis, you will be able to turn to Bizzshout! to increase awareness of your personal or business brand with organic, trademarked shouts to advocates. 


The ultimate goal is to drive social business connections in a valuable way, identifying your areas of expertise to enable you to achieve the highest possible impact by sharing and receiving tips, advice and resources. This will be made possible by promoted features such as the bizzshout!, ishout! and online Creative Resumes as the first innovative services out of several in the pipeline. In the works...The Bizzshout! Spotlight offers stardom coverage, and our bizzmercial service complements the extension of TV advertising in digital marketing, where users can uniquely video shop. 

Each of these features has the power to improve awareness of your personal brand, product or special engagement. Here are two examples of how all of this works: 


1. Students, freelancers, consultants and job seekers can utilize the online Creative Resumes feature to attract the direct attention of hiring managers in our proprietary, shopping spree databases. 



2. Bizzshout! approvals will work in a manner that is similar to a like or retweet, but they are specifically geared toward driving enthusiasm and social commerce with classified advocates from promoted shouts; businesses post a bizzshout! on Company Pages and individuals post an ishout! on Promotional Pages.

             

             


Campaign Fund Achievements! 


Funding Goal: $30,000 allows a basic launch to make it possible for additional senior engineers to help buildout and maintain the platform with real competitive success, disrupting social media and advancing you! We have an AMAZING team of engineers that we would like to grow, so meeting the higher metric will give us the additional tools to create new jobs and launch with a bigger impact toward effective services in the pipeline.
Every penny donated will go toward our strategic needs and will provide us with the necessary resources to make the Bizzshout! desktop platform smooth and easy to use. We will also utilize our expanded team to build a mobile application and maintain necessities such as separate high-performance servers for user traffic and  video streaming. 


At his office, Charlie Lee, Founder and CEO points out you can also visit bizzshout.com to receive a private launch notice via email, so you will know the exact day Bizzshout! launches!          


What Do YOU Get?!  

We are proudly offering our stylish, high-quality industry garments and inspiring digital perks that allow you to be a part of our future! Have fun shopping and choose as much as you want:   















Garment Note: (a) 95/5 polyester/spandex (b) Soft interior lining (c) Zippered right chest for cell phone with hand pockets (d) Adjustable Velcro cuffs to further block wind (e) Media port. 
Garment Note: (a) 95/10 polyester/Spandex (b) Soft interior lining (c) Four-way stretch (d) Elastic back cuffs (e) Zippered hand pockets.



Description Note: When bizzshout! reaches tens of millions of users, you can prove you were an early contributor. You will also receive the commemorative T-shirt based on the multi-name favicon logo with your name highlighted.

Digital Inclusion: Your name will also be listed on a dedicated Founders by Crowdfunding page at Bizzshout!, where your name will be linked to your profile. This is a very special level of involvement and you will receive priority notifications at all times on Founder Events and feedback sessions.

Garment Included: 1 Hoodie [male or female] 


Founders by Crowdfunding: Contributor

                                            


Digital Note: You get to choose seven selective pages labeled Top Featured ($1400 cost) in Top Featured promoting sections, where hiring managers will be shopping for candidates in career sectors and precise job titles. Outshine your competition and grab the deal!  


Included: 1 Hoodie, 1 T-shirt, 1 Flex-fit Cap and 1 Knit or Beanie Cap! 

Added Note: If you do not need a Creative Resume posting, you can donate it to a family member or friend instead.  

                                       Online Creative Resume: Sample


                         Creative Resume Database: Label Listing Sample




Description Note: Great humanitarians propel a company forward rather then self profiting. They will be recognized as Angel Contributors at the Founders by Crowdfunding Page.

Garments Included:  1 Hoodie, 1 T-shirt, 1 Flex-fit Cap and 1 Knit or Beanie Cap!

Founders by Crowdfunding: Angel Contributor

                                            


Vacation Notes: Enjoy your vacation home away from home that sleeps eight for six nights, seven days. 


The two-bedroom villa has two bathrooms and is beautifully furnished. Choose to use any one of the aforementioned weeks of the year on a reservation basis, which is based on availability. Must be 21+ 

Floating weeks May 29 - July 5th and Sept 4th - Dec 6th with a Fri/Sat/Sun Check-in/out. A simple, two-page rental agreement will be supplied with your details and Bizzshout! garments will be delivered upon your arrival. 

Villa Amenities:

* Mountain, lake and fairway views

* Open living and dining areas with elegant, comfortable furnishings

* Fully equipped kitchen

* Televisions throughout, DVD player in living area

* Gas or electric fireplace in living area

* Master suite with king-size bed, oversize soaking tub/jacuzzi, separate shower

* Guest room with full bathroom 

* Fully furnished private balconies or patios

* In-villa washer and dryer

* Complimentary Internet access

The Grounds: amazing golf course, lounge pools with bar, game room, theater, etc.


Garments Included: All garments numbered 1-8 [2 of each]. Not included: Travel. 


Our Credible Impact

We have only shown the live, beta-version presentation to associate deans at the Willemstad School of Business and The Center of Career Development Executives at Adelphi University, as well as the Stevens Institute of Technology, where the graduate management director and computer science graduates shared their favorable testaments. To further excite you on Bizzshout's validation as a proven platform of interest, please read some postings below: Testimonies from Steven's Tech and Adelphi.

                               

Platform Testimony 

“I have high expectations for Bizzshout!’s platform. I think it can really take off and be a superb social business culture. It has all the connecting power of the most prominent social networking sites with the additional student benefits for online creative resume marketing and elevator pitching, resourceful self-promotion and so much more.” Brian Rothschild, Director, Graduate Management Programs at Stevens Institute of Technology 

Platform Testimony

"Thank you Bizzshout! for your presentation. I liked it too much!" Lavina Choudhary, Graduate Assistant, MSTM/EMBA Program at Stevens Institute of Technology 

Creative Resume Service Testimony 

“The resume database and promotion will be top features for hiring managers. With over 20 years of experience in recruiting and on-boarding talent, I can see Bizzshout's platform making the work of talent acquisition easier and more efficient, resulting in better hires and shorter turn-around-times.” Alan Cooper, Associate Dean for the Willumstad School of Business at Adelphi University and Human Capital consultant

Platform Testimony 

"Charlie, I was impressed with your presentation. It is a unique social business site and should complement many of the existing social media websites that are currently used by people and business professionals. Your creativity and "hard work" is quite evident in creating the Bizzshout! brand.  I wish you the best and I am sure that your brand will reach the top!" Neil M. Halloran, Coordinator of Interships and Mentorships at Adelphi University
Risks and Challenges

Our garment teams are no strangers to design and filling orders. However, as with most projects, delays can arise for a variety of reasons based on out-of-stock items, etc. We feel confident that our relationship with our suppliers enables us to deliver and meet expectations with great products. We've been working with our suppliers for a long time and have come to trust that they'll always work as quickly and diligently as possible. If we do experience a delay, we'll figure out the best plan of action and fill our back orders right away. Regarding "return items," unfortunately, we do not warehouse our garments; they are custom made for you at purchase, so we can not accept returns. Nonetheless, you are free to gift your item and purchase a new one at 40% off as a replacement. 

                              


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • You can spread the good word about bizzshout's campaign and make some noise before it ends.
  • Remember, you can use Indiegogo's share tools to make it easy!


Our Final Words: Thank You!

In advance, we THANK YOU for your HELPING HANDS one way or another to help launch Bizzshout! as a viable business the world can appreciate!

With Bizzshout!, users can reach out to other people, businesses and students for two main purposes: 1. Growing unlimited social business connections to increase discovery, knowledge and resources: areas of expertise.2. Promoting their personal or business brand, products, services and creativity within the accessible social business culture. This enables users to advance awareness of their brand via targeted and active advocates. By participating in this process, you can inspire increased support, recognition and social commerce for future members in a business-casual environment from your Me Page.

   
Contributors Each contributor will be instrumental in helping launch the live phase of our distinct and unique platform from beta-testing. Our goal is to help transform the lives of students, people, entrepreneurs and businesses by enabling them to advance their personal branding, creativity, innovations and social commerce ambitions. The Bizzshout! platform will assist anyone who is passionate about promotional and discovery services, including our local, national and global neighbors. By joining us via this IndieGoGo campaign, you will be able to help yourself and other forward-thinking individuals who are looking for a better way to harness the structure and promotional power of social media to grow and earn!  
Summary


Bizzshout! has the potential to change the way business-minded individuals connect with each other for promotional purposes. Our platform has been designed to meet the unique needs of students, businesses and individuals who are interested in resourceful and effective promotional solutions at their Worldview Page.
Therefore, instead of risking intrusive self-promotion on Facebook to friends or breaking their Page policy with "overly promotional" posts, or paying for a Premium service on LinkedIn, Twitter's expensive "Promote Products" suite or promoted pins on Pintrest via cost-per-click basis, you will be able to turn to Bizzshout! to increase awareness of your personal or business brand with organic, trademarked shouts to advocates. 
The ultimate goal is to drive social business connections in a valuable way, identifying your areas of expertise to enable you to achieve the highest possible impact by sharing and receiving tips, advice and resources. This will be made possible by promoted features such as the bizzshout!, ishout! and online Creative Resumes as the first innovative services out of several in the pipeline. In the works...The Bizzshout! Spotlight offers stardom coverage, and our bizzmercial service complements the extension of TV advertising in digital marketing, where users can uniquely video shop. 

Each of these features has the power to improve awareness of your personal brand, product or special engagement. Here are two examples of how all of this works: 
1. Students, freelancers, consultants and job seekers can utilize the online Creative Resumes feature to attract the direct attention of hiring managers in our proprietary, shopping spree databases. 



2. Bizzshout! approvals will work in a manner that is similar to a like or retweet, but they are specifically geared toward driving enthusiasm and social commerce with classified advocates from promoted shouts; businesses post a bizzshout! on Company Pages and individuals post an ishout! on Promotional Pages.



             
             

Campaign Fund Achievements! 
Funding Goal: $30,000 allows a basic launch to make it possible for additional senior engineers to help buildout and maintain the platform with real competitive success, disrupting social media and advancing you! We have an AMAZING team of engineers that we would like to grow, so meeting the higher metric will give us the additional tools to create new jobs and launch with a bigger impact toward effective services in the pipeline.
Every penny donated will go toward our strategic needs and will provide us with the necessary resources to make the Bizzshout! desktop platform smooth and easy to use. We will also utilize our expanded team to build a mobile application and maintain necessities such as separate high-performance servers for user traffic and  video streaming. 




At his office, Charlie Lee, Founder and CEO points out you can also visit bizzshout.com to receive a private launch notice via email, so you will know the exact day Bizzshout! launches!          




What Do YOU Get?!  
We are proudly offering our stylish, high-quality industry garments and inspiring digital perks that allow you to be a part of our future! Have fun shopping and choose as much as you want:   


























Garment Note: (a) 95/5 polyester/spandex (b) Soft interior lining (c) Zippered right chest for cell phone with hand pockets (d) Adjustable Velcro cuffs to further block wind (e) Media port. 




Garment Note: (a) 95/10 polyester/Spandex (b) Soft interior lining (c) Four-way stretch (d) Elastic back cuffs (e) Zippered hand pockets.



Description Note: When bizzshout! reaches tens of millions of users, you can prove you were an early contributor. You will also receive the commemorative T-shirt based on the multi-name favicon logo with your name highlighted. Digital Inclusion: Your name will also be listed on a dedicated Founders by Crowdfunding page at Bizzshout!, where your name will be linked to your profile. This is a very special level of involvement and you will receive priority notifications at all times on Founder Events and feedback sessions. Garment Included: 1 Hoodie [male or female] 






Founders by Crowdfunding: Contributor
                                            



Digital Note: You get to choose seven selective pages labeled Top Featured ($1400 cost) in Top Featured promoting sections, where hiring managers will be shopping for candidates in career sectors and precise job titles. Outshine your competition and grab the deal!  Included: 1 Hoodie, 1 T-shirt, 1 Flex-fit Cap and 1 Knit or Beanie Cap! Added Note: If you do not need a Creative Resume posting, you can donate it to a family member or friend instead.  
                                       Online Creative Resume: Sample

                         Creative Resume Database: Label Listing Sample









Description Note: Great humanitarians propel a company forward rather then self profiting. They will be recognized as Angel Contributors at the Founders by Crowdfunding Page.
Garments Included:  1 Hoodie, 1 T-shirt, 1 Flex-fit Cap and 1 Knit or Beanie Cap!


Founders by Crowdfunding: Angel Contributor
                                            



Vacation Notes: Enjoy your vacation home away from home that sleeps eight for six nights, seven days. 
The two-bedroom villa has two bathrooms and is beautifully furnished. Choose to use any one of the aforementioned weeks of the year on a reservation basis, which is based on availability. Must be 21+ Floating weeks May 29 - July 5th and Sept 4th - Dec 6th with a Fri/Sat/Sun Check-in/out. A simple, two-page rental agreement will be supplied with your details and Bizzshout! garments will be delivered upon your arrival. 
Villa Amenities:
* Mountain, lake and fairway views
* Open living and dining areas with elegant, comfortable furnishings
* Fully equipped kitchen
* Televisions throughout, DVD player in living area
* Gas or electric fireplace in living area
* Master suite with king-size bed, oversize soaking tub/jacuzzi, separate shower
* Guest room with full bathroom 
* Fully furnished private balconies or patios
* In-villa washer and dryer
* Complimentary Internet accessThe Grounds: amazing golf course, lounge pools with bar, game room, theater, etc.Garments Included: All garments numbered 1-8 [2 of each]. Not included: Travel. 




Our Credible Impact

We have only shown the live, beta-version presentation to associate deans at the Willemstad School of Business and The Center of Career Development Executives at Adelphi University, as well as the Stevens Institute of Technology, where the graduate management director and computer science graduates shared their favorable testaments. To further excite you on Bizzshout's validation as a proven platform of interest, please read some postings below: Testimonies from Steven's Tech and Adelphi.


                               

Platform Testimony “I have high expectations for Bizzshout!’s platform. I think it can really take off and be a superb social business culture. It has all the connecting power of the most prominent social networking sites with the additional student benefits for online creative resume marketing and elevator pitching, resourceful self-promotion and so much more.” Brian Rothschild, Director, Graduate Management Programs at Stevens Institute of Technology 

Platform Testimony"Thank you Bizzshout! for your presentation. I liked it too much!" Lavina Choudhary, Graduate Assistant, MSTM/EMBA Program at Stevens Institute of Technology 




Creative Resume Service Testimony 
“The resume database and promotion will be top features for hiring managers. With over 20 years of experience in recruiting and on-boarding talent, I can see Bizzshout's platform making the work of talent acquisition easier and more efficient, resulting in better hires and shorter turn-around-times.” Alan Cooper, Associate Dean for the Willumstad School of Business at Adelphi University and Human Capital consultantPlatform Testimony "Charlie, I was impressed with your presentation. It is a unique social business site and should complement many of the existing social media websites that are currently used by people and business professionals. Your creativity and "hard work" is quite evident in creating the Bizzshout! brand.  I wish you the best and I am sure that your brand will reach the top!" Neil M. Halloran, Coordinator of Interships and Mentorships at Adelphi University


Risks and Challenges


Our garment teams are no strangers to design and filling orders. However, as with most projects, delays can arise for a variety of reasons based on out-of-stock items, etc. We feel confident that our relationship with our suppliers enables us to deliver and meet expectations with great products. We've been working with our suppliers for a long time and have come to trust that they'll always work as quickly and diligently as possible. If we do experience a delay, we'll figure out the best plan of action and fill our back orders right away. Regarding "return items," unfortunately, we do not warehouse our garments; they are custom made for you at purchase, so we can not accept returns. Nonetheless, you are free to gift your item and purchase a new one at 40% off as a replacement. 


                              

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

You can spread the good word about bizzshout's campaign and make some noise before it ends.
Remember, you can use Indiegogo's share tools to make it easy!


Our Final Words: Thank You!
In advance, we THANK YOU for your HELPING HANDS one way or another to help launch Bizzshout! as a viable business the world can appreciate!

story:
Introducing Magician Brands & Flaming Needles

Hi!  I’m Julian Crosson-Hill and I want to share with you what this campaign is about and why it matters to me.  I learned to sew in the third grade; in high school, I made and even designed most of my clothes.  I’ve always loved working with fabric and making sewn products.  I studied Fine Art at the University of New Mexico but after school, the realities of making a living lead me to spend the last 20 years working in IT and web development.  While I enjoy technology, I’ll turn 45 this November and I decided it was time to start doing the things in life that I’ve always wanted to do.

Fortunately, I have a wonderful, supportive husband, Neal Crosson-Hill, who shares my interest in sewing and design.  Together, we’ve created a plan to begin building our dream business that incorporates sewing and design.  We call our company Magician Brands and today we’re launching the first phase which is our online fabric and sewing shop--Flaming Needles.

Our long term goal is to develop lines of apparel which we’ll sell wholesale through the regular apparel markets and shows.  A secondary goal is to promote sewing as a hobby and a useful skill.  For our first phase of launching Magician Brands, we plan to launch the Flaming Needles web site.  This is a web store that will primarily sell fabrics for quilting, crafts and apparel as well as notions and patterns.  We’ll supplement the content with a blog that will include tutorials, book reviews and photos of our customer’s projects.  Our main product will be a monthly fabric club in which we’ll ship 12 fat quarters of fabric every month for a set price.  We’ll carefully curate these fabrics so that they coordinate and will include different fibers and finishes.  Each monthly shipment will include a project that we’ll design so that our members will have an easy to intermediate project to make from their fabric.  We’ll also supplement the content on Flaming Needles with a blog dedicated to sewing and fashion where we’ll post content on trends, styles, patterns and sewing techniques for the fashionable home sewer.

During this building phase, we’ll begin work on our home and clothing lines.  This will primarily be development and research work.  We will sell some limited number of designs through an additional web site and/or Etsy store to test market some of our ideas.  

In future phases, we hope to expand to a line of sewn home products, an apparel line, digital embroidery files, and possibly paper goods.  In the meantime, we’ll be honing our skills further, building our company through the Flaming Needles project and launching other ecommerce sites with sewn products.

We’ve already done a lot of the prep work--purchased a new straight stitch and embroidery machine, formed our business entity, opened a business bank account, established wholesale accounts, registered domain names and much more.  Now we’re ready to take the next step and while I’ll still be working full time and continuing to contribute capital to our venture, we could use some extra help raising capital.


What We Need

We need to raise an additional $5,000 to really kick things off.  We’ll use these funds to purchase 6 months worth of fabric inventory for Flaming Needles.  This inventory will include the first 6 months of the monthly club and additional inventory to sell.  In addition, we’ll be purchasing some necessary equipment to begin setting the stage for our next phase including:

  • a portable commercial blind stitch machine for hemming garments

  • a coverstitch machine for sewing knits

  • an industrial form for developing and testing apparel patterns

  • production related materials & supplies

At some stage, we’ll outgrow our home studio.  Any additional funds we raise, will be set aside to help defray the cost of moving our workspace into a commercial space.  

What if we don’t make our goal?  We’re really committed to making this happen.  If we don’t make our goal, we’ll focus on purchasing the necessary inventory to make sure Flaming Needles progresses smoothly and investigate financing or leasing options for the additional equipment.

The Impact

Our project has the potential to impact a lot of people in positive ways.  Here are some of the people that can benefit and how they will benefit:

  • Julian & Neal - Obviously, we will directly benefit by being able to pursue a lifelong dream and channel our creativity into our work life.

  • New Sewing Enthusiasts - Sewing is a wonderful hobby that provides a lot of enjoyment and can also build marketable skills.  Many new sewers find creative ways to create additional income from their hobby.  Sewing can also be a relaxing and almost meditative hobby. We would also hope to attract new talent to our own endeavor.

  • Buyers of our apparel - As our business expands, purchasers of our apparel will be able to enjoy quality clothing manufactured in the US.

  • Our local economy - Small businesses contribute greatly to their local economies.  We’ll be paying taxes that support public schools and services and eventually we’ll need to hire additional employees that will benefit by being able to work in our industry.  As we move into manufacturing, we are committed to producing our line here in the United States.  

  • Our supporters - Our supporters will be able to support something that is really meaningful to us and get some nice perks along the way.  We hope that our supporters will continue as our best customers and enjoy participating in our growth.

Risks & Challenges

Starting a business has a lot of risks.  We might not find enough people interested in our monthly fabric club or we might not be able to compete with other online fabric shops.  While that’s certainly a possibility, we feel that we’ve carefully researched competitive prices and we have the ability to provide expert service and added value.  

We also believe that our users will appreciate the additional content and services that we can offer.  Sewing is enjoying a resurgence of popularity right now but many new seamsters are still intimidated by more difficult projects.  We believe we can overcome that through video tutorials, detailed blog posts, and relevant content through periodic email newsletters.  Our goal is to build a community around our products and services!

Other Ways You Can Help

We recognize that not everyone can help financially.  You can still help out though in a number of important ways:

  • Cheer us on!  We love to get encouraging notes via email, social media or even snail mail.  

  • Share our campaign with people that you know.  The more we can spread the word, the better our odds of meeting our goal.  

  • Follow us on social media or our web site and share our posts and photos.  If you know people that would be interested in our products and services, we’d love a referral.

  • Subscribe to our newsletter and share it with your friends.  

Thanks in advance for all your help!
