story:
Short Summary

The not-for-profit Urban Renaissance Foundation is raising $200,000 to execute the Kick-Off Phase of Detroit Urban Regen. This phase results in the creation of 4-6 revolutionary urban regeneration projects that draw $40-80 million USD of private investment for sustainable development into the Detroit area.

Together with the community we create investment projects that result in permanent jobs, sustainable food, water and energy, and resilient communities driven by quality of life, health, prosperity and connectivity.

We set up the projects with a unique approach. Each project is part of a value chain of linked bio-based projects and together form a new economic backbone for Detroit. After 2 years of careful analysis, we brought together over 15 international partners that have the expertise to make this happen and we now need your help to kickstart Detroit Urban Regen.

With the kickstart funds of $200.000 the 15 partners develop concept and business plans for the 4-6 projects with the local community, and hunt for private investors to fund the projects. If the Kick-Off Phase is successfully funded, between $40-80 million worth of private investments is drawn to Detroit.

"The Urban Renainssance Foundation and its partners together form a tight team to realize Detroit Urban Regen."

Time for Change!

Imagine what could happen if we capture and combine the power of all networks that connect our society in nature, information, infrastructure, and communities? This is what Detroit Urban Regen does to reinvigorate the city.

Detroit Urban Regen's mission is to regenerate the city of Detroit with a revolutionary approach. A former powerhouse of the automotive industry, the city has suffered from deindustrialization, a massive loss of jobs, decline in population, increase in crime, and many related issues. Yet, Detroit is a city full of resources and opportunities. We see this value and have brought together more than 15 international partners that join forces to use the best of Detroit to make it rise again. 



We resurrect Detroit from the old economy by introducing a unique urban regeneration approach, proven to be succesful. With it, we build a brand new economic and social value chain using innovative bio-based industry, innovative urban and economic development. This results in permanent jobs, fresh and affordable local food and products, new shops, education programmes, and a safer and stronger community. (For details, see the bottom of this page.)

While Detroiters develop initiatives and take matters in their own hands, Detroit Urban Regen connects, accelerates, and adds to these hotspots of energy to boost Detroit’s future by its people, for its people!



Realizing Detroit Urban Regen

Now imagine the possibilities of applying such an approach to the city of Detroit. In the Kick-Off Phase, Detroit Urban Regen forms 4-6 initial projects in a new value chain that create a new backbone of the economy. In the second phase, these projects are developed together with the community. This is enabled by Detroit Urban Regen's 15 partners that bring international expertise in:

  • Sustainable water and waste management
  • Urban farming
  • Sustainable energy
  • Resilient urbanism
  • Circular resource management
  • New transport technologies
  • Resilient business models


Who We Are

Realizing a new golden age for Detroit with a brand new city regeneration strategy, and U.S. and European partners

Urban Renaissance Foundation is an alliance of 12 partner organizations that span the landscape of urban transformation, active in six countries. Together we transform cities and communities: ranging from converting single buildings to transformations on a regional level, to sustainable, flourishing and exciting communties.

Urban Renaissance is a hands-on organization, fusing top-down strategy with bottom-up activation, and applying innovative business models, smart design, natural solutions and community oriented processes. We work on our own initiative as well as on invitation to realize visible improvements to communities small and large, in a short period of time.


What We Need & What You Get

The total Detroit Urban Regen funding required is $200,000 in order to finance the Kick-Off Phase. In this phase the locations fort he projects are found and investigated, community projects linked and partners attracted. It combines these into investment-ready projects and attract investment funding of $10-20 million USD per project, totalling $40-80 million USD capital flowing into Detroit.

  • A total of $35-50,000 per project will be invested simultaneously.
  • All investors receive a personal invitation to the Detroit Urban Regen Kick-Off Event where the projects are presented to private investors and strategic partners.
  • Investors above $1,000 receive a Surprise Gift Package from Holland.If we do not reach our entire goal, we still proceed with the Kick-Off Phase, but with less projects.

The team on a research visit in Detroit


Significant Impact for Detroit and Detroiters

  • The funds enable Detroit Urban Regen, and with it a new future for a flourishing Detroit and its people.
  • A total of 4-6 projects will be sourced, outlined, investigated and made investment-ready through the creation of business plans. These projects combined help create the new economic backbone of Detroit.
  • Drawing investments to the city: the 4-6 projects will draw $40-60 million worth of private investments to Detroit.
  • Private Investor Road Shows will be organised as soon as the kick-off phase is completed.
  • Augmenting the auto industry as a primary job creator.
  • Providing fresh produce for the city.
  • Improving safety, education and welfare for the Detroit community.
  • Utilizing existing, underused infrastructure in the city.


Risks & Challenges

  • Challenge:
    Detroit Urban Regen is a unique approach. The tight and efficient management of a multi-disciplinary team of experts during the kick-off phase is a difficult task.
    How we are dealing with this:
    We have over 15 years of experience in multi-disciplanary development projects, including large-scale urban regeneration, around the world. This makes us confident we can make this a reality for Detroit as well.

  • Challenge:
    Sourcing and connecting suitable local and international partners.
    How we are dealing with this:
    We currently have 15 international partners capable of executing urban regeneration. During the kick-off phase we spend significant effort to find and engage additional partners
    We have reserved resources in the kick-off phase budget to source 8-12 additional local partners to execute and take ownership of the Detroit Urban Regen projects.

A few of the UR team at work 


Next Steps & Milestones

  • We have determined three milestones for Detroit Urban Regen:
    1. Site and Partner Selection
    2. Concept development and Investment Plans
    3. Attracting investors
  • The proceeds of this crowdfunding campaign will be wisely spent and all parties involved have committed to contribute to Detroit Urban Gen at-cost or low-cost, since we are a nonprofit.
  • The process planning is as follows: pre-analysis, team travel and settlement, location scouting, location research, stakeholder involvement, research processing, concept development, business model development, process design, documentation and presentation.
  • For more information about Detroit Urban Regen or to be updated on the latest developments, please visit www.detroiturbanregen.com.


International Partners

Detroit Urban Regen has assembled a visionary and dedicated team of international partners with proven track records. The team is currently led by Detroit Urban Regen’s initiator Except Integrated Sustainability, a collective of experts based in Holland and the U.S., with extensive global experience in (re)developing cities, buildings, and regions, into beautiful, healthy and resilient places. The non-profit agency has worked on over 300 projects on four continents in the last 15 years. It is supported and facilitated by Urban Renaissance Foundation, combining the following international partners in urban regeneration:


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word on social media and within your networks.
  • Tip us if you know of any potential private investors or philanthropists.
  • Tip us on existing or promising new local projects that you believe could benefit from Detroit Urban Regen.


Nothing stops Detroit!

Thank you for helping us Transform Detroit into a Powerhouse of Sustainability, Innovation, Resilience, and Health!!


Details: How It Works 

Detroit Urban Regen is a project that started by visionary Dutch and American experts in urban regeneration in 2012 from the Urban Renaissance Foundation. We use innovative urban development to resurrect an icon from the old economy. An icon that has suffered from industrial and social decay, and is yet a city full of resources and opportunities. Detroit Urban Regen reinstates the city as a hub in the new economy, through developing and starting a new economic value chain in Detroit.

Detroit was built on the car industry, and their decline is interlinked. The new rise of Detroit requires a new backbone of economic power and social connectivity. This is more than a single project or company can do, and that’s why one-off projects fail. Instead, Detroit Urban Regen introduces a completely new value chain from resource production, processing, retail, consumption and recycling. This results in a range of projects, all linked and supporting each other, but each capable of operating independently.

To make this backbone last, we build it based on resources we get for free, forever: bio-based industries. Bio-based industries rely on natural elements such as plants, microorganisms and ecosystem services to produce high-quality products sustainably.

These proven innovations are flexible, profitable, take advantage of the unique properties of Detroit and its people, and generate jobs, revenue, education, knowledge and healthy products that are useful for Detroiters.

Detroit Urban Regen plays on the strengths of Detroit, such as its image as a hard-working production and processing oriented culture, the availability of skilled and unskilled labour, and the low cost of land. It uses these values to build a new closed-loop bio-based industry by, with and for the local community.

- Dutch Agri-Food and Greenhouse Trade Mission Comes to Detroit
story_txt:
Short Summary 
The not-for-profit Urban Renaissance Foundation is raising $200,000 to execute the Kick-Off Phase of Detroit Urban Regen. This phase results in the creation of 4-6 revolutionary urban regeneration projects that draw $40-80 million USD of private investment for sustainable development into the Detroit area.


Together with the community we create investment projects that result in permanent jobs, sustainable food, water and energy, and resilient communities driven by quality of life, health, prosperity and connectivity.
We set up the projects with a unique approach. Each project is part of a value chain of linked bio-based projects and together form a new economic backbone for Detroit. After 2 years of careful analysis, we brought together over 15 international partners that have the expertise to make this happen and we now need your help to kickstart Detroit Urban Regen.

With the kickstart funds of $200.000 the 15 partners develop concept and business plans for the 4-6 projects with the local community, and hunt for private investors to fund the projects. If the Kick-Off Phase is successfully funded, between $40-80 million worth of private investments is drawn to Detroit.


"The Urban Renainssance Foundation and its partners together form a tight team to realize Detroit Urban Regen."


Time for Change!


Imagine what could happen if we capture and combine the power of all networks that connect our society in nature, information, infrastructure, and communities? This is what Detroit Urban Regen does to reinvigorate the city.
Detroit Urban Regen's mission is to regenerate the city of Detroit with a revolutionary approach. A former powerhouse of the automotive industry, the city has suffered from deindustrialization, a massive loss of jobs, decline in population, increase in crime, and many related issues. Yet, Detroit is a city full of resources and opportunities. We see this value and have brought together more than 15 international partners that join forces to use the best of Detroit to make it rise again. 




We resurrect Detroit from the old economy by introducing a unique urban regeneration approach, proven to be succesful. With it, we build a brand new economic and social value chain using innovative bio-based industry, innovative urban and economic development. This results in permanent jobs, fresh and affordable local food and products, new shops, education programmes, and a safer and stronger community. (For details, see the bottom of this page.)
While Detroiters develop initiatives and take matters in their own hands, Detroit Urban Regen connects, accelerates, and adds to these hotspots of energy to boost Detroit’s future by its people, for its people!



Realizing Detroit Urban Regen
Now imagine the possibilities of applying such an approach to the city of Detroit. In the Kick-Off Phase, Detroit Urban Regen forms 4-6 initial projects in a new value chain that create a new backbone of the economy. In the second phase, these projects are developed together with the community. This is enabled by Detroit Urban Regen's 15 partners that bring international expertise in:


Sustainable water and waste management
Urban farming
Sustainable energy
Resilient urbanism
Circular resource management
New transport technologies
Resilient business models





Who We Are




Realizing a new golden age for Detroit with a brand new city regeneration strategy, and U.S. and European partners
Urban Renaissance Foundation is an alliance of 12 partner organizations that span the landscape of urban transformation, active in six countries. Together we transform cities and communities: ranging from converting single buildings to transformations on a regional level, to sustainable, flourishing and exciting communties.
Urban Renaissance is a hands-on organization, fusing top-down strategy with bottom-up activation, and applying innovative business models, smart design, natural solutions and community oriented processes. We work on our own initiative as well as on invitation to realize visible improvements to communities small and large, in a short period of time.



What We Need & What You Get
The total Detroit Urban Regen funding required is $200,000 in order to finance the Kick-Off Phase. In this phase the locations fort he projects are found and investigated, community projects linked and partners attracted. It combines these into investment-ready projects and attract investment funding of $10-20 million USD per project, totalling $40-80 million USD capital flowing into Detroit.


A total of $35-50,000 per project will be invested simultaneously.

All investors receive a personal invitation to the Detroit Urban Regen Kick-Off Event where the projects are presented to private investors and strategic partners.


Investors above $1,000 receive a Surprise Gift Package from Holland.If we do not reach our entire goal, we still proceed with the Kick-Off Phase, but with less projects.





The team on a research visit in Detroit


Significant Impact for Detroit and Detroiters



The funds enable Detroit Urban Regen, and with it a new future for a flourishing Detroit and its people.
A total of 4-6 projects will be sourced, outlined, investigated and made investment-ready through the creation of business plans. These projects combined help create the new economic backbone of Detroit.

Drawing investments to the city: the 4-6 projects will draw $40-60 million worth of private investments to Detroit.


Private Investor Road Shows will be organised as soon as the kick-off phase is completed.


Augmenting the auto industry as a primary job creator.

Providing fresh produce for the city.
Improving safety, education and welfare for the Detroit community.
Utilizing existing, underused infrastructure in the city.




Risks & Challenges

Challenge: Detroit Urban Regen is a unique approach. The tight and efficient management of a multi-disciplinary team of experts during the kick-off phase is a difficult task. How we are dealing with this: We have over 15 years of experience in multi-disciplanary development projects, including large-scale urban regeneration, around the world. This makes us confident we can make this a reality for Detroit as well.

Challenge: Sourcing and connecting suitable local and international partners. How we are dealing with this: We currently have 15 international partners capable of executing urban regeneration. During the kick-off phase we spend significant effort to find and engage additional partnersWe have reserved resources in the kick-off phase budget to source 8-12 additional local partners to execute and take ownership of the Detroit Urban Regen projects.
 




A few of the UR team at work 

Next Steps & Milestones


We have determined three milestones for Detroit Urban Regen:1. Site and Partner Selection2. Concept development and Investment Plans3. Attracting investors

The proceeds of this crowdfunding campaign will be wisely spent and all parties involved have committed to contribute to Detroit Urban Gen at-cost or low-cost, since we are a nonprofit.
The process planning is as follows: pre-analysis, team travel and settlement, location scouting, location research, stakeholder involvement, research processing, concept development, business model development, process design, documentation and presentation.

For more information about Detroit Urban Regen or to be updated on the latest developments, please visit www.detroiturbanregen.com.




International Partners

Detroit Urban Regen has assembled a visionary and dedicated team of international partners with proven track records. The team is currently led by Detroit Urban Regen’s initiator Except Integrated Sustainability, a collective of experts based in Holland and the U.S., with extensive global experience in (re)developing cities, buildings, and regions, into beautiful, healthy and resilient places. The non-profit agency has worked on over 300 projects on four continents in the last 15 years. It is supported and facilitated by Urban Renaissance Foundation, combining the following international partners in urban regeneration:



Other Ways You Can Help  
Spread the word on social media and within your networks.
Tip us if you know of any potential private investors or philanthropists. Tip us on existing or promising new local projects that you believe could benefit from Detroit Urban Regen.

Nothing stops Detroit!
Thank you for helping us Transform Detroit into a Powerhouse of Sustainability, Innovation, Resilience, and Health!!


Details: How It Works 

Detroit Urban Regen is a project that started by visionary Dutch and American experts in urban regeneration in 2012 from the Urban Renaissance Foundation. We use innovative urban development to resurrect an icon from the old economy. An icon that has suffered from industrial and social decay, and is yet a city full of resources and opportunities. Detroit Urban Regen reinstates the city as a hub in the new economy, through developing and starting a new economic value chain in Detroit.
Detroit was built on the car industry, and their decline is interlinked. The new rise of Detroit requires a new backbone of economic power and social connectivity. This is more than a single project or company can do, and that’s why one-off projects fail. Instead, Detroit Urban Regen introduces a completely new value chain from resource production, processing, retail, consumption and recycling. This results in a range of projects, all linked and supporting each other, but each capable of operating independently.


To make this backbone last, we build it based on resources we get for free, forever: bio-based industries. Bio-based industries rely on natural elements such as plants, microorganisms and ecosystem services to produce high-quality products sustainably.
These proven innovations are flexible, profitable, take advantage of the unique properties of Detroit and its people, and generate jobs, revenue, education, knowledge and healthy products that are useful for Detroiters.
Detroit Urban Regen plays on the strengths of Detroit, such as its image as a hard-working production and processing oriented culture, the availability of skilled and unskilled labour, and the low cost of land. It uses these values to build a new closed-loop bio-based industry by, with and for the local community.

- Dutch Agri-Food and Greenhouse Trade Mission Comes to Detroit

story:
Nicotine Inhaler


We started MicromistNOW to create inhalable products that would improve people's everyday lives.  Our first product is the QuickNIC Nicotine Inhaler.


The Problem

Life for the 1 billion smokers and vapers worldwide is becoming more difficult. Regulations, restrictions and social pressures make getting through the day pretty challenging.

Whether it is enduring a long movie, finding time to take a break at work, airplanes, eating at restaurants, hanging out with non-smoker friends and family, or even driving with the kids.


The Solution

QuickNIC allows smokers and vapers to quickly and discreetly satisfy nicotine cravings, anytime, anywhere without toxic chemicals, combustion or batteries.

QuickNIC is a small, portable inhaler that delivers a fine mist of nicotine that is quickly absorbed through the lungs into the blood stream within 30 seconds.  Each breath delivers .33 mg of nicotine or about the same nicotine as one-third of a cigarette. 

QuickNIC comes in 2 different flavors, Cinnamon and Menthol and each inhaler contains about 90 breaths.

The Team

The QuickNIC team is an experienced group of entrepreneurs that met in business school 15 years ago. 


Dr. Kevin Shurtleff is the CEO and lead scientist.  In addition to being a chemistry professor, he also has an MBA.

As a team we invested our own money to develop, test and submit patents for the products.  We purchased manufacturing equipment and created working prototypes that were used by smokers and vapers to provide valuable feedback.  


How can you help?

We need pre-orders of QuickNIC for two reasons…

  1. Funds required to order the packaging materials to do our first production run. 
  2. Funds to attend tradeshows and get QuickNIC into distribution so you can purchase it at your local smoke shop, convenience and grocery store.

            
                               (QuickNIC shrink band and box designs)

Pre-order options and Perks

If you’re a smoker or vaper 19+ years old or know someone that could use QuickNIC we have several pre-order options and perks. 

  1. You can buy one for $12 + $3 shipping.
  2. It is a better deal to get 4 for $45 + free shipping.
  3. If you purchase 10 or more you’ll also receive a QuickNIC t-shirt  
  4. if you purchase 100 you’ll receive a t-shirt and 10% off lifetime discount
*International shipping - MicromistNOW will ship internationally for an additional fee of $30 USD.  However, because QuickNIC is a new type of product that contains nicotine, we cannot guarantee the legality, taxes or customs duties for your country. All pre-orders are final and MicromistNOW is not responsible if items get stuck or confiscated in customs.  We will not re-ship international orders. The customer is responsible for any import duties, sales or other taxes imposed by your country.

When can we deliver?

We have enough raw materials to produce and fulfill 25,000 inhalers, which we can deliver two months after the campaign ends.

If as a community you purchase more than 25,000 QuickNICs, we’ll order more materials and let you know on this Indiegogo campaign website when we can deliver the additional inhalers.

Stretch Goal 

As as stretch goal, if you help us sell 50,000 QuickNIC inhalers, we will open up another purchase option for a new QuickNIC flavor that the Indiegogo community will help us determine.  

Click here to let us know your choice for the next flavor of QuickNIC.  

Other ways you can help...

If you can't contribute to our campaign through pre-ordering QuickNIC we still need your help.  Please introduce us to your friends and family that smoke or vape by using the Indiegogo sharing tools.

Even a like on Facebook, Instagram, Google+ and Twitter would help spread the word!

Thank you!

- The QuickNIC Team (Kevin, Ben, Jim, Mark and James)


FAQs

Where can I buy QuickNIC?

Currently you can only pre-order QuickNIC through the Indiegogo campaign.  However, we want to quickly get QuickNIC to a smoke shop, vaping shop or convenience store near you.  Please refer your favorite shop to our website or have them call 800-485-7939 or email resellers@micromistnow.com.

Is QuickNIC regulated by the FDA?

QuickNIC is not currently regulated by the US FDA. However, MicromistNow manufactures QuickNIC according to current good manufacturing practices (cGMP) to ensure its safety for our customers.

Can I use QuickNIC if I’m pregnant or nursing?

If you are pregnant or breast-feeding do NOT use QuickNIC. Nicotine causes birth defects.

Can I use QuickNIC if I take other medications?

Talk to your doctor if you take other medications. QuickNIC contains nicotine, which is already in your system if you are a smoker. Nicotine in your system may affect how your body handles medications. Talk to your doctor about this if you take prescription drugs for asthma or depression.

Can I use QuickNIC if I have a medical condition?

Talk to your doctor before using QuickNIC if you have any of the following:

·  A sodium-restricted diet

·  Heart disease, recent heart attack, or irregular heart beat

·  High blood pressure not controlled with medication

·  Stomach ulcer

·  Diabetes

Can I still smoke or vape while using QuickNIC?

Yes, QuickNIC should only be used by smokers and vapers.

Is QuickNIC a smoking cessation device?

QuickNIC has not been tested by the FDA to be a proven smoking cessation device.  However, QuickNIC causes significantly less harm to individuals that smoking or vaping because there is no combustion, heating, toxic chemicals or other harmful materials.

When can I use QuickNIC?

Use QuickNIC, when you can’t smoke or vape.

Is there sugar or calories in QuickNIC?

No, there is no sugar or calories in QuickNIC.

Is there alcohol in QuickNIC?

Each breath of QuickNIC contains about 75 microliters of ethanol, which is less than a drop and has no physiological effects.

What if my child uses or is sprayed with QuickNIC?

Keep QuickNIC out of the reach of children.  If your child shows sign of overdose, immediately call Poison Control 800-222-1222 and seek medical help.

What if I spray QuickNIC on my skin or eyes?

If QuickNIC comes in contact with the skin or eyes, quickly and thoroughly rinse the area with running water.

How much nicotine do I get with each breath of QuickNIC?
You will receive about .33 mg of pure nicotine per breath of QuickNIC.  That is equal to about a third of a cigarette.

What is nicotine?

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nicotine

How many breaths of QuickNIC is safe?

We recommend taking less than 10 breaths of QuickNIC per hour.  A lethal dose of nicotine is around 30 mg or about 90 breaths.

Can I control the dose of nicotine I get with QuickNIC?

Yes, each breath of QuickNIC delivers .33 mg of nicotine to your lungs.  If you’re a heavy smoker or use a highly concentrated nicotine vaping liquid you can take more breaths.

What is the aerosol that QuickNIC uses and is it safe?

QuickNIC uses HFA 134 as the propellant to form the mist.  HFA 134 is generally recognized as safe by the FDA and is the same propellant used in asthma inhalers.

If I don’t smoke or vape, should I use QuickNIC?

QuickNIC is intended for current tobacco users.  Nicotine is highly addictive and should not be used by non-tobacco users.

Does QuickNIC expire?

Each mister of QuickNIC has an expiration date on the bottom of the canister.  QuickNIC expires in one  year from its manufacture date.

What if I left QuickNIC in my car, is it still good?

It is not a great idea to leave QuickNIC in your car as it needs to be stored between 0° and 110° F.  High temperatures could cause the pressure to rise in the mister and cause it to leak.

Is it safe to inhale nicotine?

Nicotine containing tobacco products have been inhaled through smoking for thousands of years. Scientific studies have shown that nicotine is not carcinogenic, although it is highly addictive and can cause birth defects.

story:
About Project HAK

Started in 2009, Project HAK is an annual Youth Expedition Project to Laos, under the National University of Singapore (NUS) Rotaract Club. It aims to promote youth development and self-discovery through overseas service and learning. As such, Project HAK aims to deliver sustainable education in areas such as Health Education and English. Cultural exchange between project members and the host community is also emphasized, so as to foster and build stronger bonds between the two communities. Over the years, Project HAK has managed to build up strong rapport with the locals. It has also completed projects, such as helping out in the construction of schools and other facilities.


Who We Are

We are the leaders for this year’s installment of Project HAK, currently undergraduates in NUS. Last December, we were part of HAK’14 as members. Our committee saw the ongoing need for sustainable education and wanted to continue doing more for their community and carry on spreading love.


HAK’15

This year, we plan to raise funds to help the local children construct a multi-purpose court in their school so that they can enjoy the sports that we once played as children as well. Apart from that, funds raised will go towards helping them in their education, especially in the aspect of health education to increase their hygiene levels and standard of living. Funds raised will go a long way in helping the local community and put a smile on their faces.

Website: http://projecthaknus.wix.com/projecthaknus
Email: projecthak.nus@gmail.com

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Da die meisten Geschäfte, die mit E-Zigaretten handeln von irgendeiner Kette finanziert werden, bekommt der Kunde nicht immer das, das für ihn oder sie das Beste ist.

Davon wollen wir nichts wissen. Wir möchten dir genau das verkaufen, das für dich das Richtige ist, ohne an eine bestimmte Marke gebunden zu sein. Ausserdem möchten wir für dich auch nach dem Kauf da sein, eine Sache, die heute nicht mehr als sebstverständlich anzusehen ist.

Ebenso wirst du bei uns nur Liquids bekommen, von denen wir selber vollends überzeugt sind, und hinter denen wir aus freien Stücken stehen, und nicht nur deswegen, weil es halt von uns verlangt wird.

Wir sind selber überzeugte "Volldampfer" mit dem nötigen Know How euch bestens zu beraten und euch in fast allen Fällen auch weiterhelfen zu können. Ob es nun um die richtige EZigarette für den Start oder um einen krassen Tröpfler mit MechAkku geht, wir wissen auf jeden Fall weiter, wenn ihr Fragen habt.

Da wir ohne eine grosse Kette im Hintergrund arbeiten, und wir uns auch in unserer Freizeit mit dem Dampfen beschäftigen, können wir euch auch immer Top Aktuelle Produkte liefern, ohne auf bestimmte Hersteller angewiesen zu sein.

Die 50.000 Euro Startkapital sind für die erste Grundausstattung mit Liquids, Akkuträgern und Verdampfern, sowie die erste Miete und Inneneinrichtung des Ladens vorgesehen.

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Leider wachsen Liquids und Akkus nicht auf Bäumen, deswegen brauchen wir deine Unterstützung. Sämtliches gespendetes Geld wird in die Umsetzung unseres Traums eines unabhängigen Dampferladens investiert.

Auch wenn die Summe von 50.000 Euro nicht erreicht wird, so werden wir dennoch versuchen, unser Geschäft und unsere Idee irgendwie umzusetzen, aber wir glauben fest an unseren Traum und an Dich.


Die Folgen

Wir lieben den kleinen persönlichen Laden, in dem man vom ersten Eintritt bis zum Verlassen merkt, dass die Personen, die dort arbeiten Spass und Ahnung von ihrer Arbeit haben. Dies vermisst man meistens in den grossen Ketten, in denen halt ein Typ mit schickem TShirt seine Stunden absitzt und sich über die "Pausen-Unterbrechenden" Kunden ärgert. Gerade der Umstieg von der normalen Zigarette auf eine E Zigarette ist für sehr viele Leute noch immer ein grosser Schritt, und wir möchten Dich und andere auf diesem Weg unterstützen.

Ich selber bin von 80 Zigaretten pro Tag auf 0 von jetzt auf gleich, und genau das möchten wir auch den ganzen anderen Rauchern ermöglichen.

Dies möchten wir auf eine Art und Weise ermöglichen, in der sich der Kunde wohl fühlt und gut beraten.


Risiken unseres Vorhabens

Wir wissen, dass der Markt der EZigarette immer härter umkämpft ist, und haben auch teilweise Einblick erhalten, mit was für harten Bandagen dort gekämpft wird. Aber durch unsere eigene Überzeugung und dem Wissen, dass wir über das "dampfen" haben, sind wir uns sicher, dass wir es schaffen werden.


Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Auch wenn du nichts spenden möchtest oder kannst, so kannst auch du etwas tun:
Erzähle anderen von unserem Traum!
Dafür braucht man kein Geld und im Internet sind es nur ein paar Klicks. Erzähle auch deinen Freunden von uns.

Mit eurer Hilfe, werden wir Offenburg und Umgebung den Dampferladen bringen, den Offenburg verdient.


Kommentare schreiben


Beim Kommentare schreiben bitte ich euch, andere Firmen nicht namentlich zu nennen, da ich kein böses Blut schaffen will. Bitte versteht, dass ich solche Kommentare löschen werde. Schreibt statt "Geschäft Namens XY" bitte einfach nur "Geschäft" oder sowas. Die Stadt, in der der Laden ist, könnt ihr natürlich namentlich nennen :)


Vielen Dank 


Benjamin Stoll & Alexander Binkert
story_txt:
Kurzbeschreibung Da die meisten Geschäfte, die mit E-Zigaretten handeln von irgendeiner Kette finanziert werden, bekommt der Kunde nicht immer das, das für ihn oder sie das Beste ist.
Davon wollen wir nichts wissen. Wir möchten dir genau das verkaufen, das für dich das Richtige ist, ohne an eine bestimmte Marke gebunden zu sein. Ausserdem möchten wir für dich auch nach dem Kauf da sein, eine Sache, die heute nicht mehr als sebstverständlich anzusehen ist.
Ebenso wirst du bei uns nur Liquids bekommen, von denen wir selber vollends überzeugt sind, und hinter denen wir aus freien Stücken stehen, und nicht nur deswegen, weil es halt von uns verlangt wird.
Wir sind selber überzeugte "Volldampfer" mit dem nötigen Know How euch bestens zu beraten und euch in fast allen Fällen auch weiterhelfen zu können. Ob es nun um die richtige EZigarette für den Start oder um einen krassen Tröpfler mit MechAkku geht, wir wissen auf jeden Fall weiter, wenn ihr Fragen habt.
Da wir ohne eine grosse Kette im Hintergrund arbeiten, und wir uns auch in unserer Freizeit mit dem Dampfen beschäftigen, können wir euch auch immer Top Aktuelle Produkte liefern, ohne auf bestimmte Hersteller angewiesen zu sein.Die 50.000 Euro Startkapital sind für die erste Grundausstattung mit Liquids, Akkuträgern und Verdampfern, sowie die erste Miete und Inneneinrichtung des Ladens vorgesehen.
  Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst Leider wachsen Liquids und Akkus nicht auf Bäumen, deswegen brauchen wir deine Unterstützung. Sämtliches gespendetes Geld wird in die Umsetzung unseres Traums eines unabhängigen Dampferladens investiert.
Auch wenn die Summe von 50.000 Euro nicht erreicht wird, so werden wir dennoch versuchen, unser Geschäft und unsere Idee irgendwie umzusetzen, aber wir glauben fest an unseren Traum und an Dich.

Die Folgen

 Wir lieben den kleinen persönlichen Laden, in dem man vom ersten Eintritt bis zum Verlassen merkt, dass die Personen, die dort arbeiten Spass und Ahnung von ihrer Arbeit haben. Dies vermisst man meistens in den grossen Ketten, in denen halt ein Typ mit schickem TShirt seine Stunden absitzt und sich über die "Pausen-Unterbrechenden" Kunden ärgert. Gerade der Umstieg von der normalen Zigarette auf eine E Zigarette ist für sehr viele Leute noch immer ein grosser Schritt, und wir möchten Dich und andere auf diesem Weg unterstützen.
Ich selber bin von 80 Zigaretten pro Tag auf 0 von jetzt auf gleich, und genau das möchten wir auch den ganzen anderen Rauchern ermöglichen.
Dies möchten wir auf eine Art und Weise ermöglichen, in der sich der Kunde wohl fühlt und gut beraten.

Risiken unseres Vorhabens

 Wir wissen, dass der Markt der EZigarette immer härter umkämpft ist, und haben auch teilweise Einblick erhalten, mit was für harten Bandagen dort gekämpft wird. Aber durch unsere eigene Überzeugung und dem Wissen, dass wir über das "dampfen" haben, sind wir uns sicher, dass wir es schaffen werden.

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann
Auch wenn du nichts spenden möchtest oder kannst, so kannst auch du etwas tun:
Erzähle anderen von unserem Traum!
Dafür braucht man kein Geld und im Internet sind es nur ein paar Klicks. Erzähle auch deinen Freunden von uns.Mit eurer Hilfe, werden wir Offenburg und Umgebung den Dampferladen bringen, den Offenburg verdient.Kommentare schreiben
Beim Kommentare schreiben bitte ich euch, andere Firmen nicht namentlich zu nennen, da ich kein böses Blut schaffen will. Bitte versteht, dass ich solche Kommentare löschen werde. Schreibt statt "Geschäft Namens XY" bitte einfach nur "Geschäft" oder sowas. Die Stadt, in der der Laden ist, könnt ihr natürlich namentlich nennen :)

Vielen Dank 
Benjamin Stoll & Alexander Binkert

story:
We are a young Mexican team, looking to have a shop, a private space to support and push up Mexican design, achieving daily laughs with products and empathy with each customer that visit the store. All of our products have a history, and a reason, and for each one there's an owner who's going through the same experiences.

#llenadiodio, our brand, born from the need to express feelings to vent and let go of everything that hurts us every day, a way of catharsis;  as stress, anger, resentment, hatred, frustration, heartbreaks, all printed in many products as tees, mugs, wooded boxes, thermos, etc., that people create ties with and sense of belonging, products that can express without speak.

How many times have you wanted to express your displeasure without offending? 

Or just have a sense of humor that some people can't stand? 

This is a way of being cool, #llenadiodio, is not just a brand, it's a lifestyle.

What I need, what you get.

  • We need a financing of approximately 25,000 USD to rent and develope a shop in the right area; remodeling, conditioning and have a little cushion for production and support rent for at least six months.
  • If we achieve the goal, we will make a big opening with the people who made our dream possible, we'll make exclusive and special products for each one and if they are not in the country will send it. 
  • We will give new talent the opportunity and support to present their ideas in our shop, their own space; I't will create a platform to increase talent, generate work and it's a way for everybody to see and know what we can do.
  • If we fail the goal, the funds raised will be used to continue trying to open the store, because you always have to keep trying to achieve dreams.

The impact.

  • Creativity has no limits and this brand has the potential to become recognized and have the impact to develop fidelity among the customers .
  • We have more than 92,000 fans on FB, 3,000 followers on Twitter, and many participations in Mexican design bazaars. 

Other ways you can help.

  • If you can't contribute to the cause, please share us on FB, twitter, with all your contacts, use Indiegogo applications, to continue sharing laughter, satisfaction and a lot of empathy with the world.

story:
Summary of the Campaign

Rest and Repine Woodworks is a custom furniture company started by Chad Musgraves in Wheaton, Illinois. In the video above, our mission and vision are clear: to model and embrace the tensions in life by building beautiful hardwood furniture. To make that a permanent reality, we need to expand into our own shop with our own tools. With your help in raising $15,000, we would be able to purchase those tools and realize our dream of bringing compelling, innovative and naturally beautiful pieces of custom furniture into the lives our clients. Please read through the summary of our needs below and check out pictures of all of the incentives! (Larger pictures of all of the incentives can be found in the gallery tab above).

 

What We Need

Our goal is to raise $15,000, and this will fund the purchase of the tools listed below:

  • Table Saw
  • Router Table
  • Planer
  • Jointer
  • Band Saw
  • Drill Press
  • Dust Collection System

We have been fortunate enough to have a space with tools provided for us up until this point, but we are quickly realizing that in order to keep up with our growing demand, we need a shop of our own with more space. If we do not move into our own shop within the next year, it will become very difficult to stay in business. You have the opportunity to give us the final boost we need! We need your help, however big or small, and we have some awesome incentives to offer in return.

 

Giving Incentives

We believe that our incentives are unlike anything you will find elsewhere. They were designed with functionality and natural beauty in mind. Each one is crafted by the same set of hands, start to finish. The desire to showcase the inherent beauty in hardwoods such as Walnut, Maple, Sapele, Ipe and Mahogany informed every part of the design and construction of these incentives, and we believe you will see very clearly the difference solid hardwood makes. It will be money well spent. We promise.

We invite you to contact us at chad@restandrepine.com with any questions about our incentives or if you would like to see more pictures. 

Lastly, since we are a custom woodworking business, we love hearing new ideas and creating new things. If none of the above incentives fit your needs, or if you been in the market for a specific piece of furniture, please let us know by emailing chad@restandrepine.com, and we can work together to develop something perfect for you.

 

Other Ways to Help

The success of this IndieGoGo campaign is contingent upon getting the video in front of as many people as possible. Sharing this campaign with your community is invaluable to us, especially if that means we can reach someone who is looking for solid, honest and beautiful furniture. The more people who see this, the more likely it will be that we can reach our goal, so share on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, or all of the above! Thank you for the opportunity to share our story. Follow us on Instagram @restandrepine or like our Facebook page, Rest and Repine Woodworks. Please feel free to send us an email to say hello!

story:
Short Summary

In 2008, I started my Health Journey and proceeded to lose over 150 pounds and transform my health and my life. From this success I started my Health Coaching business bringing Nutritional Education, Coaching and Support to the community. The business truly started to thrive with clients and developed to a point where we needed a location. In Summer of 2010 a couple of partners, along with myself opened “Nutrition 101” in Tempe, AZ. This location exploded and grew to a point where I proceeded to open my own location, “Platinum Nutrition” in June 2011 on 5th Ave in Old Town Scottsdale, AZ. Platinum Nutrition grew fast and became well known in the community and served thousands of local residents. During this time, fitness became an additional focus for us as we worked to create a well rounded approach for people to become and stay healthy. We ran a variety of fitness classes such as Bootcamps, Yoga, Stretching, Workout Dance and more out of our location. Additionally, we developed classes in a couple of the local parks in the Valley to expand our reach. In May of 2014 I found myself drastically outgrowing our location because it was a very difficult location for fitness due to shape & size. At the same time the building was being upgraded, as well, and there was a significant rent increase. Due to all of these circumstances it no longer made sense for us to be in this location and I made the choice to close that location and search for a better one. In the meantime, I decided to work from my home office running the health coaching portion of the business, as well as running our workouts in the parks. This allowed me to really dial-in with my clients getting them results and take my time in finding the right location that will be perfect for our Fitness, Nutrition & Coaching all in a single location, as well as take some extra time to spend with my family. I’ve been very fortunate to be able to impact the community and I sincerely look to take my business, and impact on the Valley to even further heights in your location. 

Best Life Fitness & Best Life Nutrition is a culmination of all of our successes and seeks to support people in getting healthy and living their Best Life Ever. As a result, I know this location will thrive and become something that will make all of us proud. I truly appreciate everyones support & along with our history I am bringing my book of clients with me and they are so excited to see our new location open and anxious to be a part of its success and commitment to making the Valley a healthier place. 

What We Need & What You Get

We simply need financial support to help get a location open to support the Valley and for your kindness you'll be greatly rewarded. 

  • We need $25,000 to make sure we have the proper buildout of a new facility as well as everything we need to support everyone that we work with. 
  • We're excited to offer many ways to participate with us and reward you!
  • $5 contribution - You'll be named as a supporting member on our website
  • $25 contribution - You'll be named as a supporting member on our website & receive a Best Life Fitness & Nutrition Bracelet
  • $50 contribution - You'll be named as a supporting member on our website & receive a Best Life T-Shirt
  • $100 - You'll get a 10 pack of classes, a Best Life Fitness & Nutrition Bracelet, you'll be named as a supporting member on our website, get named as a supporting member at the Best Life Location & receive 5% off of Fitness Classes and our Nutrition Shake Bar
  • $250 - You'll get a 20 pack of classes, a Best Life Fitness & Nutrition Shirt, you'll be named as a supporting member on our website, get named as a supporting member at the Best Life Location & receive 10% off of Fitness Classes and our Nutrition Shake Bar
  • $500 - You'll get a 30 pack of classes, a Best Life Fitness & Nutrition Shirt, you'll be named as a FOUNDING MEMBER on our website, get named as a FOUNDING MEMBER at the Best Life Location & receive 15% off of Fitness Classes and our Nutrition Shake Bar
  • $1000 - You'll get a 50 pack of classes, a Best Life Fitness & Nutrition Shirt, you'll be named as a FOUNDING MEMBER on our website, get named as a FOUNDING MEMBER at the Best Life Location & receive 25% off of Fitness Classes and our Nutrition Shake Bar

The Impact

This will impact our community in such a huge way.  75% of the population is overweight and the Phoenix valley is no exception. We provide a fun and engaging community of people that get healthy together. Fitness, Mindset and Nutrition are our focuses to impact our community.

Other Ways You Can Help

If your unable to contribute no worries... We appreciate any support you can give us! Come out and visit us and feel free to bring friends and family. We always find ways to reward people for helping us make an impact in the community.

story:
Go On Go Out

So much more than just another events site. Go On Go Out grabs events from all over the web and presents them in an easy to use way, giving you a complete guide to everything going on. Go On Go Out is completely free to use and completely free for venues and promoters to list their events. We will never charge for event listings.

This is not just another pie in the sky idea, we are live and running and have been providing the largest guide to events in Portsmouth for the last year. Go on, check it out!

We have developed a platform that can be applied to any location in the world, with responsive design that works well on any device. We have up to 10x more events than other event guides (and sometimes more!), over 10,000 events and 3,000 artists in our system. We rank in the top 3 on Google for many terms and receive over 13,000 visitors a month. We now need your help to keep going and keep growing.

It looks better live! Please take a look.

What's Next?

What we have now is just the start. We will be launching in Southampton soon, then over the next 6 months we will be making improvements to how we gather, store and present information ahead of launching UK-wide (with other countries following soon after). We'll be increasing Facebook and other social media integration with an intelligent event suggestion system to make it even easier for you to discover new events.  We will also be developing mobile apps with location based features and some exciting things that was can't really talk about yet. :)

We will continue to feature more events on Go On Go Out than other event guides and to be the best place to find out what's going on.

We'll also be developing on the ticketing system we are currently trialling. Consulting with venues, promoters, artists and event-goers to offer something that solves the problems with existing ticketing solutions.

This campaign is ahead of a larger equity crowdfunding round in September/October. We'll keep it fairly brief here, but if you are interested in investing, or would like to see our financial projections, business plan or other documents or if you have any questions at all please get in touch, hello@goongoout.com.

Who Are We?

Go On Go Out Founders: Si Bunting (me) and Ruth Eades. 

The Go On Go Out team is made up of the founders, Ruth Eades and Si Bunting along with Tom Mayhead.

Check out our profiles above for more about us!

All of us have been around events since we were children. My Dad has promoted live music events for 20 years and used to run a pub, Ruth’s brother is a DJ and producer. Many of our closest friends run venues, promote events or are DJs or musicians. 

We all love going out and are passionate about what we have built with Go On Go Out. We've found some amazing and unusual events along the way as well! We can't wait to build on this to reach more people and develop even better ways to help everyone find out what's going on. If you'd like to know any more about us, please ask away! 

Tom, Ruth & Si. The Go On Go Out team.

Our Story

Back in 2012 we had a problem. We really struggled to find out what was going on in Portsmouth. We love live music, clubbing, comedy, theatre and so much more. 

Finding out what was happening involved hunting around on Facebook, liking all the venue pages, then having to Google as well to find those that didn’t use Facebook. Clicking on other event sites and thinking in a city of 200,000 there must be more than a couple of gigs on a Saturday night! 

It was a massive pain in the arse and put us off looking for new things to do, but it gave us an idea…

What if there was one place that listed everything going on?

To cut a long story short we built Go On Go Out! Pulling event information from Facebook, ticket sites and other places to give a complete guide to everything going on.  

(If you want the long version of our story, keep an eye on our blog over the next few weeks.)

Please check out the kind things people are saying about us. 

The Rewards

New reward!  Limited edition signed prints from Stefano Pollina.

With massive thanks to Stefano Pollina, we are pleased to be able to offer a limited number of signed prints of his spectacular astrophotography featuring Portsmouth landmarks and venues. 

Contribute £20 and you have a choice of Southsea Castle with Jupiter Watching Over, South Parade Pier with Star Trails or Southsea Bandstand with The Milky Way. Contribute £50 and get a set of all three.

High quality A3 prints, hand-signed by Stefano. Delivered free of charge in Portsmouth (£5 rest of UK, £10 worldwide). 


New reward! Self-updating websites for venues, promoters and artists.

Don’t have your own website? Contribute £200 we will build you one that showcases your events and integrates with your social media. It will stay up to date with your Facebook events automatically! No work involved on your part. Modern responsive design and search engine optimisation are standard, we’ll include a domain name and a year’s hosting as well.

You’ll also be the first to get access to our data on your site. Next year we will be launching a site-builder, which won’t just keep your site up to date with your events but will include information and streaming media for the venues, brands and artists also involved in your events and a lot more.

We are also more than happy to build you a website even if aren't involved in events, any questions please ask.

Save on tickets, event promotion and advertising

We are going to keep this really really simple. Every penny you contribute, you will get back 1.5x as much in credit vouchers that can be spent on buying tickets, promoting your events or advertising on Go On Go Out.

Backers here will also have first chance to invest in our equity funding round launching in September and will have the option of converting their contribution into equity as well.  

For more details on tickets, advertising and event promotion please head over to our blog. 

City Sponsorship

We also have a limited number of special package available. For £1000 you can sponsor an entire city for a year. That city is yours! You will have a leaderboard banner across the top of all pages within that city. You can use it to promote your brand, business, website, pictures of your cat... whatever you want! 

Based on the traffic we receive in Portsmouth over 300,000 people will see your message! There's a good chance that will be higher for larger cities.

If you would like to sponsor Portsmouth or Southampton please get in touch, we will be able to get it live sooner than the timescales below.

We are also offering a single multi-city package. £5,000 will get your business at the top of all pages in 7 cities for 12 months. Again based on our traffic for Portsmouth, this is over 2 million views of your advert.

Backers Wall

As a small gesture of thanks we'll include all of our backers in a special page, permanently on Go On Go Out. Contribute £50 or over and we'll link through to your website, events, or anywhere else. Thank you!

International Backers

Are you outside of the UK? You can still back us and help bring Go On Go Out to where you are! While we are focused on the UK first, the unique platform we have developed can be applied to any location in the world. We will be polling backers to find out where to go next and your credit will never expire. You can also use your credit to buy tickets for a friend in the UK or advertising for an international business.

Please note: We have confirmed with Indiegogo that credit vouchers and advertising are allowed as rewards. To comply with Indiegogo rules, we'll have to refund your contribution after the equity round if you want to convert it to equity. Please check out the risks below before contributing. 

Use of Funds

The funds raised here will allow us to continue running Portsmouth's largest events site and also launch in Southampton ahead of rolling out across the UK and then other countries. 

Without getting too technical we need to optimise our database and improve some of the systems before we can expand, your contributions will allow us to do this. (Happy to give more technical details if you want, feel free to ask any questions.)

We also need to invest in marketing and advertising for our Southampton launch.

Timeline

Here’s the approximate timeline of how we will further develop Go On Go Out and when rewards will be available.

  • August 2015 - Indiegogo campaign closes
  • September 2015 - Launch in Southampton
  • October 2015 - Equity crowdfunding round closes
  • January 2016 - Launch UK Wide. Credit can be spent on advertising and event promotion.
  • March-April 2016 - Launch ticketing solution. Credit can be spent on tickets.

Impact

You contribution will make a massive difference. It will allow us to carry on providing event-goers in Portsmouth with a complete guide to what's on and also expand to cover Southampton.

The funds raised here will allow us to launch a larger campaign later in the year which will allow us to apply our platform across the whole of the UK and then further afield.

We will give everyone complete and accurate information about what's going on where they are.

By increasing awareness of what's going on, we can help the small venues, promoters and artists. In Portsmouth we are often the only event guide listing many of the smaller gigs, club nights and other events. If we can help get more people going to these events, it will play a part in reducing the rate at which pubs and other entertainment venues are closing. 

Risks

Although we have the platform developed and have proven that it works there are of course still risks. The risks might be less than projects at earlier stages but you should still be aware of them before backing us. 

  • The UK roll out depends on another crowdfunding campaign, what if that isn't successful? We have been working with the UK government's Growth Accelerator programme and are talking to angel investors as well as working directly with an equity crowdfunding site to develop a strong campaign. We are SEIS eligible and have an attractive valuation so are confident this will succeed. However, if is unsuccessful we will continue to provide the largest guide to events in Portsmouth (and soon Southampton), the UK roll out may be delayed slightly but will still happen in 2016.
  • What if no one wants to sell tickets with us? We can't say too much here but are very confident the ticketing solution we are developing will be used, we will be offering something easier and cheaper than existing options that will work either as the main ticket outlet, or alongside the solutions venues and artists already use to generate additional sales. We'll be engaging in a large consultation process to make sure we get it right and we'll want your views, watch out for an email.  
  • What if we don't meet our goal? We opted for flexible funding as we can achieve our aims without meeting our goal. The most likely impact will be less marketing activity for the Southampton launch, resulting in slower growth. We may also have to postpone some of the less urgent development work needed. Overall we could see slight delays to expected timescales but we will continue and rewards will be fulfilled. 

Other Ways to Help

If you can't back us financially, there are other ways you can help as well. Please share this campaign on social media, let your friends and family know. Anyone you know who may be interested in supporting us and saving money on tickets or advertising to event goers. Anything you can do would be a massive help, thanks!

Please give us a like or a follow, thanks! 

Go On Go Out: Facebook, Twitter
 GOGO Portsmouth: Facebook, Twitter
GOGO Southampton: Facebook, Twitter

Thanks for reading, if you have any questions at all please post a comment or get in touch with us via our website, social media or email hello@goongoout.com.
story_txt:
Go On Go Out
So much more than just another events site. Go On Go Out grabs events from all over the web and presents them in an easy to use way, giving you a complete guide to everything going on. Go On Go Out is completely free to use and completely free for venues and promoters to list their events. We will never charge for event listings.
This is not just another pie in the sky idea, we are live and running and have been providing the largest guide to events in Portsmouth for the last year. Go on, check it out! 
We have developed a platform that can be applied to any location in the world, with responsive design that works well on any device. We have up to 10x more events than other event guides (and sometimes more!), over 10,000 events and 3,000 artists in our system. We rank in the top 3 on Google for many terms and receive over 13,000 visitors a month. We now need your help to keep going and keep growing.



It looks better live! Please take a look.
What's Next?
What we have now is just the start. We will be launching in Southampton soon, then over the next 6 months we will be making improvements to how we gather, store and present information ahead of launching UK-wide (with other countries following soon after). We'll be increasing Facebook and other social media integration with an intelligent event suggestion system to make it even easier for you to discover new events.  We will also be developing mobile apps with location based features and some exciting things that was can't really talk about yet. :)
We will continue to feature more events on Go On Go Out than other event guides and to be the best place to find out what's going on.
We'll also be developing on the ticketing system we are currently trialling. Consulting with venues, promoters, artists and event-goers to offer something that solves the problems with existing ticketing solutions.
This campaign is ahead of a larger equity crowdfunding round in September/October. We'll keep it fairly brief here, but if you are interested in investing, or would like to see our financial projections, business plan or other documents or if you have any questions at all please get in touch, hello@goongoout.com.


Who Are We?


Go On Go Out Founders: Si Bunting (me) and Ruth Eades. 
The Go On Go Out team is made up of the founders, Ruth Eades and Si Bunting along with Tom Mayhead.
Check out our profiles above for more about us!
All of us have been around events since we were children. My Dad has promoted live music events for 20 years and used to run a pub, Ruth’s brother is a DJ and producer. Many of our closest friends run venues, promote events or are DJs or musicians. 
We all love going out and are passionate about what we have built with Go On Go Out. We've found some amazing and unusual events along the way as well! We can't wait to build on this to reach more people and develop even better ways to help everyone find out what's going on. If you'd like to know any more about us, please ask away! 

Tom, Ruth & Si. The Go On Go Out team.


Our Story

Back in 2012 we had a problem. We really struggled to find out what was going on in Portsmouth. We love live music, clubbing, comedy, theatre and so much more. 
Finding out what was happening involved hunting around on Facebook, liking all the venue pages, then having to Google as well to find those that didn’t use Facebook. Clicking on other event sites and thinking in a city of 200,000 there must be more than a couple of gigs on a Saturday night! 
It was a massive pain in the arse and put us off looking for new things to do, but it gave us an idea…
What if there was one place that listed everything going on?
To cut a long story short we built Go On Go Out! Pulling event information from Facebook, ticket sites and other places to give a complete guide to everything going on.  
(If you want the long version of our story, keep an eye on our blog over the next few weeks.)
Please check out the kind things people are saying about us. 

The Rewards

New reward!  Limited edition signed prints from Stefano Pollina.
With massive thanks to Stefano Pollina, we are pleased to be able to offer a limited number of signed prints of his spectacular astrophotography featuring Portsmouth landmarks and venues. 
Contribute £20 and you have a choice of Southsea Castle with Jupiter Watching Over, South Parade Pier with Star Trails or Southsea Bandstand with The Milky Way. Contribute £50 and get a set of all three.
High quality A3 prints, hand-signed by Stefano. Delivered free of charge in Portsmouth (£5 rest of UK, £10 worldwide). 



New reward! Self-updating websites for venues, promoters and artists.
Don’t have your own website? Contribute £200 we will build you one that showcases your events and integrates with your social media. It will stay up to date with your Facebook events automatically! No work involved on your part. Modern responsive design and search engine optimisation are standard, we’ll include a domain name and a year’s hosting as well.You’ll also be the first to get access to our data on your site. Next year we will be launching a site-builder, which won’t just keep your site up to date with your events but will include information and streaming media for the venues, brands and artists also involved in your events and a lot more. 
We are also more than happy to build you a website even if aren't involved in events, any questions please ask.
Save on tickets, event promotion and advertising
We are going to keep this really really simple. Every penny you contribute, you will get back 1.5x as much in credit vouchers that can be spent on buying tickets, promoting your events or advertising on Go On Go Out.
Backers here will also have first chance to invest in our equity funding round launching in September and will have the option of converting their contribution into equity as well.  
For more details on tickets, advertising and event promotion please head over to our blog. 
City Sponsorship
We also have a limited number of special package available. For £1000 you can sponsor an entire city for a year. That city is yours! You will have a leaderboard banner across the top of all pages within that city. You can use it to promote your brand, business, website, pictures of your cat... whatever you want! 
Based on the traffic we receive in Portsmouth over 300,000 people will see your message! There's a good chance that will be higher for larger cities.
If you would like to sponsor Portsmouth or Southampton please get in touch, we will be able to get it live sooner than the timescales below.
We are also offering a single multi-city package. £5,000 will get your business at the top of all pages in 7 cities for 12 months. Again based on our traffic for Portsmouth, this is over 2 million views of your advert.
Backers Wall
As a small gesture of thanks we'll include all of our backers in a special page, permanently on Go On Go Out. Contribute £50 or over and we'll link through to your website, events, or anywhere else. Thank you!
International Backers
Are you outside of the UK? You can still back us and help bring Go On Go Out to where you are! While we are focused on the UK first, the unique platform we have developed can be applied to any location in the world. We will be polling backers to find out where to go next and your credit will never expire. You can also use your credit to buy tickets for a friend in the UK or advertising for an international business.
Please note: We have confirmed with Indiegogo that credit vouchers and advertising are allowed as rewards. To comply with Indiegogo rules, we'll have to refund your contribution after the equity round if you want to convert it to equity. Please check out the risks below before contributing. 



Use of Funds
The funds raised here will allow us to continue running Portsmouth's largest events site and also launch in Southampton ahead of rolling out across the UK and then other countries.
